original: RV_06.001.01.1{35} tvaṃ hyagne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā
analyzed: tvam hi agne prathamaḥ manotā asyāḥ dhiyaḥ abhavaḥ dasma hotā

original: RV_06.001.01.2{35} tvaṃ sīṃ vṛṣannakṛṇorduṣṭarītu saho viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai
analyzed: tvam sīm vṛṣan akṛṇoḥ duṣṭarītu sahaḥ viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai

original: RV_06.001.02.1{35} adhā hotā nyasīdo yajīyāniḷas pada iṣayannīḍyaḥ san
analyzed: adhā hotā nyasīdaḥ yajīyān iḍaḥ pade iṣayan īḍyaḥ san

original: RV_06.001.02.2{35} taṃ tvā naraḥ prathamaṃ devayanto maho rāye citayanto anu gman
analyzed: tam tvā naraḥ prathamam devayantaḥ mahaḥ rāye citayantaḥ anu gman

original: RV_06.001.03.1{35} vṛteva yantaṃ bahubhirvasavyaistve rayiṃ jāgṛvāṃso anu gman
analyzed: vṛtā iva yantam bahubhiḥ vasavyaiḥ tve rayim jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman

original: RV_06.001.03.2{35} ruśantamagniṃ darśataṃ bṛhantaṃ vapāvantaṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam
analyzed: ruśantam agnim darśatam bṛhantam vapāvantam viśvahā dīdivāṃsam

original: RV_06.001.04.1{35} padaṃ devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śrava āpannamṛktam
analyzed: padam devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śravaḥ āpannam ṛktam

original: RV_06.001.04.2{35} nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayantasandṛṣṭau
analyzed: nāmāni cit dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyām te

original: RV_06.001.05.1{35} tvāṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tvāṃ rāya ubhayāso janānām
analyzed: tvām vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyām tvām rāyaḥ ubhayāsaḥ janānām

original: RV_06.001.05.2{35} tvaṃ trātā taraṇe cetyo bhūḥ pitā mātā sadamin mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: tvam trātā taraṇe cetyaḥ bhūḥ pitā mātā sadamidh mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_06.001.06.1{36} saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyo vikṣvagnirhotā mandro ni ṣasādā yajīyān
analyzed: saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyaḥ vikṣu agniḥ hotā mandraḥ ni ṣasāda ā yajīyān

original: RV_06.001.06.2{36} taṃ tvā vayaṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsamupa jñubādho namasā sadema
analyzed: tam tvā vayam dame ā dīdivāṃsam upa jñubādhaḥ namasā sadema

original: RV_06.001.07.1{36} taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudhyo navyamagne-sumnāyava īmahe devayantaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā vayam sudhyaḥ navyam agne sumnāyavaḥ īmahe devayantaḥ

original: RV_06.001.07.2{36} tvaṃ viśo anayo dīdyāno divo agne bṛhatā rocanena
analyzed: tvam viśaḥ anayaḥ dīdyānaḥ divaḥ agne bṛhatā rocanena

original: RV_06.001.08.1{36} viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatiṃ śaśvatīnāṃ nitośanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: viśām kavim viśpatim śaśvatīnām nitośanam vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_06.001.08.2{36} pretīṣaṇimiṣayantaṃ pāvakaṃ rājantamagniṃ yajataṃ rayīṇām
analyzed: pretīṣaṇim iṣayantam pāvakam rājantam agnim yajatam rayīṇām

original: RV_06.001.09.1{36} so agna īje śaśame ca marto yasta ānaṭ samidhā havyadātim
analyzed: saḥ agne īje śaśame ca martaḥ yaḥ te ānaṭ samidhā havya dātim

original: RV_06.001.09.2{36} ya āhutiṃ pari vedā namobhirviśvet sa vāmā dadhatetvotaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ āhutim pari veda namobhiḥ viśvā id sa vāmā dadhat itvā ūtaḥ

original: RV_06.001.10.1{36} asmā u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhiragne samidhota havyaiḥ
analyzed: asmai u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhiḥ agne samidhā uta havyaiḥ

original: RV_06.001.10.2{36} vedī sūno sahaso gīrbhirukthairā te bhadrāyāṃ sumatauyatema
analyzed: vedī sūno sahasaḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ ā te bhadrāyām sumatau

original: RV_06.001.11.1{36} ā yastatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiśca śravasyastarutraḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiḥ ca śravasyaḥ tarutraḥ

original: RV_06.001.11.2{36} bṛhadbhirvājai sthavirebhirasme revadbhiragne vitaraṃ vi bhāhi
analyzed: bṛhadbhiḥ vājaiḥ sthavirebhiḥ asme revadbhiḥ agne vitaram vi bhāhi

original: RV_06.001.12.1{36} nṛvad vaso sadamid dhehyasme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ
analyzed: nṛvat vaso sadam id dhehi asme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ

original: RV_06.001.12.2{36} pūrvīriṣo bṛhatīrāreaghā asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ āreaghāḥ asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu

original: RV_06.001.13.1{36} purūṇyagne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasutā te aśyām
analyzed: purūṇi agne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasu tā te aśyām

original: RV_06.001.13.2{36} purūṇi hi tve puruvāra santyagne vasu vidhate rājani tve
analyzed: purūṇi hi tve puru vāra santi agne vasu vidhate rājani tve

original: RV_06.002.01.1{01} tvaṃ hi kṣaitavad yaśo 'gne mitro na patyase
analyzed: tvam hi kṣaitavat yaśaḥ gne mitraḥ na patyase

original: RV_06.002.01.2{01} tvaṃ vicarṣaṇe śravo vaso puṣṭiṃ na puṣyasi
analyzed: tvam vicarṣaṇe śravaḥ vaso puṣṭim na puṣyasi

original: RV_06.002.02.1{01} tvāṃ hi ṣmā carṣaṇayo yajñebhirgīrbhirīḷate
analyzed: tvām hi sma carṣaṇayaḥ yajñebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ īḍate

original: RV_06.002.02.2{01} tvāṃ vājī yātyavṛko rajastūrviśvacarṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: tvām vājī yāti avṛkaḥ rajastūrviśvacarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_06.002.03.1{01} sajoṣastvā divo naro yajñasya ketumindhate
analyzed: sajoṣaḥ tvā divaḥ naraḥ yajñasya ketum indhate

original: RV_06.002.03.2{01} yad dha sya mānuṣo janaḥ sumnāyurjuhve adhvare
analyzed: yat ha sya mānuṣaḥ janaḥ sumnāyuḥ juhve adhvare

original: RV_06.002.04.1{01} ṛdhad yaste sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate
analyzed: ṛdhat yaḥ te sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate

original: RV_06.002.04.2{01} ūtī ṣa bṛhato divo dviṣo aṃho na tarati
analyzed: ūtī sa bṛhataḥ divaḥ dviṣaḥ aṃhaḥ na tarati

original: RV_06.002.05.1{01} samidhā yasta āhutiṃ niśitiṃ martyo naśat
analyzed: samidhā yaḥ te āhutim niśitim martyaḥ naśat

original: RV_06.002.05.2{01} vayāvantaṃsa puṣyati kṣayamagne śatāyuṣam
analyzed: vayāvantam sa puṣyati kṣayam agne śata āyuṣam

original: RV_06.002.06.1{02} tveṣaste dhūma ṛṇvati divi ṣañchukra ātataḥ
analyzed: tveṣaḥ te dhūmaḥ ṛṇvati divi ṣan śukraḥ ātataḥ

original: RV_06.002.06.2{02} sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase
analyzed: sūraḥ na hi dyutā tvam kṛpā pāvaka rocase

original: RV_06.002.07.1{02} adhā hi vikṣvīḍyo 'si priyo no atithiḥ
analyzed: adhā hi vikṣvīḍyaḥ si priyaḥ naḥ atithiḥ

original: RV_06.002.07.2{02} raṇvaḥ purīva jūryaḥ sūnurna trayayāyyaḥ
analyzed: raṇvaḥ puri iva jūryaḥ sūnuḥ na trayayāyyaḥ

original: RV_06.002.08.1{02} kratvā hi droṇe ajyase 'gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ
analyzed: kratvā hi droṇe ajyase gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ

original: RV_06.002.08.2{02} parijmevasvadhā gayo 'tyo na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ
analyzed: parijmā iva svadhā gayaḥ tyaḥ na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ

original: RV_06.002.09.1{02} tvaṃ tyā cidacyutāgne paśurna yavase
analyzed: tvam tyā cit acyutā agne paśuḥ na yavase

original: RV_06.002.09.2{02} dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ
analyzed: dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ

original: RV_06.002.10.1{02} veṣi hyadhvarīyatāmagne hotā dame viśām
analyzed: veṣi hi adhvarīyatām agne hotā dame viśām

original: RV_06.002.10.2{02} samṛdho viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyamaṅgiraḥ
analyzed: samṛdhaḥ viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyam aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_06.002.11.1{02} achā no mitramaho deva devānagne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ
analyzed: achā naḥ mitra mahas deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatim rodasyoḥ

original: RV_06.002.11.2{02} vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritātarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema
analyzed: vīhi svastim su kṣitim divaḥ nṝn dviṣaḥ aṃhāṃsi duritā atarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema

original: RV_06.003.01.1{03} agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotirnaśate devayuṣ ṭe
analyzed: agne sa kṣeṣat ṛta pāḥ ṛta ejāḥ uru jyotiḥ naśate devayuḥ te

original: RV_06.003.01.2{03} yaṃ tvaṃ mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martamaṃhaḥ
analyzed: yam tvam mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ

original: RV_06.003.02.1{03} īje yajñebhih śaśame śamībhirṛdhadvārāyāgnaye dadāśa
analyzed: īje yajñebhiḥ śaśame śamībhiḥ ṛdha dvārāya agnaye dadāśa

original: RV_06.003.02.2{03} evā cana taṃ yaśasāmajuṣṭirnāṃho martaṃ naśate na pradṛptiḥ
analyzed: evā cana tam yaśasām ajuṣṭiḥ na aṃhaḥ martam naśate na pradṛptiḥ

original: RV_06.003.03.1{03} sūro na yasya dṛśatirarepā bhīmā yadeti śucatasta ā dhīḥ
analyzed: sūraḥ na yasya dṛśatiḥ arepāḥ bhīmā yadā iti śucataḥ te ā dhīḥ

original: RV_06.003.03.2{03} heṣasvataḥ śurudho nāyamaktoḥ kutrā cid raṇvo vasatirvanejāḥ
analyzed: heṣasvataḥ śurudhaḥ na ayam aktoḥ kutrā cit raṇvaḥ vasatiḥ vanejāḥ

original: RV_06.003.04.1{03} tigmaṃ cidema mahi varpo asya bhasadaśvo na yamasāna āsā
analyzed: tigmam cidema mahi varpaḥ asya bhasadaśvaḥ na yamasānaḥ āsā

original: RV_06.003.04.2{03} vijehamānaḥ paraśurna jihvāṃ dravirna drāvayati dāru dhakṣat
analyzed: vijehamānaḥ paraśuḥ na jihvām draviḥ na drāvayati dāru dhakṣat

original: RV_06.003.05.1{03} sa idasteva prati dhādasiṣyañchiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām
analyzed: saḥ idastā iva prati dhāt asiṣyan śiśīta tejaḥ yasaḥ na dhārām

original: RV_06.003.05.2{03} citradhrajatiraratiryo aktorverna druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ
analyzed: citra dhrajatiḥ aratiḥ yaḥ aktu ūrveḥ na druṣadvā raghu patma jaṃhāḥ

original: RV_06.003.06.1{04} sa īṃ rebho na prati vasta usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitramahāḥ
analyzed: saḥ īm rebhaḥ na prati vaste usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitra mahāḥ

original: RV_06.003.06.2{04} naktaṃ ya īmaruṣo yo divā nṝnamartyo aruṣo yo divā nṝn
analyzed: naktam yaḥ īm aruṣaḥ yaḥ divā nṝn amartyaḥ aruṣaḥ yaḥ divā nṝn

original: RV_06.003.07.1{04} divo na yasya vidhato navīnod vṛṣā rukṣa oṣadhīṣu nūnot
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya vidhataḥ navīnot vṛṣā rukṣaḥ oṣadhīṣu nūnot

original: RV_06.003.07.2{04} ghṛṇā na yo dhrajasā patmanā yannā rodasī vasunādaṃ supatnī
analyzed: ghṛṇā na yaḥ dhrajasā patmanā yat nā rodasī vasu nādam su patnī

original: RV_06.003.08.1{04} dhāyobhirvā yo yujyebhirarkairvidyun na davidyot svebhiḥśuṣmaih
analyzed: dhāyobhiḥ vā yaḥ yujyebhiḥ arkaiḥ vidyut na davidyot svebhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ

original: RV_06.003.08.2{04} śardho vā yo marutāṃ tatakṣa ṛbhurna tveṣorabhasāno adyaut
analyzed: śardhaḥ vā yaḥ marutām tatakṣa ṛbhuḥ na tveṣoḥ rabhasānaḥ adyaut

original: RV_06.004.01.1{05} yathā hotarmanuṣo devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajāsi
analyzed: yathā hotar manuṣaḥ devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ yajāsi

original: RV_06.004.01.2{05} evā no adya samanā samānānuśannagna uśato yakṣi devān
analyzed: eva naḥ adya samanā samānān uśan agne uśataḥ yakṣi devān

original: RV_06.004.02.1{05} sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇirna vastoragnirvandāru vedyaścano dhāt
analyzed: sa naḥ vibhāvā cakṣaṇiḥ na vastoḥ agniḥ vandāru vedyaḥ canaḥ dhāt

original: RV_06.004.02.2{05} viśvāyuryo amṛto martyeṣūṣarbhud bhūdatithirjātavedāḥ
analyzed: viśvāyuḥ yaḥ amṛtaḥ martyeṣu uṣarbudh bhūt atithiḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_06.004.03.1{05} dyāvo na yasya panayantyabhvaṃ bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryo na śukraḥ
analyzed: dyāvaḥ na yasya panayanti abhvam bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryaḥ na śukraḥ

original: RV_06.004.03.2{05} vi ya inotyajaraḥ pāvako 'śnasya cicchiśnathat pūrvyāṇi
analyzed: vi yaḥ inoti ajaraḥ pāvakaḥ śnasya cit śiśnathat pūrvyāṇi

original: RV_06.004.04.1{05} vadmā hi sūno asyadmasadvā cakre agnirjanuṣājmānnam
analyzed: vadmā hi sūno asi adma sad vā cakre agniḥ januṣā ajma annam

original: RV_06.004.04.2{05} sa tvaṃ na ūrjasana ūrjaṃ dhā rājeva jeravṛke kṣeṣyantaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ ūrja sane ūrjam dhāḥ rājā iva jeravṛke kṣeṣyantaḥ

original: RV_06.004.05.1{05} nitikti yo vāraṇamannamatti vāyurna rāṣṭryatyetyaktūn
analyzed: nitikti yaḥ vāraṇam annam atti vāyuḥ na rāṣṭrī atyeti aktūn

original: RV_06.004.05.2{05} turyāma yasta ādiśāmarātīratyo na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut
analyzed: turyāma yaḥ te ādiśām arātīratyaḥ na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut

original: RV_06.004.06.1{06} ā sūryo na bhānumadbhirarkairagne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ na bhānumadbhiḥ arkaiḥ agne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā

original: RV_06.004.06.2{06} citro nayat pari tamāṃsyaktaḥ śociṣā patmannauśijo na dīyan
analyzed: citraḥ nayat pari tamāṃsi aktaḥ śociṣā patman auśijaḥ na dīyan

original: RV_06.004.07.1{06} tvāṃ hi mandratamamarkaśokairvavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣyagne
analyzed: tvām hi mandratamam arka śokaiḥ vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣi agne

original: RV_06.004.07.2{06} indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyuṃ pṛṇanti rādhasānṛtamāḥ
analyzed: indram na tvā śavasā devatāḥ vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā anṛtamāḥ

original: RV_06.004.08.1{06} nū no agne 'vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣyaṃhaḥ
analyzed: nu naḥ agne vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣi aṃhaḥ

original: RV_06.004.08.2{06} tā sūribhyo gṛṇate rāsi sumnaṃ madema śatahimāḥsuvīrāḥ
analyzed: tā sūribhyaḥ gṛṇate rāsi sumnam madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.005.01.1{07} huve vaḥ sūnuṃ sahaso yuvānamadroghavācaṃ matibhiryaviṣṭham
analyzed: huve vaḥ sūnum sahasaḥ yuvānam adrogha vācam matibhiḥ yaviṣṭham

original: RV_06.005.01.2{07} ya invati draviṇāni pracetā viśvavārāṇi puruvāroadhruk
analyzed: yaḥ invati draviṇāni pracetāḥ viśva vārāṇi puru vāraḥ adhruk

original: RV_06.005.02.1{07} tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotardoṣā vastorerire yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotar doṣā vastoḥ erire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_06.005.02.2{07} kṣāmeva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin saṃ saubhagāni dadhirepāvake
analyzed: kṣāma iva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin sam saubhagāni

original: RV_06.005.03.1{07} tvaṃ vikṣu pradivaḥ sīda āsu kratvā rathīrabhavo vāryāṇām
analyzed: tvam vikṣu pradivaḥ sīdaḥ āsu kratvā rathīra bhavaḥ vāryāṇām

original: RV_06.005.03.2{07} ata inoṣi vidhate cikitvo vyānuṣag jātavedo vasūni
analyzed: atas inoṣi vidhate cikitvaḥ vyānuṣak jātavedaḥ vasūni

original: RV_06.005.04.1{07} yo naḥ sanutyo abhidāsadagne yo antaro mitramaho vanuṣyāt
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ sanutyaḥ abhidāsat agne yaḥ antaraḥ mitra mahas vanuṣyāt

original: RV_06.005.04.2{07} tamajarebhirvṛṣabhistava svaistapā tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān
analyzed: tam ajarebhiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ tava svaiḥ tapa tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān

original: RV_06.005.05.1{07} yaste yajñena samidhā ya ukthairarkebhiḥ sūno sahaso dadāśat
analyzed: yaḥ te yajñena samidhā yaḥ ukthaiḥ arkebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_06.005.05.2{07} sa martyeṣvamṛta pracetā rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti
analyzed: sa martyeṣu amṛta pracetāḥ rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti

original: RV_06.005.06.1{07} sa tat kṛdhīṣitastūyamagne spṛdho bādhasva sahasā sahasvān
analyzed: sa tat kṛdhi iṣita stūyam agne spṛdhaḥ bādhasva sahasā sahasvān

original: RV_06.005.06.2{07} yacchasyase dyubhirakto vacobhistajjuṣasva jariturghoṣi manma
analyzed: yat śasyase dyubhiḥ aktaḥ vacobhiḥ tat juṣasva jarituḥ ghoṣi manma

original: RV_06.005.07.1{07} aśyāma taṃ kāmamagne tavotī aśyāma rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīram
analyzed: aśyāma tam kāmam agne tava ūtī aśyāma rayim rayivas su vīram

original: RV_06.005.07.2{07} aśyāma vājamabhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnamajarājaraṃ te
analyzed: aśyāma vājam abhi vājayantaḥ śyāma dyumnam ajara ajaram te

original: RV_06.006.01.1{08} pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnumachā yajñena gātumava ichamānaḥ
analyzed: pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnumachāḥ yajñena gātumavaḥ ichamānaḥ

original: RV_06.006.01.2{08} vṛścadvanaṃ kṛṣṇayāmaṃ ruśantaṃ vītī hotārandivyaṃ jigāti
analyzed: vṛścat vanam kṛṣṇa yāmam ruśantam vītī hotāran divyam jigāti

original: RV_06.006.02.1{08} sa śvitānastanyatū rocanasthā ajarebhirnānadadbhiryaviṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: sa śvitāna stanyatuḥ rocana sthāḥ ajarebhiḥ nānadadbhiḥ yaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_06.006.02.2{08} yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūnyagniranuyāti bharvan
analyzed: yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūni agniḥ anuyāti bharvan

original: RV_06.006.03.1{08} vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaścaranti
analyzed: vi te viṣvak vāta jūtāsaḥ agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaḥ caranti

original: RV_06.006.03.2{08} tuvimrakṣāso divyā navagvā vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ
analyzed: tuvi mrakṣāsaḥ divyāḥ navagvāḥ vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ

original: RV_06.006.04.1{08} ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ kṣāṃ vapanti viṣitāso aśvāḥ
analyzed: ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmas kṣām vapanti viṣitāsaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_06.006.04.2{08} adha bhramasta urviyā vi bhāti yātayamāno adhi sānu pṛśneḥ
analyzed: adha bhramastaḥ urviyā vi bhāti yātayamānaḥ adhi sānu pṛśneḥ

original: RV_06.006.05.1{08} adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇo goṣuyudho nāśaniḥ sṛjānā
analyzed: adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇaḥ goṣuyudhaḥ na aśaniḥ sṛjānā

original: RV_06.006.05.2{08} śūrasyeva prasitiḥ kṣātiragnerdurvarturbhīmo dayate vanāni
analyzed: śūrasya iva prasitiḥ kṣātiḥ agneḥ durvartuḥ bhīmaḥ dayate vanāni

original: RV_06.006.06.1{08} ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahastodasya dhṛṣatā tatantha
analyzed: ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahas todasya dhṛṣatā tatantha

original: RV_06.006.06.2{08} sa bādhasvāpa bhayā sahobhi spṛdho vanuṣyan vanuṣo ni jūrva
analyzed: sa bādhasva apa bhayā sahobhi spṛdhaḥ vanuṣyan vanuṣaḥ ni jūrva

original: RV_06.006.07.1{08} sa citra citraṃ citayantamasme citrakṣatra citratamaṃ vayodhām
analyzed: sa citra citram citayantam asme citra kṣatra citratamam vayaḥ dhām

original: RV_06.006.07.2{08} candraṃ rayiṃ puruvīraṃ bṛhantaṃ candra candrābhirgṛṇate yuvasva
analyzed: candram rayim puru vīram bṛhantam candra candrābhiḥ gṛṇate yuvasva

original: RV_06.007.01.1{09} mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātamagnim
analyzed: mūrdhānam divaḥ aratim pṛthivyāḥ vaiśvānaram ṛte ā jātam agnim

original: RV_06.007.01.2{09} kaviṃ samrājamatithiṃ janānāmāsannā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ
analyzed: kavim samrājam atithim janānām āsannā pātram janayanta devāḥ

original: RV_06.007.02.1{09} nābhiṃ yajñānāṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇāṃ mahāmāhāvamabhisaṃ navanta
analyzed: nābhim yajñānām sadanam rayīṇām mahā māhāvam abhisam navanta

original: RV_06.007.02.2{09} vaiśvānaraṃ rathyamadhvarāṇāṃ yajñasya ketuṃ janayanta devāḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānaram rathyam adhvarāṇām yajñasya ketum janayanta devāḥ

original: RV_06.007.03.1{09} tvad vipro jāyate vājyagne tvad vīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ
analyzed: tvat vipraḥ jāyate vājī agne tvat vīrāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_06.007.03.2{09} vaiśvānara tvamasmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi
analyzed: vaiśvānara tvam asmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi

original: RV_06.007.04.1{09} tvāṃ viśve amṛta jāyamānaṃ śiśuṃ na devā abhi saṃ navante
analyzed: tvām viśve amṛta jāyamānam śiśum na devāḥ abhi sam navante

original: RV_06.007.04.2{09} tava kratubhiramṛtatvamāyan vaiśvānara yat pitroradīdeḥ
analyzed: tava kratubhiḥ amṛta tvam āyan vaiśvānara yat pitroḥ adīdeḥ

original: RV_06.007.05.1{09} vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahānyagne nakirā dadharṣa
analyzed: vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahāni agne nakirā dadharṣa

original: RV_06.007.05.2{09} yajjāyamānaḥ pitrorupasthe 'vindaḥ ketuṃ vayuneṣvahnām
analyzed: yat jāyamānaḥ pitroḥ upasthe vindaḥ ketum vayuneṣu ahnām

original: RV_06.007.06.1{09} vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divo amṛtasya ketunā
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divaḥ amṛtasya ketunā

original: RV_06.007.06.2{09} tasyedu viśvā bhuvanādhi mūrdhani vayā iva ruruhuḥsapta visruhaḥ
analyzed: tasya idu viśvā bhuvanā adhi mūrdhani vayāḥ iva ruruhuḥ sapta visruhaḥ

original: RV_06.007.07.1{09} vi yo rajāṃsyamimīta sukraturvaiśvānaro vi divo rocanā kaviḥ
analyzed: vi yaḥ rajāṃsi amimīta sukratuḥ vaiśvānaraḥ vi divaḥ rocanā kaviḥ

original: RV_06.007.07.2{09} pari yo viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe 'dabdho gopā amṛtasya rakṣitā
analyzed: pari yaḥ viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe dabdhaḥ gopāḥ amṛtasya rakṣitā

original: RV_06.008.01.1{10} pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇo aruṣasya nū sahaḥ pra nu vocaṃ vidathājātavedasaḥ
analyzed: pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ aruṣasya nu sahaḥ pra nu vocam vidathā jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_06.008.01.2{10} vaiśvānarāya matirnavyasī śuciḥ soma ivapavate cāruragnaye
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya matiḥ navyasī śuciḥ somaḥ iva pavate cāruḥ agnaye

original: RV_06.008.02.1{10} sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratānyagnirvratapā arakṣata
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāni agniḥ vrata pāḥ arakṣata

original: RV_06.008.02.2{10} vyantarikṣamamimīta sukraturvaiśvānaro mahinā nākamaspṛśat
analyzed: vi antarikṣam amimīta sukratuḥ vaiśvānaraḥ mahinā nākam aspṛśat

original: RV_06.008.03.1{10} vyastabhnād rodasī mitro adbhuto 'ntarvāvadakṛṇojjyotiṣā tamaḥ
analyzed: vyastabhnāt rodasī mitraḥ adbhutaḥ ntar vāva akṛṇot jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_06.008.03.2{10} vi carmaṇīva dhiṣaṇe avartayad vaiśvānaro viśvamadhatta vṛṣṇyam
analyzed: vi carmaṇī iva dhiṣaṇe avartayat vaiśvānaraḥ viśvam adhatta vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_06.008.04.1{10} apāmupasthe mahiṣā agṛbhṇata viśo rājānamupa tasthurṛgmiyam
analyzed: apām upasthe mahiṣāḥ agṛbhṇata viśaḥ rājānam upa tasthuḥ ṛgmiyam

original: RV_06.008.04.2{10} ā dūto agnimabharad vivasvato vaiśvānaraṃ mātariśvā parāvataḥ
analyzed: ā dūtaḥ agnim abharat vivasvataḥ vaiśvānaram mātariśvā parāvataḥ

original: RV_06.008.05.1{10} yuge-yuge vidathyaṃ gṛṇadbhyo 'gne rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehi navyasīm
analyzed: yuge yuge vidathyam gṛṇadbhyaḥ gne rayim yaśasam dhehi navyasīm

original: RV_06.008.05.2{10} pavyeva rājannaghaśaṃsamajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninaṃ na tejasā
analyzed: pavyā iva rājan agha śaṃsam ajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninam na tejasā

original: RV_06.008.06.1{10} asmākamagne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatramajaraṃ suvīryam
analyzed: asmākam agne maghavatsu dhāraya anāmi kṣatram ajaram su vīryam

original: RV_06.008.06.2{10} vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājamagne tavotibhiḥ
analyzed: vayam jayema śatinam sahasriṇam vaiśvānara vājam agne tava ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_06.008.07.1{10} adabdhebhistava gopābhiriṣṭe 'smākaṃ pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ tava gopābhiḥ iṣṭe smākam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn

original: RV_06.008.07.2{10} rakṣā ca no daduṣāṃ śardho agne vaiśvānara pra catārī stavānaḥ
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ daduṣām śardhaḥ agne vaiśvānara pra catārī stavānaḥ

original: RV_06.009.01.1{11} ahaśca kṛṣṇamahararjunaṃ ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ
analyzed: ahar ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunam ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ

original: RV_06.009.01.2{11} vaiśvānaro jāyamāno na rājāvātirajjyotiṣāgnistamāṃsi
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ jāyamānaḥ na rājā avātirat jyotiṣā agniḥ tamāṃsi

original: RV_06.009.02.1{11} nāhaṃ tantuṃ na vi jānāmyotuṃ na yaṃ vayanti samare'tamānāḥ
analyzed: na aham tantum na vi jānāmi otum na yam vayanti sama retamānāḥ

original: RV_06.009.02.2{11} kasya svit putra iha vaktvāni paro vadātyavareṇa pitrā
analyzed: kasya svid putraḥ iha vaktvāni paraḥ vadāti avareṇa pitrā

original: RV_06.009.03.1{11} sa it tantuṃ sa vi jānātyotuṃ sa vaktvāny ṛtuthā vadāti
analyzed: saḥ id tantum sa vi jānāti otum sa vaktvāni ṛtuthā vadāti

original: RV_06.009.03.2{11} ya īṃ ciketadamṛtasya gopā avaścaran paro anyena paśyan
analyzed: yaḥ īm ciketat amṛtasya gopāḥ avas caran paras anyena paśyan

original: RV_06.009.04.1{11} ayaṃ hotā prathamaḥ paśyatemamidaṃ jyotiramṛtaṃ martyeṣu
analyzed: ayam hotā prathamaḥ paśyata imam idam jyotiḥ amṛtam martyeṣu

original: RV_06.009.04.2{11} ayaṃ sa jajñe dhruva ā niṣatto 'martyastanvā vardhamānaḥ
analyzed: ayam sa jajñe dhruvaḥ ā niṣattaḥ martyaḥ tanvā vardhamānaḥ

original: RV_06.009.05.1{11} dhruvaṃ jyotirnihitaṃ dṛśaye kaṃ mano javiṣṭhaṃ patayatsvantaḥ
analyzed: dhruvam jyotiḥ nihitam dṛśaye kam manaḥ javiṣṭham patayatsu antar

original: RV_06.009.05.2{11} viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ saketā ekaṃ kratumabhivi yanti sādhu
analyzed: viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ sa ketāḥ ekam kratum abhivi yanti sādhu

original: RV_06.009.06.1{11} vi me karṇā patayato vi cakṣurvīdaṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat
analyzed: vi me karṇā patayataḥ vi cakṣuḥ vi idam jyotiḥ hṛdaye āhitam yat

original: RV_06.009.06.2{11} vi me manaścarati dūraādhīḥ kiṃ svid vakṣyāmikimu nū maniṣye
analyzed: vi me manaḥ carati dūra ādhīḥ kim svid vakṣyāmi kimu nu maniṣye

original: RV_06.009.07.1{11} viśve devā anamasyan bhiyānāstvāmagne tamasi tasthivāṃsam
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anamasyan bhiyānāḥ tvām agne tamasi tasthivāṃsam

original: RV_06.009.07.2{11} vaiśvānaro 'vatūtaye no 'martyo 'vatūtaye naḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ vatu ūtaye naḥ martyaḥ vatu ūtaye naḥ

original: RV_06.010.01.1{12} puro vo mandraṃ divyaṃ suvṛktiṃ prayati yajñe agnimadhvaredadhidhvam
analyzed: puras vaḥ mandram divyam suvṛktim prayati yajñe agnim adhvaredadhidhvam

original: RV_06.010.01.2{12} pura ukthebhiḥ sa hi no vibhāvā svadhvarā karati jātavedāḥ
analyzed: puras ukthebhiḥ sa hi naḥ vibhāvā su adhvarā karati jātavedāḥ

original: RV_06.010.02.1{12} tamu dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotaragne agnibhirmanuṣa idhānaḥ
analyzed: tam u dyumas purvaṇīka hotar agne agnibhiḥ manuṣaḥ idhānaḥ

original: RV_06.010.02.2{12} stomaṃ yamasmai mamateva śūṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ na śuci matayaḥ pavante
analyzed: stomam yam asmai śūṣam ghṛtam na śuci matayaḥ pavante

original: RV_06.010.03.1{12} pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yo agnaye dadāśa vipra ukthaiḥ
analyzed: pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yaḥ agnaye dadāśa vipraḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_06.010.03.2{12} citrābhistamūtibhiścitraśocirvrajasya sātā gomato dadhāti
analyzed: citrābhiḥ tam ūtibhiḥ citra śociḥ vrajasya sātā gomataḥ dadhāti

original: RV_06.010.04.1{12} ā yaḥ paprau jāyamāna urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇādhvā
analyzed: ā yaḥ paprau jāyamānaḥ urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇa adhvā

original: RV_06.010.04.2{12} adha bahu cit tama ūrmyāyāstiraḥ śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ
analyzed: adha bahu cit tamaḥ ūrmyāyāḥ tiras śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ

original: RV_06.010.05.1{12} nū naścitraṃ puruvājābhirūtī agne rayiṃ maghavadbhyaśca dhehi
analyzed: nu naḥ citram puru vāja abhirūtī agne rayim maghavadbhyaḥ ca dhehi

original: RV_06.010.05.2{12} ye rādhasā śravasā cātyanyān suvīryebhiścābhi santi janān
analyzed: ye rādhasā śravasā ca ati anyān su vīryebhiḥ ca abhi santi janān

original: RV_06.010.06.1{12} imaṃ yajñaṃ cano dhā agna uśan yaṃ ta āsāno juhute haviṣmān
analyzed: imam yajñam canaḥ dhāḥ agne uśan yam te āsānaḥ juhute haviṣmān

original: RV_06.010.06.2{12} bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktimavīrvājasya gadhyasya sātau
analyzed: bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktim avīḥ vājasya gadhyasya sātau

original: RV_06.010.07.1{12} vi dveṣāṃsīnuhi vardhayeḷāṃ madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: vi vardhaya iḷām madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.011.01.1{13} yajasva hotariṣito yajīyānagne bādho marutāṃ na prayukti
analyzed: yajasva hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān agne bādhaḥ marutām na prayukti

original: RV_06.011.01.2{13} ā no mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_06.011.02.1{13} tvaṃ hotā mandratamo no adhrugantardevo vidathā martyeṣu
analyzed: tvam hotā mandratamaḥ naḥ adhruk antar devaḥ vidathā martyeṣu

original: RV_06.011.02.2{13} pāvakayā juhvā vahnirāsāgne yajasva tanvaṃ tava svām
analyzed: pāvakayā juhvā vahni rāsā agne yajasva tanvam tava svām

original: RV_06.011.03.1{13} dhanyā cid dhi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devāñ janma gṛṇate yajadhyai
analyzed: dhanyā cit hi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devām janma gṛṇate yajadhyai

original: RV_06.011.03.2{13} vepiṣṭho aṅgirasāṃ yad dha vipro madhu chando bhanati rebha iṣṭau
analyzed: vepiṣṭhaḥ aṅgirasām yat ha vipraḥ madhu chandaḥ bhanati rebhaḥ iṣṭau

original: RV_06.011.04.1{13} adidyutat svapāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī
analyzed: adidyutat svapākaḥ vibhāvā agne yajasva rodasī urūcī

original: RV_06.011.04.2{13} āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasaṃ pañca janāḥ
analyzed: āyum na yam namasā rāta havyāḥ añjanti su prayasam pañca janāḥ

original: RV_06.011.05.1{13} vṛñje ha yan namasā barhiragnāvayāmi srug ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ
analyzed: vṛñje ha yat namasā barhiḥ agnau ayāmi sruc ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ

original: RV_06.011.05.2{13} amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyā aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ
analyzed: amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyāḥ aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ

original: RV_06.011.06.1{13} daśasyā naḥ purvaṇīka hotardevebhiragne agnibhiridhānaḥ
analyzed: daśasya naḥ purvaṇīka hotar devebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ idhānaḥ

original: RV_06.011.06.2{13} rāyaḥ sūno sahaso vāvasānā ati srasema vṛjanaṃ nāṃhaḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ sūno sahasaḥ vāvasānāḥ ati srasema vṛjanam nā aṃhaḥ

original: RV_06.012.01.1{14} madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣo rāḷ agnistodasya rodasī yajadhyai
analyzed: madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣaḥ rāj agniḥ todasya rodasī yajadhyai

original: RV_06.012.01.2{14} ayaṃ sa sūnuḥ sahasa ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryo na śociṣā tatāna
analyzed: ayam sa sūnuḥ sahasaḥ ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryaḥ na śociṣā tatāna

original: RV_06.012.02.1{14} ā yasmin tve svapāke yajatra yakṣad rājan sarvatāteva nudyauḥ
analyzed: ā yasmin tve sva pāke yajatra yakṣat rājan sarvatātā iva nudyauḥ

original: RV_06.012.02.2{14} triṣadhasthastataruṣo na jaṃho havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai
analyzed: triṣadhasthaḥ tataruṣaḥ na jaṃhaḥ havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai

original: RV_06.012.03.1{14} tejiṣṭhā yasyāratirvanerāṭ todo adhvan na vṛdhasāno adyaut
analyzed: tejiṣṭhā yasya aratiḥ vanerāj todaḥ adhvan na vṛdhasānaḥ adyaut

original: RV_06.012.03.2{14} adrogho na dravitā cetati tmannamartyo 'vartra oṣadhīṣu
analyzed: adroghaḥ na dravitā cetati tman amartyaḥ vartre oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_06.012.04.1{14} sāsmākebhiretarī na śūṣairagni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ
analyzed: sā asmākebhiḥ etarī na śūṣaiḥ agni stave dame ā jātavedāḥ

original: RV_06.012.04.2{14} drvanno vanvan kratvā nārvosraḥ piteva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ
analyzed: dru annaḥ vanvan kratvā na arva usraḥ pitā iva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.012.05.1{14} adha smāsya panayanti bhāso vṛthā yat takṣadanuyāti pṛthvīm
analyzed: adha sma asya panayanti bhāsaḥ vṛthā yat takṣat anuyāti pṛthvīm

original: RV_06.012.05.2{14} sadyo yaḥ syandro viṣito dhavīyān ṛṇo na tāyurati dhanvā rāṭ
analyzed: sadyas yaḥ syandraḥ viṣitaḥ dhavīyān ṛṇaḥ na tāyuḥ ati dhanvā rāj

original: RV_06.012.06.1{14} sa tvaṃ no arvan nidāyā viśvebhiragne agnibhiridhānaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ arvan nidāyāḥ viśvebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ idhānaḥ

original: RV_06.012.06.2{14} veṣi rāyo vi yāsi duchunā madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: veṣi rāyaḥ vi yāsi duchunāḥ madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.013.01.1{15} tvad viśvā subhaga saubhagānyagne vi yanti vanino na vayāḥ
analyzed: tvat viśvā subhaga saubhagāni agne vi yanti vaninaḥ na vayāḥ

original: RV_06.013.01.2{15} śruṣṭī rayirvājo vṛtratūrye divo vṛṣṭirīḍyo rītirapām
analyzed: śruṣṭiḥ rayiḥ vājaḥ vṛtratūrye divaḥ vṛṣṭiḥ īḍyaḥ rītiḥ apām

original: RV_06.013.02.1{15} tvaṃ bhago na ā hi ratnamiṣe parijmeva kṣayasi dasmavarcāḥ
analyzed: tvam bhagaḥ naḥ ā hi ratnam iṣe parijmā iva kṣayasi dasma varcāḥ

original: RV_06.013.02.2{15} agne mitro na bṛhata ṛtasyāsi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ
analyzed: agne mitraḥ na bṛhataḥ ṛtasya asi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ

original: RV_06.013.03.1{15} sa satpatiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtramagne vipro vi paṇerbhartivājam
analyzed: sa sat patiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram agne vipraḥ vi paṇeḥ bharti vājam

original: RV_06.013.03.2{15} yaṃ tvaṃ praceta ṛtajāta rāyā sajoṣā naptrāpāṃ hinoṣi
analyzed: yam tvam pracetaḥ ṛta jāta rāyā sajoṣāḥ naptrā apām hinoṣi

original: RV_06.013.04.1{15} yaste sūno sahaso gīrbhirukthairyajñairmarto niśitiṃ vedyānaṭ
analyzed: yaḥ te sūno sahasaḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ yajñaiḥ martaḥ niśitim vedyā anaṭ

original: RV_06.013.04.2{15} viśvaṃ sa deva prati vāramagne dhatte dhānyaṃ patyate vasavyaiḥ
analyzed: viśvam sa deva prati vāram agne dhatte dhānyam patyate vasavyaiḥ

original: RV_06.013.05.1{15} tā nṛbhya ā sauśravasā suvīrāgne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyasedhāḥ
analyzed: tā nṛbhyaḥ ā sauśravasā su vīrā agne sūno sahasaḥ puṣya sedhāḥ

original: RV_06.013.05.2{15} kṛṇoṣi yacchavasā bhūri paśvo vayo vṛkāyārayejasuraye
analyzed: kṛṇoṣi yat śavasā bhūri paśvaḥ vayaḥ vṛkāya arayejasuraye

original: RV_06.013.06.1{15} vadmā sūno sahaso no vihāyā agne tokaṃ tanayaṃ vāji no dāḥ
analyzed: vadmā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ vihāyāḥ agne tokam tanayam vāji naḥ dāḥ

original: RV_06.013.06.2{15} viśvābhirgīrbhirabhi pūrtimaśyāṃ madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ abhi pūrtim aśyām madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.014.01.1{16} agnā yo martyo duvo dhiyaṃ jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: agnā yaḥ martyaḥ duvaḥ dhiyam jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_06.014.01.2{16} bhasan nuṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase
analyzed: bhasan pra pūrvyaḥ iṣam vurīta avase

original: RV_06.014.02.1{16} agnirid dhi pracetā agnirvedhastama ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: agniḥ id hi pracetāḥ agniḥ vedhastamaḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_06.014.02.2{16} agniṃ hotāramīḷate yajñeṣu manuṣo viśaḥ
analyzed: agnim hotāram īḍate yajñeṣu manuṣaḥ viśaḥ

original: RV_06.014.03.1{16} nānā hyagne 'vase spardhante rāyo aryaḥ
analyzed: nānā hi agne vase spardhante rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_06.014.03.2{16} tūrvanto dasyumāyavo vrataiḥ sīkṣanto avratam
analyzed: tūrvantaḥ dasyu māyavaḥ vrataiḥ sīkṣantaḥ avratam

original: RV_06.014.04.1{16} agnirapsām ṛtīṣahaṃ vīraṃ dadāti satpatim
analyzed: agniḥ ap sām ṛtīṣaham vīram dadāti sat patim

original: RV_06.014.04.2{16} yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravo bhiyā
analyzed: yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravaḥ bhiyā

original: RV_06.014.05.1{16} agnirhi vidmanā nido devo martamuruṣyati
analyzed: agniḥ hi vidmanā nidaḥ devaḥ martam uruṣyati

original: RV_06.014.05.2{16} sahāvā yasyāvṛto rayirvājeṣvavṛtaḥ
analyzed: sahāvā yasya avṛtaḥ rayiḥ vājeṣu avṛtaḥ

original: RV_06.014.06.1{16} achā no mitramaho ...
analyzed: achā naḥ mitra mahas

original: RV_06.015.01.1{17} imamū ṣu vo atithimuṣarbudhaṃ viśvāsāṃ viśāṃ patimṛñjase girā
analyzed: imam u su vaḥ atithim uṣarbudham viśvāsām viśām patim ṛñjase girā

original: RV_06.015.01.2{17} vetīd divo januṣā kaccidā śucirjyok cidatti garbho yadacyutam
analyzed: veti id divaḥ januṣā kaccidā śuciḥ jyok cit atti garbhaḥ yat acyutam

original: RV_06.015.02.1{17} mitraṃ na yaṃ sudhitaṃ bhṛgavo dadhurvanaspatāvīḍyamūrdhvaśociṣam
analyzed: mitram na yam sudhitam bhṛgavaḥ vanaspatā vīḍyam ūrdhva śociṣam

original: RV_06.015.02.2{17} sa tvaṃ suprīto vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhirmahayase dive dive
analyzed: sa tvam su prītaḥ vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhiḥ mahayase dive dive

original: RV_06.015.03.1{17} sa tvaṃ dakṣasyāvṛko vṛdho bhūraryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam dakṣasya avṛkaḥ vṛdhaḥ bhūḥ aryaḥ parasya antarasya taruṣaḥ

original: RV_06.015.03.2{17} rāyaḥ sūno sahaso martyeṣvā chardiryacha vītahavyāya sapratho bharadvājāya saprathaḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ sūno sahasaḥ martya iṣvā chardiḥ yaccha vītahavyāya saprathaḥ bharadvājāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_06.015.04.1{17} dyutānaṃ vo atithiṃ svarṇaramagniṃ hotāraṃ manuṣaḥ svadhvaram
analyzed: dyutānam vaḥ atithim svarṇaram agnim hotāram manuṣaḥ su adhvaram

original: RV_06.015.04.2{17} vipraṃ na dyukṣavacasaṃ suvṛktibhirhavyavāhamaratiṃ devam ṛñjase
analyzed: vipram na dyukṣa vacasam suvṛktibhiḥ havyavāham aratim devam ṛñjase

original: RV_06.015.05.1{17} pāvakayā yaścitayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na bhānunā
analyzed: pāvakayā yaḥ citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruce uṣasaḥ na bhānunā

original: RV_06.015.05.2{17} tūrvan na yāmannetaśasya nū raṇa ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaraḥ
analyzed: tūrvan na yāman etaśasya nu raṇe ā yaḥ ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇaḥ ajaraḥ

original: RV_06.015.06.1{18} agnim-agniṃ vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam-priyaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi
analyzed: agnim agnim vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam priyam vaḥ atithim gṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_06.015.06.2{18} upa vo gīrbhiramṛtaṃ vivāsata devo deveṣu vanate hi vāryaṃ devo deveṣu vanate hi no duvaḥ
analyzed: upa vaḥ gīrbhiḥ amṛtam vivāsata devaḥ deveṣu vanate hi vāryam devaḥ deveṣu vanate hi naḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_06.015.07.1{18} samiddhamagniṃ samidhā girā gṛṇe śuciṃ pāvakaṃ puro adhvare dhruvam
analyzed: samiddham agnim samidhā girā gṛṇe śucim pāvakam puras adhvare dhruvam

original: RV_06.015.07.2{18} vipraṃ hotāraṃ puruvāramadruhaṃ kaviṃ sumnairīmahe jātavedasam
analyzed: vipram hotāram puru vāram adruham kavim sumnaiḥ īmahe jātavedasam

original: RV_06.015.08.1{18} tvāṃ dūtamagne amṛtaṃ yuge-yuge havyavāhaṃ dadhire pāyumīḍyam
analyzed: tvām dūtam agne amṛtam yuge yuge havyavāham dadhire pāyum īḍyam

original: RV_06.015.08.2{18} devāsaśca martāsaśca jāgṛviṃ vibhuṃ viśpatiṃ namasā ni ṣedire
analyzed: devāsaḥ ca martāsaḥ ca jāgṛvim vibhum viśpatim namasā ni sedire

original: RV_06.015.09.1{18} vibhūṣannagna ubhayānanu vratā dūto devānāṃ rajasī samīyase
analyzed: vibhūṣan agne ubhayān anu vratā dūtaḥ devānām rajasī samīyase

original: RV_06.015.09.2{18} yat te dhītiṃ sumatimāvṛṇīmahe 'dha smā nastrivarūthaḥ śivo bhava
analyzed: yat te dhītim sumatim āvṛṇīmahe smā naḥ tri varūthaḥ śivaḥ bhava

original: RV_06.015.10.1{18} taṃ supratīkaṃ sudṛśaṃ svañcamavidvāṃso viduṣṭaraṃ sapema
analyzed: tam su pratīkam sudṛśam svañcam avidvāṃsaḥ viduṣṭaram sapema

original: RV_06.015.10.2{18} sa yakṣad viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyamagniramṛteṣu vocat
analyzed: sa yakṣat viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyam agniḥ amṛteṣu vocat

original: RV_06.015.11.1{19} tamagne pāsyuta taṃ piparṣi yasta ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim
analyzed: tam agne pāsi uta tam piparṣi yaḥ te ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim

original: RV_06.015.11.2{19} yajñasya vā niśitiṃ voditiṃ vā tamit pṛṇakṣi śavasota rāyā
analyzed: yajñasya vā niśitim vā uditim vā tam id pṛṇakṣi śavasā uta rāyā

original: RV_06.015.12.1{19} tvamagne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvamu naḥ sahasāvannavadyāt
analyzed: tvam agne vanuṣyataḥ ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvan annavadyāt

original: RV_06.015.12.2{19} saṃ tvā dhvasmanvadabhyetu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥsahasrī
analyzed: sam tvā dhvasmanvat abhyetu pāthaḥ sam rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī

original: RV_06.015.13.1{19} agnirhotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedaḥ

original: RV_06.015.13.2{19} devānāmuta yo martyānāṃ yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā
analyzed: devānām uta yaḥ martyānām yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā

original: RV_06.015.14.1{19} agne yadadya viśo adhvarasya hotaḥ pāvakaśoce veṣ ṭvaṃ hi yajvā
analyzed: agne yat adya viśaḥ adhvarasya hotar pāvaka śoce veḥ tvam hi yajvā

original: RV_06.015.14.2{19} ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yad bhūrhavyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya
analyzed: ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yat bhūḥ havyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya

original: RV_06.015.15.1{19} abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyo ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai
analyzed: abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyaḥ ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai

original: RV_06.015.15.2{19} avā no maghavan vājasātāvagne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema
analyzed: avāḥ naḥ maghavan vājasātau agne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tava avasā tarema

original: RV_06.015.16.1{20} agne viśvebhiḥ svanīka devairūrṇāvantaṃ prathamaḥ sīda yonim
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ su anīka devaiḥ ūrṇāvantam prathamaḥ sīda yonim

original: RV_06.015.16.2{20} kulāyinaṃ ghṛtavantaṃ savitre yajñaṃ naya yajamānāya sādhu
analyzed: kulāyinam ghṛtavantam savitre yajñam naya yajamānāya sādhu

original: RV_06.015.17.1{20} imamu tyamatharvavadagniṃ manthanti vedhasaḥ
analyzed: imam u tyam atharva vat agnim manthanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_06.015.17.2{20} yamaṅkūyantamānayannamūraṃ śyāvyābhyaḥ
analyzed: yam aṅkūyantam ānayan amūram śyāvyābhyaḥ

original: RV_06.015.18.1{20} janiṣvā devavītaye sarvatātā svastaye
analyzed: janiṣva deva vītaye sarvatātā svastaye

original: RV_06.015.18.2{20} ā devān vakṣyamṛtān ṛtāvṛdho yajñaṃ deveṣu pispṛśaḥ
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi amṛtān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ yajñam deveṣu pispṛśaḥ

original: RV_06.015.19.1{20} vayamu tvā gṛhapate janānāmagne akarma samidhā bṛhantam
analyzed: vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam

original: RV_06.015.19.2{20} asthūri no gārhapatyāni santu tigmena nastejasā saṃ śiśādhi
analyzed: asthūri naḥ gārhapatyāni santu tigmena naḥ tejasā sam śiśādhi

original: RV_06.016.01.1{21} tvamagne yajñānāṃ hotā viśveṣāṃ hitaḥ
analyzed: tvam agne yajñānām hotā viśveṣām hitaḥ

original: RV_06.016.01.2{21} devebhirmānuṣe jane
analyzed: devebhiḥ mānuṣe jane

original: RV_06.016.02.1{21} sa no mandrābhiradhvare jihvābhiryajā mahaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ mandrābhiḥ adhvare jihvābhiḥ yaja mahaḥ

original: RV_06.016.02.2{21} ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_06.016.03.1{21} vetthā hi vedho adhvanaḥ pathaśca devāñjasā
analyzed: vettha hi vedhaḥ adhvanaḥ pathaḥ ca deva añjasā

original: RV_06.016.03.2{21} agne yajñeṣu sukrato
analyzed: agne yajñeṣu sukrato

original: RV_06.016.04.1{21} tvāmīḷe adha dvitā bharato vājibhiḥ śunam
analyzed: tvām īḍe adha dvitā bharataḥ vājibhiḥ śunam

original: RV_06.016.04.2{21} īje yajñeayat divi
analyzed: īje yajñeayat divi

original: RV_06.016.05.1{21} tvamimā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate
analyzed: tvam imā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate

original: RV_06.016.05.2{21} bharadvājāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: bharadvājāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_06.016.06.1{22} tvaṃ dūto amartya ā vahā daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: tvam dūtaḥ amartyaḥ ā vaha daivyam janam

original: RV_06.016.06.2{22} śṛṇvan viprasya suṣṭutim
analyzed: śṛṇvan viprasya suṣṭutim

original: RV_06.016.07.1{22} tvāmagne svādhyo martāso deva vītaye
analyzed: tvām agne su ādhyaḥ martāsaḥ deva vītaye

original: RV_06.016.07.2{22} yajñeṣu devamīḷate
analyzed: yajñeṣu devam īḍate

original: RV_06.016.08.1{22} tava pra yakṣi sandṛśamuta kratuṃ sudānavaḥ
analyzed: tava pra yakṣi sandṛśam uta kratum sudānavaḥ

original: RV_06.016.08.2{22} viśve juṣanta kāminaḥ
analyzed: viśve juṣanta kāminaḥ

original: RV_06.016.09.1{22} tvaṃ hotā manurhito vahnirāsā viduṣṭaraḥ
analyzed: tvam hotā manuḥ hitaḥ vahni rāsāḥ viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_06.016.09.2{22} agne yakṣidivo viśaḥ
analyzed: agne yakṣidivaḥ viśaḥ

original: RV_06.016.10.1{22} agna ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇāno havyadātaye
analyzed: agne ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇānaḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_06.016.10.2{22} ni hotā satsi barhiṣi
analyzed: ni hotā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_06.016.11.1{23} taṃ tvā samidbhiraṅgiro ghṛtena vardhayāmasi
analyzed: tam tvā samidbhiḥ aṅgiraḥ ghṛtena vardhayāmasi

original: RV_06.016.11.2{23} bṛhacchocā yaviṣṭhya
analyzed: bṛhat śoca yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_06.016.12.1{23} sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyamachā deva vivāsasi
analyzed: sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyam achā deva vivāsasi

original: RV_06.016.12.2{23} bṛhadagne suvīryam
analyzed: bṛhat agne su vīryam

original: RV_06.016.13.1{23} tvāmagne puṣkarādadhyatharvā niramanthata
analyzed: tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niramanthata

original: RV_06.016.13.2{23} mūrdhno viśvasya vāghataḥ
analyzed: mūrdhnaḥ viśvasya vāghataḥ

original: RV_06.016.14.1{23} tamu tvā dadhyaṃm ṛṣiḥ putra īdhe atharvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tam u tvā dadhyam ṛṣiḥ putraḥ īdhe atharvaṇaḥ

original: RV_06.016.14.2{23} vṛtrahaṇaṃ purandaram
analyzed: vṛtra haṇam purandaram

original: RV_06.016.15.1{23} tamu tvā pāthyo vṛṣā samīdhe dasyuhantamam
analyzed: tam u tvā pāthyaḥ vṛṣā samīdhe dasyu hantamam

original: RV_06.016.15.2{23} dhanaṃjayaṃ raṇe-raṇe
analyzed: dhanaṃjayam raṇeraṇe

original: RV_06.016.16.1{24} ehyū ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ
analyzed: ehi u su bravāṇi te gne itthā itarāḥ giraḥ

original: RV_06.016.16.2{24} ebhirvardhāsa indubhiḥ
analyzed: ebhiḥ vardhāse indubhiḥ

original: RV_06.016.17.1{24} yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram
analyzed: yatra kva ca te manaḥ dakṣam dadhase uttaram

original: RV_06.016.17.2{24} tatrā sadaḥ kṛṇavase
analyzed: tatra sadaḥ kṛṇavase

original: RV_06.016.18.1{24} nahi te pūrtamakṣipad bhuvan nemānāṃ vaso
analyzed: nahi te pūrtam akṣipat bhuvat nemānām vaso

original: RV_06.016.18.2{24} athā duvo vanavase
analyzed: athā duvaḥ vanavase

original: RV_06.016.19.1{24} āgniragāmi bhārato vṛtrahā purucetanaḥ
analyzed: ā agniḥ agāmi bhārataḥ vṛtra hā puru cetanaḥ

original: RV_06.016.19.2{24} divodāsasya satpatiḥ
analyzed: divodāsasya satpatiḥ

original: RV_06.016.20.1{24} sa hi viśvāti pārthivā rayiṃ dāśan mahitvanā
analyzed: sa hi viśvā ati pārthivā rayim dāśat mahitvanā

original: RV_06.016.20.2{24} vanvannavāto astṛtaḥ
analyzed: vanvan avātaḥ astṛtaḥ

original: RV_06.016.21.1{25} sa pratnavan navīyasāgne dyumnena saṃyatā
analyzed: sa pratna vat navīyasā agne dyumnena saṃyatā

original: RV_06.016.21.2{25} bṛhat tatanthabhānunā
analyzed: bṛhat tatantha bhānunā

original: RV_06.016.22.1{25} pra vaḥ sakhāyo agnaye stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: pra vaḥ sakhāyaḥ agnaye stomam yajñam ca dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_06.016.22.2{25} arcagāya ca vedhase
analyzed: arcagāya ca vedhase

original: RV_06.016.23.1{25} sa hi yo mānuṣā yugā sīdad dhotā kavikratuḥ
analyzed: sa hi yaḥ mānuṣā yugā sīdat hotā kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_06.016.23.2{25} dūtaśca havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: dūtaḥ ca havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_06.016.24.1{25} tā rājānā śucivratādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam
analyzed: tā rājānā śuci vratā ādityān mārutam gaṇam

original: RV_06.016.24.2{25} vaso yakṣīha rodasī
analyzed: vaso yakṣi iha rodasī

original: RV_06.016.25.1{25} vasvī te agne sandṛṣṭiriṣayate martyāya
analyzed: vasvī te agne san dṛṣṭiḥ iṣayate martyāya

original: RV_06.016.25.2{25} ūrjo napādamṛtasya
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtasya

original: RV_06.016.26.1{26} kratvā dā astu śreṣṭho 'dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ
analyzed: kratvā dāḥ astu śreṣṭhaḥ dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ

original: RV_06.016.26.2{26} marta ānāśa suvṛktim
analyzed: martaḥ ānāśa suvṛktim

original: RV_06.016.27.1{26} te te agne tvotā iṣayanto viśvamāyuḥ
analyzed: te te agne tvotāḥ iṣayantaḥ viśvam āyuḥ

original: RV_06.016.27.2{26} taranto aryo arātīrvanvanto aryo arātīḥ
analyzed: tarantaḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ vanvantaḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ

original: RV_06.016.28.1{26} agnistigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ nyatriṇam
analyzed: agniḥ tigmena śociṣā yāsat viśvam nyatriṇam

original: RV_06.016.28.2{26} agnirnovanate rayim
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ vanate rayim

original: RV_06.016.29.1{26} suvīraṃ rayimā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe
analyzed: su vīram rayimā bhara jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_06.016.29.2{26} jahi rakṣāṃsi sukrato
analyzed: jahi rakṣāṃsi su krato

original: RV_06.016.30.1{26} tvaṃ naḥ pāhyaṃhaso jātavedo aghāyataḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ jātavedaḥ aghāyataḥ

original: RV_06.016.30.2{26} rakṣā ṇo brahmaṇas kave
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ brahmaṇaḥ kave

original: RV_06.016.31.1{27} yo no agne dureva ā marto vadhāya dāśati
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agne durevaḥ ā martaḥ vadhāya dāśati

original: RV_06.016.31.2{27} tasmān naḥ pāhyaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_06.016.32.1{27} tvaṃ taṃ deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam
analyzed: tvam tam deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam

original: RV_06.016.32.2{27} marto yo nojighāṃsati
analyzed: martaḥ yaḥ naḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_06.016.33.1{27} bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yacha sahantya
analyzed: bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya

original: RV_06.016.33.2{27} agne vareṇyaṃvasu
analyzed: agne vareṇyaṃvasu

original: RV_06.016.34.1{27} agnirvṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyurvipanyayā
analyzed: agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat draviṇasyuḥ vipanyayā

original: RV_06.016.34.2{27} samiddhaḥ śukra āhutaḥ
analyzed: samiddhaḥ śukraḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_06.016.35.1{27} garbhe mātuḥ pituṣ pitā vididyutāno akṣare
analyzed: garbhe mātuḥ pituḥ pitā vididyutānaḥ akṣare

original: RV_06.016.35.2{27} sīdannṛtasya yonimā
analyzed: sīdan ṛtasya yonimā

original: RV_06.016.36.1{28} brahma prajāvadā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe
analyzed: brahma prajāvat ā bhara jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_06.016.36.2{28} agne yad dīd ayad divi
analyzed: agne yat dīd ayat divi

original: RV_06.016.37.1{28} upa tvā raṇvasandṛśaṃ prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta
analyzed: upa tvā raṇva sandṛśam prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta

original: RV_06.016.37.2{28} agne sasṛjmahe giraḥ
analyzed: agne sasṛjmahe giraḥ

original: RV_06.016.38.1{28} upa chāyāmiva ghṛṇeraganma śarma te vayam
analyzed: upa chāyām iva ghṛṇeḥ aganma śarma te vayam

original: RV_06.016.38.2{28} agne hiraṇyasandṛśaḥ
analyzed: agne hiraṇya sandṛśaḥ

original: RV_06.016.39.1{28} ya ugra iva śaryahā tigmaśṛṅgo na vaṃsagaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ugraḥ iva śaryahā tigma śṛṅgaḥ na vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_06.016.39.2{28} agne puro rurojitha
analyzed: agne puraḥ rurojitha

original: RV_06.016.40.1{28} ā yaṃ haste na khādinaṃ śiśuṃ jātaṃ na bibhrati
analyzed: ā yam haste na khādinam śiśum jātam na bibhrati

original: RV_06.016.40.2{28} viśāmagniṃ svadhvaram
analyzed: viśām agnim su adhvaram

original: RV_06.016.41.1{29} pra devaṃ devavītaye bharatā vasuvittamam
analyzed: pra devam deva vītaye bharata vasu vittamam

original: RV_06.016.41.2{29} ā sve yonau ni ṣīdatu
analyzed: ā sve yonau ni sīdatu

original: RV_06.016.42.1{29} ā jātaṃ jātavedasi priyaṃ śiśītātithim
analyzed: ā jātam jātavedasi priyam śiśīta atithim

original: RV_06.016.42.2{29} syona ā gṛhapatim
analyzed: syone ā gṛhapatim

original: RV_06.016.43.1{29} agne yukṣvā hi ye tavāśvāso deva sādhavaḥ
analyzed: agne yukṣvā hi ye tava āśvāsaḥ deva sādhavaḥ

original: RV_06.016.43.2{29} araṃ vahanti manyave
analyzed: aram vahanti manyave

original: RV_06.016.44.1{29} achā no yāhyā vahābhi prayāṃsi vītaye
analyzed: achā naḥ yāhi ā vaha abhi prayāṃsi vītaye

original: RV_06.016.44.2{29} ā devān somapītaye
analyzed: ā devān soma pītaye

original: RV_06.016.45.1{29} udagne bhārata dyumadajasreṇa davidyutat
analyzed: udagne bhārata dyumat ajasreṇa davidyutat

original: RV_06.016.45.2{29} śocā vi bhāhyajara
analyzed: vi bhāhi ajara

original: RV_06.016.46.1{30} vītī yo devaṃ marto duvasyedagnimīḷītādhvare haviṣmān
analyzed: vītī yaḥ devam martaḥ duvasyet agnim īḍīta adhvare haviṣmān

original: RV_06.016.46.2{30} hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoruttānahasto namasā vivāset
analyzed: hotāram satya yajam rodasyoḥ uttāna hastaḥ namasā vivāset

original: RV_06.016.47.1{30} ā te agna ṛcā havirhṛdā taṣṭaṃ bharāmasi
analyzed: ā te agne ṛcā haviḥ hṛdā taṣṭam bharāmasi

original: RV_06.016.47.2{30} te te bhavantūkṣaṇa ṛṣabhāso vaśā uta
analyzed: te te bhavantu ukṣaṇaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ vaśāḥ uta

original: RV_06.016.48.1{30} agniṃ devāso agriyamindhate vṛtrahantamam
analyzed: agnim devāsaḥ agriyam indhate vṛtra hantamam

original: RV_06.016.48.2{30} yenā vasūnyābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājināṣu yajñiyam
analyzed: yena vasūni ābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājināṣu yajñiyam

original: RV_06.017.01.1{01} pibā somamabhi yamugra tarda ūrvaṃ gavyaṃ mahi gṛṇānaindra
analyzed: pibā somam abhi yam ugra tardaḥ ūrvam gavyam mahi gṛṇāna aindra

original: RV_06.017.01.2{01} vi yo dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣo vajrahasta viśvā vṛtramamitriyā śavobhiḥ
analyzed: vi yaḥ dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣaḥ vajrahasta viśvā vṛtram amitriyā śavobhiḥ

original: RV_06.017.02.1{01} sa īṃ pāhi ya ṛjīṣī tarutro yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabho yo matīnām
analyzed: saḥ īm pāhi yaḥ ṛjīṣī tarutraḥ yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ matīnām

original: RV_06.017.02.2{01} yo gotrabhid vajrabhṛd yo hariṣṭhāḥ sa indra citrānabhi tṛndhi vājān
analyzed: yaḥ gotrabhid vajrabhṛt yaḥ hariṣṭhāḥ saḥ indra citrān abhi tṛndhi vājān

original: RV_06.017.03.1{01} evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasvotagīrbhiḥ
analyzed: evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasva uta gīrbhiḥ

original: RV_06.017.03.2{01} āviḥ sūryaṃ kṛṇuhi pīpihīṣo jahi śatrūnrabhi gā indra tṛndhi
analyzed: āvis sūryam kṛṇuhi pīpihi iṣaḥ jahi śatrūn rabhi gāḥ indra tṛndhi

original: RV_06.017.04.1{01} te tvā madā bṛhadindra svadhāva ime pītā ukṣayanta dyumantam
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ bṛhat indra svadhāvas ime pītāḥ ukṣayanta dyumantam

original: RV_06.017.04.2{01} mahāmanūnaṃ tavasaṃ vibhūtiṃ matsarāso jarhṛṣanta prasāham
analyzed: mahā manūnam tavasam vibhūtim matsarāsaḥ jarhṛṣanta prasāham

original: RV_06.017.05.1{01} yebhiḥ sūryamuṣasaṃ mandasāno 'vāsayo 'pa dṛlhāni dardrat
analyzed: yebhiḥ sūryam uṣasam mandasānaḥ vāsaya u pa dṛlhāni dardrat

original: RV_06.017.05.2{01} mahāmadriṃ pari gā indra santaṃ nutthā acyutaṃ sadasas pari svāt
analyzed: mahā madrim pari gāḥ indra santam nutthāḥ acyutam sadasaḥ pari svāt

original: RV_06.017.06.1{02} tava kratvā tava tad daṃsanābhirāmāsu pakvaṃ śacyā ni dīdhaḥ
analyzed: tava kratvā tava tat daṃsanā abhirāmāsu pakvam śacyā ni dīdhaḥ

original: RV_06.017.06.2{02} aurṇordura usriyābhyo vi dṛḷhodūrvād gā asṛjo aṅgirasvān
analyzed: aurṇa urduraḥ usriyābhyaḥ vi dṛḍhaḥ udūrvāt gāḥ asṛjaḥ aṅgirasvān

original: RV_06.017.07.1{02} paprātha kṣāṃ mahi daṇso vyurvīmupa dyām ṛṣvo bṛhadindra stabhāyaḥ
analyzed: paprātha kṣām mahi daṇsaḥ vi urvīm upa dyām ṛṣvaḥ bṛhat indra stabhāyaḥ

original: RV_06.017.07.2{02} adhārayo rodasī devaputre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya
analyzed: adhārayaḥ rodasī deva putre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya

original: RV_06.017.08.1{02} adha tvā viśve pura indra devā ekaṃ tavasaṃ dadhire bharāya
analyzed: adha tvā viśve puras indra devāḥ ekam tavasam dadhire bharāya

original: RV_06.017.08.2{02} adevo yadabhyauhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇata indramatra
analyzed: adevaḥ yat abhyauhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇate indram atra

original: RV_06.017.09.1{02} adha dyauścit te apa sā nu vajrād dvitānamad bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ
analyzed: adha dyauḥ cit te apa sā nu vajrāt dvitā anamat bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ

original: RV_06.017.09.2{02} ahiṃ yadindro abhyohasānaṃ ni cid viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna
analyzed: ahim yat indraḥ abhyohasānam ni cit viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna

original: RV_06.017.10.1{02} adha tvaṣṭā te maha ugra vajraṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ vavṛtacchatāśrim
analyzed: adha tvaṣṭā te mahaḥ ugra vajram sahasra bhṛṣṭim vavṛtat śata aśrim

original: RV_06.017.10.2{02} nikāmamaramaṇasaṃ yena navantamahiṃ saṃ piṇagṛjīṣin
analyzed: nikāmam aramaṇasam yena navantam ahim sam piṇak ṛjīṣin

original: RV_06.017.11.1{03} vardhān yaṃ viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacacchataṃ mahiṣānindra tubhyam
analyzed: vardhān yam viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacat śatam mahiṣān indra tubhyam

original: RV_06.017.11.2{03} pūṣā viṣṇustrīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtrahaṇaṃ madiramaṃśumasmai
analyzed: pūṣā viṣṇuḥ trīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtra haṇam madiram aṃśum asmai

original: RV_06.017.12.1{03} ā kṣodo mahi vṛtaṃ nadīnāṃ pariṣṭhitamasṛja ūrmimapām
analyzed: ā kṣodaḥ mahi vṛtam nadīnām pariṣṭhitam asṛjaḥ ūrmim apām

original: RV_06.017.12.2{03} tāsāmanu pravata indra panthāṃ prārdayo nīcīrapasaḥ samudram
analyzed: tāsām anu pravataḥ indra panthām prārdayaḥ nīcīḥ apasaḥ samudram

original: RV_06.017.13.1{03} evā tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsamindraṃ mahāmugramajuryaṃ sahodām
analyzed: eva tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsam indram mahām ugram ajuryam sahaḥ dām

original: RV_06.017.13.2{03} suvīraṃ tvā svāyudhaṃ suvajramā brahma navyamavase vavṛtyāt
analyzed: su vīram tvā su āyudham su vajramā ā brahma navyam avase vavṛtyāt

original: RV_06.017.14.1{03} sa no vājāya śravasa iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumata indra viprān
analyzed: sa naḥ vājāya śravase iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumataḥ indra viprān

original: RV_06.017.14.2{03} bharadvāje nṛvata indra sūrīn divi ca smaidhi pārye na indra
analyzed: bharadvāje nṛvataḥ indra sūrīn divi ca smā edhi pārye naḥ indra

original: RV_06.017.15.1{03} ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: ayā vājam deva hitam sanema madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.018.01.1{04} tamu ṣṭuhi yo abhibhūtyojā vanvannavātaḥ puruhūta indraḥ
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ abhibhūti ojāḥ vanvan avātaḥ puruhūtaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_06.018.01.2{04} aṣāḷhamugraṃ sahamānamābhirgīrbhirvardha vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: aṣāḷham ugram sahamānam ābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vardha vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_06.018.02.1{04} sa yudhmaḥ satvā khajakṛt samadvā tuvimrakṣo nadanumān ṛjīṣī
analyzed: sa yudhmaḥ satvā khaja kṛt samadvā tuvi mrakṣaḥ nadanumān ṛjīṣī

original: RV_06.018.02.2{04} bṛhadreṇuścyavano mānuṣīṇāmekaḥ kṛṣṭīnāmabhavat sahāvā
analyzed: bṛhadreṇuḥ cyavanaḥ mānuṣīṇām ekaḥ kṛṣṭīnām abhavat sahāvā

original: RV_06.018.03.1{04} tvaṃ ha nu tyadadamāyo dasyūnrekaḥ kṛṣṭīravanorāryāya
analyzed: tvam ha nu dasyūn rekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ avanoḥ āryāya

original: RV_06.018.03.2{04} asti svin nu vīryaṃ tat ta indra na svidasti tad ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ
analyzed: asti svid nu vīryam tat te indra na svid asti tat ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ

original: RV_06.018.04.1{04} sadid dhi te tuvijātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turatasturasya
analyzed: sadid hi te tuvi jātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turataḥ turasya

original: RV_06.018.04.2{04} ugramugrasya tavasastavīyo 'radhrasya radhraturo babhūva
analyzed: ugram ugrasya tavasaḥ tavīyaḥ radhrasya radhraturaḥ babhūva

original: RV_06.018.05.1{04} tan naḥ pratnaṃ sakhyamastu yuṣme itthā vadadbhirvalamaṅgirobhiḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ pratnam sakhyam astu yuṣme itthā vadadbhiḥ valam aṅgirobhiḥ

original: RV_06.018.05.2{04} hannacyutacyud dasmeṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puro vi duroasya viśvāḥ
analyzed: han acyuta cyut dasma iṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puraḥ vi duroasya viśvāḥ

original: RV_06.018.06.1{05} sa hi dhībhirhavyo astyugra īśānakṛn mahati vṛtratūrye
analyzed: sa hi dhībhiḥ havyaḥ asti ugraḥ īśāna kṛt mahati vṛtratūrye

original: RV_06.018.06.2{05} sa tokasātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyo abhavat samatsu
analyzed: sa toka sātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyaḥ abhavat samatsu

original: RV_06.018.07.1{05} sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇāmamartyena nāmnāti pra sarsre
analyzed: sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇām amartyena nāmnā ati pra sarsre

original: RV_06.018.07.2{05} sa dyumnena sa śavasota rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ
analyzed: sa dyumnena sa śavasā uta rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ

original: RV_06.018.08.1{05} sa yo na muhe na mithū jano bhūt sumantunāmā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca
analyzed: sa yaḥ na muhe na mithū bhūt sumantu nāmā cumurim dhunim ca

original: RV_06.018.08.2{05} vṛṇak pipruṃ śambaraṃ śuṣṇamindraḥ purāṃcyautnāya śayathāya nū cit
analyzed: vṛṇak piprum śambaram śuṣṇam indraḥ purāṃcyautnāya śayathāya nu cit

original: RV_06.018.09.1{05} udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtrahatyāya rathamindra tiṣṭha
analyzed: udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtra hatyāya ratham indra tiṣṭha

original: RV_06.018.09.2{05} dhiṣva vajraṃ hasta ā dakṣiṇatrābhi pra manda purudatra māyāḥ
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram haste ā dakṣiṇatrā abhi pra manda puru datra māyāḥ

original: RV_06.018.10.1{05} agnirna śuṣkaṃ vanamindra hetī rakṣo ni dhakṣyaśanirna bhīmā
analyzed: agniḥ na śuṣkam vanam indra hetiḥ rakṣaḥ ni dhakṣi aśaniḥ na bhīmā

original: RV_06.018.10.2{05} gambhīraya ṛṣvayā yo rurojādhvānayad duritā dambhayacca
analyzed: ṛṣvayā yaḥ ruroja adhvānayat duritā dambhayat ca

original: RV_06.018.11.1{06} ā sahasraṃ pathibhirindra rāyā tuvidyumna tuvivājebhirarvāk
analyzed: ā sahasram pathibhiḥ indra rāyā tuvi dyumna tuvi vājebhiḥ arvāk

original: RV_06.018.11.2{06} yāhi sūno sahaso yasya nū cidadeva īśe puruhūta yotoḥ
analyzed: yāhi sūno sahasaḥ yasya nu cidadevaḥ īśe puruhūta yotoḥ

original: RV_06.018.12.1{06} pra tuvidyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣverdivo rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: pra tuvi dyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ divaḥ rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_06.018.12.2{06} nāsya śatrurna pratimānamasti na pratiṣṭhiḥpurumāyasya sahyoḥ
analyzed: na asya śatruḥ na pratimānam asti na sahyoḥ

original: RV_06.018.13.1{06} pra tat te adyā karaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhūt kutsaṃ yadāyumatithigvamasmai
analyzed: pra tat te adyā karaṇam kṛtam bhūt kutsam yat āyum atithigvam asmai

original: RV_06.018.13.2{06} purū sahasrā ni śiśā abhi kṣāmut tūrvayāṇaṃ dhṛṣatā ninetha
analyzed: purū sahasrā ni śiśāḥ abhi kṣāmudh tūrvayāṇam dhṛṣatā ninetha

original: RV_06.018.14.1{06} anu tvāhighne adha deva devā madan viśve kavitamaṃ kavīnām
analyzed: anu tvā ahi ghne adha deva devāḥ madan viśve kavitamam kavīnām

original: RV_06.018.14.2{06} karo yatra varivo bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: karaḥ yatra varivaḥ bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_06.018.15.1{06} anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat ta ojo 'martyā jihata indra devāḥ
analyzed: anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat te ojaḥ martyāḥ jihate indra devāḥ

original: RV_06.018.15.2{06} kṛṣvā kṛtno akṛtaṃ yat te astyukthaṃ navīyo janayasva yajñaiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣva kṛtno a kṛtam yat te asti uktham navīyaḥ janayasva yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.019.01.1{07} mahānindro nṛvadā carṣaṇiprā uta dvibarhā aminaḥ sahobhiḥ
analyzed: mahān indraḥ nṛvadā carṣaṇi prāḥ uta dvibarhāḥ aminaḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_06.019.01.2{07} asmadryag vāvṛdhe viryāyoruḥ pṛthuḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhirbhūt
analyzed: asmadryak vāvṛdhe viryāya uruḥ pṛthuḥ su kṛtaḥ kartṛbhiḥ bhūt

original: RV_06.019.02.1{07} indrameva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhād bṛhantam ṛṣvamajaraṃ yuvānam
analyzed: indram eva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhāt bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram yuvānam

original: RV_06.019.02.2{07} aṣāḷhena savasā śūśuvāṃsaṃ sadyaścid yo vāvṛdhe asāmi
analyzed: aṣāḷhena savasā śūśuvāṃsam sadyaścit yaḥ vāvṛdhe asāmi

original: RV_06.019.03.1{07} pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak saṃ mimīhi śravāṃsi
analyzed: pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi

original: RV_06.019.03.2{07} yūtheva paśvaḥ paśupā damūnā asmānindrābhyā vavṛtsvājau
analyzed: yūthā iva paśvaḥ paśu pāḥ damūnāḥ asmān indra ābhyā vavṛtsva ājau

original: RV_06.019.04.1{07} taṃ va indraṃ catinamasya śākairiha nūnaṃ vājayanto huvema
analyzed: tam vaḥ indram catinamasya śākaiḥ iha nūnam vājayantaḥ huvema

original: RV_06.019.04.2{07} yathā cit pūrve jaritāra āsuranedyā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ
analyzed: yathā cit pūrve jaritāraḥ āsuḥ anedyāḥ anavadyāḥ ariṣṭāḥ

original: RV_06.019.05.1{07} dhṛtavrato dhanadāḥ somavṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ
analyzed: dhṛtavrataḥ dhana dāḥ soma vṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ

original: RV_06.019.05.2{07} saṃ jagmire pathyā rāyo asmin samudre na sindhavo yādamānāḥ
analyzed: sam jagmire pathyāḥ rāyaḥ asmin samudre na sindhavaḥ yādamānāḥ

original: RV_06.019.06.1{08} śaviṣṭhaṃ na ā bhara śūra śava ojiṣṭhamojo abhibhūtaugram
analyzed: śaviṣṭham naḥ ā bhara śūra śavaḥ ojiṣṭham ojaḥ abhibhūta ugram

original: RV_06.019.06.2{08} viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇāmasmabhyaṃ dāharivo mādayadhyai
analyzed: viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇām asmabhyam dāharivas mādayadhyai

original: RV_06.019.07.1{08} yaste madaḥ pṛtaṇāṣāḷ amṛdhra indra taṃ na ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ pṛtaṇāṣāh amṛdhraḥ indra tam naḥ ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam

original: RV_06.019.07.2{08} yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsastvotāḥ
analyzed: yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsaḥ tvā ūtāḥ

original: RV_06.019.08.1{08} ā no bhara vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmamindra dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indra dhana spṛtam śūśuvāṃsam su dakṣam

original: RV_06.019.08.2{08} yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tavotibhiruta jāmīnrajāmīn
analyzed: yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tava ūtibhiḥ uta jāmīn rajāmīn

original: RV_06.019.09.1{08} ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścādottarādadharādā purastāt
analyzed: ā te śuṣmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ etu paścāt ā uttarāt adharāt ā purastāt

original: RV_06.019.09.2{08} ā viśvato abhi sametvarvāṃ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehyasme
analyzed: ā viśvatas abhi sametu arvān indra dyumnam svarvat dhehi asme

original: RV_06.019.10.1{08} nṛvat ta indra nṛtamābhirūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmaṃ śromatebhiḥ
analyzed: nṛvat te indra nṛtama abhirūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmam śromatebhiḥ

original: RV_06.019.10.2{08} īkṣe hi vasva ubhayasya rājan dhā ratnaṃ mahi sthūraṃ bṛhantam
analyzed: īkṣe hi vasvaḥ ubhayasya rājan dhāḥ ratnam mahi sthūram bṛhantam

original: RV_06.019.11.1{08} marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ...
analyzed: marutvantam vṛṣabham

original: RV_06.019.12.1{08} janaṃ vajrin mahi cin manyamānamebhyo nṛbhyo randhayā yeṣvasmi
analyzed: janam vajrin mahi cit manyamānam ebhyaḥ nṛbhyaḥ randhaya yeṣu asmi

original: RV_06.019.12.2{08} adhā hi tvā pṛthivyāṃ śūrasātau havāmahe tanayegoṣvapsu
analyzed: adhā hi tvā pṛthivyām śūrasātau havāmahe tanaye goṣu apsu

original: RV_06.019.13.1{08} vayaṃ ta ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ-śatroruttara itsyāma
analyzed: vayam te ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ śatroḥ uttare itsyāma

original: RV_06.019.13.2{08} ghnanto vṛtrāṇyubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatātvotāḥ
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi ubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatā ātvā utāḥ

original: RV_06.020.01.1{09} dyaurna ya indrābhi bhūmāryastasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān
analyzed: dyauḥ na yaḥ indra abhi bhūmā āryaḥ tasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān

original: RV_06.020.01.2{09} taṃ naḥ sahasrabharamurvarāsāṃ daddhi sūno sahaso vṛtraturam
analyzed: tam naḥ sahasra bharam urvarā sām daddhi sūno sahasaḥ vṛtra turam

original: RV_06.020.02.1{09} divo na tubhyamanvindra satrāsuryaṃ devebhirdhāyi viśvam
analyzed: divaḥ na tubhyam anu indra satrā asuryam devebhiḥ dhāyi viśvam

original: RV_06.020.02.2{09} ahiṃ yad vṛtramapo vavrivāṃsaṃ hannṛjīṣin viṣṇunāsacānaḥ
analyzed: ahim yat vṛtram apaḥ vavrivāṃsam han ṛjīṣin viṣṇunā asacānaḥ

original: RV_06.020.03.1{09} tūrvannojīyān tavasastavīyān kṛtabrahmendro vṛddhamahāḥ
analyzed: tūrvan ojīyān tavasaḥ tavīyān kṛta brahmā indraḥ vṛddha mahāḥ

original: RV_06.020.03.2{09} rājābhavan madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsāṃ yat purāṃ dartnumāvat
analyzed: rājā abhavat madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsām yat purām

original: RV_06.020.04.1{09} śatairapadran paṇaya indrātra daśoṇaye kavaye 'rkasātau
analyzed: śataiḥ apadran paṇayaḥ indra atra daśoṇaye kavaye rka sātau

original: RV_06.020.04.2{09} vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvo nārirecīt kiṃcana pra
analyzed: vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya aśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvaḥ na arirecīt kiṃcana pra

original: RV_06.020.05.1{09} maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ druhaḥ apa viśva āyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ

original: RV_06.020.05.2{09} uru ṣa sarathaṃ sārathaye karindraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau
analyzed: uru sa sa ratham sārathaye karindraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau

original: RV_06.020.06.1{10} pra śyeno na madiramaṃśumasmai śiro dāsasya namucermathāyan
analyzed: pra śyenaḥ na madiram aṃśum asmai śiraḥ dāsasya namuceḥ mathāyan

original: RV_06.020.06.2{10} prāvan namīṃ sāpyaṃ sasantaṃ pṛṇag rāyā samiṣā saṃ svasti
analyzed: prāvat namīm sāpyam sasantam pṛṇak rāyā sam iṣā sam svasti

original: RV_06.020.07.1{10} vi piprorahimāyasya dṛḷhāḥ puro vajriñchavasā na dardaḥ
analyzed: vi piproḥ ahi māyasya dṛḍhāḥ puraḥ vajrin śavasā na dardar

original: RV_06.020.07.2{10} sudāman tad rekṇo apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātraṃ dāśuṣe dāḥ
analyzed: su dāman tat rekṇaḥ apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātram dāśuṣe dāḥ

original: RV_06.020.08.1{10} sa vetasuṃ daśamāyaṃ daśoṇiṃ tūtujimindraḥ svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ
analyzed: sa vetasum daśa māyam daśoṇim tūtujim indraḥ su abhiṣṭi sumnaḥ

original: RV_06.020.08.2{10} ā tugraṃ śaśvadibhaṃ dyotanāya māturna sīmupa sṛjā iyadhyai
analyzed: ā tugram śaśvat ibham dyotanāya mātuḥ na sīm upa sṛjai iyadhyai

original: RV_06.020.09.1{10} sa īṃ spṛdho vanate apratīto bibhrad vajraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ gabhastau
analyzed: saḥ īm spṛdhaḥ vanate apratītaḥ bibhrat vajram vṛtra haṇam gabhastau

original: RV_06.020.09.2{10} tiṣṭhad dharī adhyasteva garte vacoyujā vahata indram ṛṣvam
analyzed: tiṣṭhat harī adhyastā iva garte vacaḥ yujā vahataḥ indram ṛṣvam

original: RV_06.020.10.1{10} sanema te 'vasā navya indra pra pūrava stavanta enā yajñaiḥ
analyzed: sanema te vasā navyaḥ indra pra pūravaḥ stavante enā yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.020.10.2{10} sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīrdard dhan dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan
analyzed: sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīḥ dart han dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan

original: RV_06.020.11.1{10} tvaṃ vṛdha indra pūrvyo bhūrvarivasyannuśane kāvyāya
analyzed: tvam vṛdhaḥ indra pūrvyaḥ bhūḥ varivasyan uśane kāvyāya

original: RV_06.020.11.2{10} parā navavāstvamanudeyaṃ mahe pitre dadātha svaṃ napātam
analyzed: parā navavāstvam anudeyam mahe pitre dada atha svam napātam

original: RV_06.020.12.1{10} tvaṃ dhunirindra ...
analyzed: tvam dhuniḥ indra

original: RV_06.020.13.1{10} tava ha tyadindra viṣvamājau sasto dhunīcumurī yā ha siṣvap
analyzed: tava ha tyad indra viṣvam ājau sastaḥ dhunī cumurī yā ha siṣvap

original: RV_06.020.13.2{10} dīdayadit tubhyaṃ somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītiridhmabhṛtiḥ pakthyarkaiḥ
analyzed: dīdayat id tubhyam somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītiḥ idhma bhṛtiḥ pakthī arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.021.01.1{11} imā u tvā purutamasya kārorhavyaṃ vīra havyā havante
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purutamasya kāroḥ havyam vīra havyā havante

original: RV_06.021.01.2{11} dhiyo ratheṣṭhāmajaraṃ navīyo rayirvibhūtirīyate vacasyā
analyzed: dhiyaḥ ratheṣṭhām ajaram navīyaḥ rayiḥ vibhūtiḥ īyate vacasyā

original: RV_06.021.02.1{11} tamu stuṣa indraṃ yo vidāno girvāhasaṃ gīrbhīryajñavṛddham
analyzed: tam u stuṣe indram yaḥ vidānaḥ gir vāhasam gīrbhīḥ yajña vṛddham

original: RV_06.021.02.2{11} yasya divamati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ purumāyasya riricemahitvam
analyzed: yasya divam ati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ puru māyasya riricemahi tvam

original: RV_06.021.03.1{11} sa it tamo 'vayunaṃ tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavaccakāra
analyzed: saḥ id tamaḥ vayunam tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavat cakāra

original: RV_06.021.03.2{11} kadā te martā amṛtasya dhāmeyakṣanto na minanti svadhāvaḥ
analyzed: kadā te martāḥ amṛtasya dhāma iyakṣantaḥ na minanti svadhāvas

original: RV_06.021.04.1{11} yastā cakāra sa kuha svidindraḥ kamā janaṃ carati kāsu vikṣu
analyzed: yaḥ tā cakāra sa kuha svid indraḥ kamā janam carati kāsu vikṣu

original: RV_06.021.04.2{11} kaste yajño manase śaṃ varāya ko arka indrakatamaḥ sa hotā
analyzed: kaḥ te yajñaḥ manase śam varāya kaḥ arkaḥ indra katamaḥ sa hotā

original: RV_06.021.05.1{11} idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsa āsuḥ purukṛt sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsaḥ āsuḥ puru kṛt sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_06.021.05.2{11} ye madhyamāsa uta nūtanāsa utāvamasya puruhūta bodhi
analyzed: ye madhyamāsaḥ uta nūtanāsaḥ uta avamasya puruhūta bodhi

original: RV_06.021.06.1{12} taṃ pṛchanto 'varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā ta indra śrutyānu yemuḥ
analyzed: tam pṛcchantaḥ varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā te indra śrutyā anu yemuḥ

original: RV_06.021.06.2{12} arcāmasi vīra brahmavāho yādeva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam
analyzed: arcāmasi vīra brahma vāhaḥ yādeva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam

original: RV_06.021.07.1{12} abhi tvā pājo rakṣaso vi tasthe mahi jajñānamabhi tat su tiṣṭha
analyzed: abhi tvā pājaḥ rakṣasaḥ vi tasthe mahi jajñānam abhi tat su tiṣṭha

original: RV_06.021.07.2{12} tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apatā nudasva
analyzed: tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apatā nudasva

original: RV_06.021.08.1{12} sa tu śrudhīndra nūtanasya brahmaṇyato vīra kārudhāyaḥ
analyzed: sa tu śrudhi indra nūtanasya brahmaṇyataḥ vīra kāru dhāyaḥ

original: RV_06.021.08.2{12} tvaṃ hyāpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇāṃ śaśvad babhūtha suhava eṣṭau
analyzed: tvam hi āpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇām śaśvat babhūtha su havaḥ eṣṭau

original: RV_06.021.09.1{12} protaye varuṇaṃ mitramindraṃ marutaḥ kṛṣvāvase no adya
analyzed: protaye varuṇam mitram indram marutaḥ kṛṣva avase naḥ adya

original: RV_06.021.09.2{12} pra pūṣaṇaṃ viṣṇumagniṃ purandhiṃ savitāramoṣadhīḥ parvatāṃśca
analyzed: pra pūṣaṇam viṣṇum agnim purandhim savitāram oṣadhīḥ parvatān ca

original: RV_06.021.10.1{12} ima u tvā puruśāka prayajyo jaritāro abhyarcantyarkaiḥ
analyzed: ime u tvā puru śāka prayajyo jaritāraḥ abhyarcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.021.10.2{12} śrudhī havamā huvato huvāno na tvāvānanyo amṛta tvadasti
analyzed: śrudhi havam ā huvataḥ huvānaḥ na tvāvān anyaḥ amṛta tvat asti

original: RV_06.021.11.1{12} nū ma ā vācamupa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajatraiḥ
analyzed: nu me ā vācam upa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahasaḥ yajatraiḥ

original: RV_06.021.11.2{12} ye agnijihvā ṛtasāpa āsurye manuṃ cakruruparaṃ dasāya
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ ṛtasāpaḥ āsuḥ ye manum cakruḥ uparam dasāya

original: RV_06.021.12.1{12} sa no bodhi puraetā sugeṣūta durgeṣu pathikṛd vidānaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi puraetā sugeṣu uta durgeṣu pathikṛt vidānaḥ

original: RV_06.021.12.2{12} ye aśramāsa uravo vahiṣṭhāstebhirna indrābhi vakṣi vājam
analyzed: ye aśramāsaḥ uravaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ tebhiḥ naḥ indra abhi vakṣi vājam

original: RV_06.022.01.1{13} ya eka id dhavyaścarṣaṇīnāmindraṃ taṃ gīrbhirabhyarca ābhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id havyaḥ carṣaṇīnām indram tam gīrbhiḥ abhyarce ābhiḥ

original: RV_06.022.01.2{13} yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān
analyzed: yaḥ patyate vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā puru māyaḥ sahasvān

original: RV_06.022.02.1{13} tamu naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ
analyzed: tam u naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ navagvāḥ sapta viprāsaḥ abhi vājayantaḥ

original: RV_06.022.02.2{13} nakṣaddābhaṃ taturiṃ parvateṣṭhāmadroghavācaṃ matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham
analyzed: nakṣat dābham taturim parvateṣṭhām amatrogha vācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham

original: RV_06.022.03.1{13} tamīmaha indramasya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ
analyzed: tam īmahe indramasya rāyaḥ puru vīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ

original: RV_06.022.03.2{13} yo askṛdhoyurajaraḥ svarvān tamā bhara harivo mādayadhyai
analyzed: yaḥ askṛdhoyuḥ ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivas mādayadhyai

original: RV_06.022.04.1{13} tan no vi voco yadi te purā cijjaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnamindra
analyzed: tat naḥ vi vocaḥ yadi te purā cit jaritāraḥ ānaśuḥ sumnam indra

original: RV_06.022.04.2{13} kaste bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ te bhāgaḥ kim vayaḥ dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso sura ghnaḥ

original: RV_06.022.05.1{13} taṃ pṛchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhāmindraṃ vepī vakvarīyasya nū gīḥ
analyzed: tam pṛcchantī vajrahastam ratheṣṭhām indram vepī vakvarīyasya nu gīḥ

original: RV_06.022.05.2{13} tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātumiṣe nakṣate tumramacha
analyzed: tuvi grābham tuvikūrmim rabhaḥ dām gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram acha

original: RV_06.022.06.1{14} ayā ha tyaṃ māyayā vāvṛdhānaṃ manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena
analyzed: ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manaḥ juvā svatavaḥ parvatena

original: RV_06.022.06.2{14} acyutā cid vīḷitā svojo rujo vi dṛḷhā dhṛṣatā virapśin
analyzed: acyutā cit vīḍitā su ojaḥ rujaḥ vi dṛḍhā dhṛṣatā virapśin

original: RV_06.022.07.1{14} taṃ vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭhaṃ pratnaṃ pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai
analyzed: tam vaḥ dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratna vat paritaṃsayadhyai

original: RV_06.022.07.2{14} sa no vakṣadanimānaḥ suvahmendro viśvānyatidurgahāṇi
analyzed: sa naḥ vakṣat animānaḥ suvahmā indraḥ viśvāni ati durgahāṇi

original: RV_06.022.08.1{14} ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā
analyzed: ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayaḥ ntarikṣā

original: RV_06.022.08.2{14} tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣāmapaśca
analyzed: tapa vṛṣan viśvatas śociṣā tān brahma dviṣe śocaya kṣāma paḥ ca

original: RV_06.022.09.1{14} bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatastveṣasandṛk
analyzed: bhuvaḥ janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagataḥ tveṣa sandṛś

original: RV_06.022.09.2{14} dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram dakṣiṇe indra haste viśvāḥ ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ

original: RV_06.022.10.1{14} ā saṃyatamindra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīmamṛdhrām
analyzed: ā saṃyatam indra naḥ svastim śatru tūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām

original: RV_06.022.10.2{14} yayā dāsānyāryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi
analyzed: yayā dāsāni āryāṇi vṛtrā karaḥ vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi

original: RV_06.022.11.1{14} sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhirā gahi prayajyo
analyzed: sa naḥ niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedhaḥ viśva vārābhiḥ ā gahi prayajyo

original: RV_06.022.11.2{14} na yā adevo varate na deva ābhiryāhi tūyamā madryadrik
analyzed: na yāḥ adevaḥ varate na devaḥ ābhiḥ yāhi tūyamā madryadrik

original: RV_06.023.01.1{15} suta it tvaṃ nimiśla indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamānaukthe
analyzed: sute id tvam nimiślaḥ indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamāna okthe

original: RV_06.023.01.2{15} yad vā yuktābhyāṃ maghavan haribhyāṃ bibhrad vajrambāhvorindra yāsi
analyzed: yat vā yuktābhyām maghavan haribhyām bibhrat vajram bāhvoḥ indra yāsi

original: RV_06.023.02.1{15} yad vā divi pārye suṣvimindra vṛtrahatye 'vasi śūrasātau
analyzed: yat vā divi pārye suṣvim indra vṛtra hatye vasi śūrasātau

original: RV_06.023.02.2{15} yad vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣo abibhyadarandhayaḥ śardhata indra dasyūn
analyzed: yat vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣaḥ a bibhyat arandhayaḥ śardhataḥ indra dasyūn

original: RV_06.023.03.1{15} pātā sutamindro astu somaṃ praṇenīrugro jaritāramūtī
analyzed: pātā sutam indraḥ astu somam praṇenīḥ ugraḥ jaritāram ūtī

original: RV_06.023.03.2{15} kartā vīrāya suṣvaya u lokaṃ dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit
analyzed: kartā vīrāya suṣvaye u lokam dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit

original: RV_06.023.04.1{15} ganteyānti savanā haribhyāṃ babhrirvajraṃ papiḥ somaṃ dadirgāḥ
analyzed: gantā iyānti savanā haribhyām babhriḥ vajram papiḥ somam dadiḥ gāḥ

original: RV_06.023.04.2{15} kartā vīraṃ naryaṃ sarvavīraṃ śrotā havaṃgṛṇata stomavāhāḥ
analyzed: kartā vīram naryam sarva vīram śrotā havaṃgṛṇataḥ stoma vāhāḥ

original: RV_06.023.05.1{15} asmai vayaṃ yad vāvāna tad viviṣma indrāya yo naḥ pradivo apas kaḥ
analyzed: asmai vayam yat vāvāna tat viviṣmaḥ indrāya yaḥ naḥ pradivaḥ apaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_06.023.05.2{15} sute some stumasi śaṃsadukthendrāya brahma vardhanaṃ yathāsat
analyzed: sute some stumasi śaṃsat ukthā indrāya brahma vardhanam yathā asat

original: RV_06.023.06.1{16} brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat ta indra matibhirviviṣmaḥ
analyzed: brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat te indra matibhiḥ viviṣmaḥ

original: RV_06.023.06.2{16} sute some sutapāḥ śantamāni rāndryā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ
analyzed: sute some suta pāḥ śantamāni rāndryā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.023.07.1{16} sa no bodhi puroḷāśaṃ rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somaṃ goṛjīkamindra
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi puroḷāśam rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somam goṛjīkam indra

original: RV_06.023.07.2{16} edaṃ barhiryajamānasya sīdoruṃ kṛdhi tvāyata u lokam
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ yajamānasya sīda urum kṛdhi tvāyataḥ u lokam

original: RV_06.023.08.1{16} sa mandasvā hyanu joṣamugra pra tvā yajñāsa ime aśnuvantu
analyzed: sa mandasva hi anu joṣam ugra pra tvā yajñāsaḥ ime aśnuvantu

original: RV_06.023.08.2{16} preme havāsaḥ puruhūtamasme ā tveyaṃ dhīravasa indra yamyāḥ
analyzed: pra ime havāsaḥ puruhūtam asme ā tvā iyam dhīravasaḥ indra yamyāḥ

original: RV_06.023.09.1{16} taṃ vaḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ yathā suteṣu somebhirīṃ pṛṇatā bhojamindram
analyzed: tam vaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam yathā suteṣu somebhiḥ īm pṛṇata bhojam indram

original: RV_06.023.09.2{16} kuvit tasmā asati no bharāya na suṣvimindro 'vase mṛdhāti
analyzed: kuvid tasmai asati naḥ bharāya na suṣvimindraḥ vase mṛdhāti

original: RV_06.023.10.1{16} evedindraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayadin maghonaḥ
analyzed: eva id indraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣaya dit maghonaḥ

original: RV_06.023.10.2{16} asad yathā jaritra uta sūririndro rāyo viśvavārasya dātā
analyzed: asat yathā jaritre uta sūriḥ indraḥ rāyaḥ viśva vārasya dātā

original: RV_06.024.01.1{17} vṛṣā mada indre śloka ukthā sacā someṣu sutapā ṛjīṣī
analyzed: vṛṣā made indre śloke ukthā sacā someṣu suta pāḥ ṛjīṣī

original: RV_06.024.01.2{17} arcatryo maghavā nṛbhya ukthairdyukṣo rājā girāmakṣitotiḥ
analyzed: arcatryaḥ maghavā nṛbhyaḥ ukthaiḥ dyukṣaḥ rājā girām akṣita ūtiḥ

original: RV_06.024.02.1{17} taturirvīro naryo vicetāḥ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata urvyūtiḥ
analyzed: taturiḥ vīraḥ naryaḥ vicetāḥ śrotā havam gṛṇate urvyūtiḥ

original: RV_06.024.02.2{17} vasuḥ śaṃso narāṃ kārudhāyā vājī stuto vidathe dāti vājam
analyzed: vasuḥ śaṃsaḥ narām kāru dhāyāḥ vājī stutaḥ vidathe dāti vājam

original: RV_06.024.03.1{17} akṣo na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ
analyzed: akṣaḥ na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ

original: RV_06.024.03.2{17} vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayā vyūtayo ruruhurindra pūrvīḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayāḥ vyūtayaḥ ruruhuḥ indra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_06.024.04.1{17} śacīvataste puruśāka śākā gavāmiva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ
analyzed: śacīvataḥ te puru śāka śākāḥ gavām iva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ

original: RV_06.024.04.2{17} vatsānāṃ na tantayasta indra dāmanvanto adāmānaḥ sudāman
analyzed: vatsānām na tantayaḥ te indra dāmanvantaḥ a dāmānaḥ su dāman

original: RV_06.024.05.1{17} anyadadya karvaramanyadu śvo 'sacca san muhurācakririndraḥ
analyzed: anyat adya karvaram anyat u śvas sat ca sat muhur ācakriḥ indraḥ

original: RV_06.024.05.2{17} mitro no atra varuṇaśca pūṣāryo vaśasya paryetāsti
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra varuṇaḥ ca pūṣā aryaḥ vaśasya paryetā asti

original: RV_06.024.06.1{18} vi tvadāpo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhādukthebhirindrānayanta yajñaiḥ
analyzed: vi tvat āpaḥ na parvatasya pṛṣṭhāt ukthebhiḥ indra anayanta yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.024.06.2{18} taṃ tvābhiḥ suṣṭutibhirvājayanta ājiṃ na jagmurgirvāho aśvāḥ
analyzed: tam tvā ābhiḥ suṣṭutibhiḥ vājayantaḥ ājim na jagmuḥ gir vāhaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_06.024.07.1{18} na yaṃ jaranti śarado na māsā na dyāva indramavakarśayanti
analyzed: na yam jaranti śaradaḥ na māsāḥ na dyāvaḥ indram avakarśayanti

original: RV_06.024.07.2{18} vṛddhasya cid vardhatāmasya tanū stomebhirukthaiścaśasyamānā
analyzed: vṛddhasya cit vardhatām asya tanū stomebhiḥ ukthaiḥ caśasyamānā

original: RV_06.024.08.1{18} na vīḷave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyujūtāya stavān
analyzed: na vīḍave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyu jūtāya stavān

original: RV_06.024.08.2{18} ajrā indrasya girayaścid ṛṣvā gambhīre cid bhavatigādhamasmai
analyzed: ajrāḥ indrasya girayaḥ cit ṛṣvāḥ gambhīre cit bhavati gādham asmai

original: RV_06.024.09.1{18} gambhīreṇa na uruṇāmatrin preṣo yandhi sutapāvan vājān
analyzed: gambhīreṇa naḥ uruṇā amatrin pra iṣaḥ yandhi suta pāvan vājān

original: RV_06.024.09.2{18} sthā ū ṣu ūrdhva ūtī ariṣaṇyannaktorvyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām
