analyzed: sthā u su ūrdhve ūtī a riṣaṇyat nakta urvyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām

original: RV_06.024.10.1{18} sacasva nāyamavase abhīka ito vā tamindra pāhi riṣaḥ
analyzed: sacasva na ayam avase abhīke itas vā tam indra pāhi riṣaḥ

original: RV_06.024.10.2{18} amā cainamaraṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: amā ca enam araṇye pāhi riṣaḥ madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_06.025.01.1{19} yā ta ūtiravamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminnasti
analyzed: yā te ūtiḥ avamā yā paramā yā madhyamā indra śuṣmin asti

original: RV_06.025.01.2{19} tābhirū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīrna ebhiśca vājairmahānna ugra
analyzed: tābhiḥ u su vṛtra hatye vīḥ naḥ ebhiḥ ca vājaiḥ mahān naḥ ugra

original: RV_06.025.02.1{19} ābhi spṛdho mithatīrariṣaṇyannamitrasya vyathayā manyumindra
analyzed: ābhiḥ spṛdhaḥ mithatīḥ ariṣaṇyan amitrasya vyathaya manyum indra

original: RV_06.025.02.2{19} ābhirviśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīrāryāya viśo 'va tārīrdāsīḥ
analyzed: ābhiḥ viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ viṣūcīḥ āryāya viśaḥ vaḥ tārīḥ dāsīḥ

original: RV_06.025.03.1{19} indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre
analyzed: indra jāmayaḥ uta ye jāmayaḥ rvācīnāsaḥ vanuṣaḥ yuyujre

original: RV_06.025.03.2{19} tvameṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ
analyzed: tvam eṣām vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhi parācaḥ

original: RV_06.025.04.1{19} śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīraistanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite
analyzed: śūraḥ vā śūram vanate śarīraiḥ tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite

original: RV_06.025.04.2{19} toke vā goṣu tanaye yadapsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite
analyzed: toke vā goṣu tanaye yat apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite

original: RV_06.025.05.1{19} nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇurna tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha
analyzed: nahi tvā śūraḥ na turaḥ na dhṛṣṇuḥ na tvā yodhaḥ manyamānaḥ yuyodha

original: RV_06.025.05.2{19} indra nakiṣ ṭvā pratyastyeṣāṃ viśvā jātānyabhyasi tāni
analyzed: indra nakir tvā viśvā jātāni abhi asi tāni

original: RV_06.025.06.1{20} sa patyata ubhayornṛmṇamayoryadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante
analyzed: sa patyate ubhayoḥ nṛmṇamayoḥ yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante

original: RV_06.025.06.2{20} vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite
analyzed: vṛtre vā mahaḥ nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite

original: RV_06.025.07.1{20} adha smā te carṣaṇayo yadejānindra trātota bhavā varūtā
analyzed: adha smā te carṣaṇayaḥ yadā ījān indra trātā uta bhava varūtā

original: RV_06.025.07.2{20} asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puronaḥ
analyzed: asmākāsaḥ ye nṛtamāsaḥ aryaḥ indra sūrayaḥ dadhire purā ūnaḥ

original: RV_06.025.08.1{20} anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viṣvamanu vṛtrahatye
analyzed: anu te dāyi mahe indriyāya satrā te viṣvam anu vṛtra hatye

original: RV_06.025.08.2{20} anu kṣatramanu saho yajatrendra devebhiranu te nṛṣahye
analyzed: anu kṣatram anu sahaḥ yajatra indra devebhiḥ anu te nṛṣahye

original: RV_06.025.09.1{20} evā na spṛdhaḥ samajā samatsvindra rārandhi mithatīradevīḥ
analyzed: eva naḥ spṛdhaḥ samaja samatsu indra rārandhi mithatīra devīḥ

original: RV_06.025.09.2{20} vidyāma vastoravasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ bharadvājāḥ uta te indra nūnam

original: RV_06.026.01.1{21} śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ indra hvayāmasi tvā mahaḥ vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_06.026.01.2{21} saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ
analyzed: sam yat viśaḥ yanta śūra sātau ugram naḥ vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ

original: RV_06.026.02.1{21} tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau
analyzed: tvām vājī havate vājineyaḥ mahaḥ vājasya gadhyasya sātau

original: RV_06.026.02.2{21} tvāṃ vṛtreṣvindra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan
analyzed: tvām vṛtreṣu indra sat patim tarutram tvām caṣṭe muṣṭi hā goṣu yudhyan

original: RV_06.026.03.1{21} tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark
analyzed: tvam kavim codayaḥ rka sātau tvam kutsāya śuṣṇam dāśuṣe vark

original: RV_06.026.03.2{21} tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhannatithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan
analyzed: tvam śiraḥ amarmaṇaḥ parāhan atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: RV_06.026.04.1{21} tvaṃ rathaṃ pra bharo yodham ṛṣvamāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum
analyzed: tvam ratham pra bharaḥ yodham ṛṣvam āvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum

original: RV_06.026.04.2{21} tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantamindra tūtoḥ
analyzed: tvam tugram vetasave sacā ahan tvam tujim gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ

original: RV_06.026.05.1{21} tvaṃ tadukthamindra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yacchatā sahasrāśūra darṣi
analyzed: tvam tat uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yat śatā sahasrāśūra darṣi

original: RV_06.026.05.2{21} ava girerdāsaṃ śambaraṃ han prāvo divodāsaṃ citrābhirūtī
analyzed: ava gireḥ dāsam śambaram han prāvaḥ divodāsam citra abhirūtī

original: RV_06.026.06.1{22} tvaṃ śraddhābhirmandasānaḥ somairdabhītaye cumurimindrasiṣvap
analyzed: tvam śraddhābhiḥ mandasānaḥ somaiḥ dabhītaye cumurim indra siṣvap

original: RV_06.026.06.2{22} tvaṃ rajiṃ piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśacyā sacāhan
analyzed: tvam rajim piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭim sahasrāśacyā sacā ahan

original: RV_06.026.07.1{22} ahaṃ cana tat sūribhirānaśyāṃ tava jyāya indra sumnamojaḥ
analyzed: aham cana tat sūribhiḥ ānaśyām tava jyāyaḥ indra sumnam ojaḥ

original: RV_06.026.07.2{22} tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrāstrivarūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha
analyzed: tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrāḥ tri varūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha

original: RV_06.026.08.1{22} vayaṃ te asyāmindra dyumnahūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: vayam te asyām indra dyumna hūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_06.026.08.2{22} prātardaniḥ kṣatraśrīrastu śreṣṭho ghane vṛtrāṇāṃ sanaye dhanānām
analyzed: prātardaniḥ kṣatra śrīḥ astu śreṣṭhaḥ ghane vṛtrāṇām sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_06.027.01.1{23} kimasya made kiṃ vasya pītāvindraḥ kimasya sakhye cakāra
analyzed: kim asya made kim vasya pītau indraḥ kim asya sakhye cakāra

original: RV_06.027.01.2{23} raṇā vā ye niṣadi kiṃ te asya pura vividre kimu nūtanāsaḥ
analyzed: raṇā vā ye niṣadi kim te asya pura vividre kimu nūtanāsaḥ

original: RV_06.027.02.1{23} sadasya made sad vasya pitavindraḥ sadasya sakhye cakāra
analyzed: sadasya made sat pitavindraḥ sadasya sakhye cakāra

original: RV_06.027.02.2{23} raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya pura vividre sadu nūtanāsaḥ
analyzed: raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya pura vividre sadu nūtanāsaḥ

original: RV_06.027.03.1{23} nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavattvasya vidma
analyzed: nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavat tvasya vidma

original: RV_06.027.03.2{23} na rādhaso-rādhaso nūtanasyendra nakirdadṛśa indriyaṃ te
analyzed: na rādhasaḥ rādhasaḥ nūtanasya indra nakir dadṛśe indriyam te

original: RV_06.027.04.1{23} etat tyat ta indriyamaceti yenāvadhīrvaraśikhasya śeṣaḥ
analyzed: etat tyad te indriyam aceti yena avadhīḥ varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ

original: RV_06.027.04.2{23} vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāccidindra paramodadāra
analyzed: vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāt cit indra paramā udadāra

original: RV_06.027.05.1{23} vadhīdindro varaśikhasya śeṣo 'bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan
analyzed: vadhīt indraḥ varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan

original: RV_06.027.05.2{23} vṛcīvato yad dhariyūpīyāyāṃ han pūrve ardhe bhiyasāparo dart
analyzed: vṛcīvataḥ yat hariyūpīyāyām han pūrve ardhe bhiyasā aparaḥ dart

original: RV_06.027.06.1{24} triṃśacchataṃ varmiṇa indra sākaṃ yavyāvatyāṃ puruhūta śravasyā
analyzed: triṃśat śatam varmiṇaḥ indra sākam yavyāvatyām puruhūta śravasyā

original: RV_06.027.06.2{24} vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānanyarthānyāyan
analyzed: vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindān anyarthāni āyan

original: RV_06.027.07.1{24} yasya gāvāvaruṣā sūyavasyū antarū ṣu carato rerihāṇā
analyzed: yasya gāvāvaruṣā sūyavasyū antaru su carataḥ rerihāṇā

original: RV_06.027.07.2{24} sa sṛñjayāya turvaśaṃ parādād vṛcīvato daivavātāyaśikṣan
analyzed: sa sṛñjayāya turvaśam parādāt vṛcīvataḥ daivavātāya śikṣan

original: RV_06.027.08.1{24} dvayānagne rathino viṃśatiṃ gā vadhūmato maghavā mahyaṃ samrāṭ
analyzed: dvayān agne rathinaḥ viṃśatim gāḥ vadhūmataḥ maghavā mahyam samrāj

original: RV_06.027.08.2{24} abhyāvartī cāyamāno dadāti dūṇāśeyaṃ dakṣiṇā pārthavānām
analyzed: abhyāvartī cāyamānaḥ dadāti dūṇāśeyam dakṣiṇā pārthavānām

original: RV_06.028.01.1{25} ā gāvo agmannuta bhadramakran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantvasme
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ agman uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantu asme

original: RV_06.028.01.2{25} prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syurindrāya pūrvīruṣaso duhānāḥ
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ puru rūpāḥ iha syuḥ indrāya pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ duhānāḥ

original: RV_06.028.02.1{25} indro yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣatyuped dadāti na svaṃ muṣāyati
analyzed: indraḥ yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣati upa id dadāti na svam muṣāyati

original: RV_06.028.02.2{25} bhūyo-bhūyo rayimidasya vardhayannabhinne khilye nidadhāti devayum
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas rayim idasya vardhayan abhinne khilye nidadhāti devayum

original: RV_06.028.03.1{25} na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsāmāmitro vyathirādadharṣati
analyzed: na tāḥ naśanti na dabhāti taskaraḥ na āsām āmitraḥ vyathirāt adharṣati

original: RV_06.028.03.2{25} devāṃśca yābhiryajate dadāti ca jyogit tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha
analyzed: devān ca yābhiḥ yajate dadāti ca jyogit tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha

original: RV_06.028.04.1{25} na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo aśnute na saṃskṛtatramupa yanti tā abhi
analyzed: na tāḥ arvā reṇu kakāṭaḥ aśnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tāḥ abhi

original: RV_06.028.04.2{25} urugāyamabhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vicaranti yajvanaḥ
analyzed: uru gāyam abhayam tasya tāḥ anu gāvaḥ martasya vicaranti yajvanaḥ

original: RV_06.028.05.1{25} gāvo bhago gāva indro me achān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ bhagaḥ gāvaḥ indraḥ me achān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ

original: RV_06.028.05.2{25} imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra ichāmīd dhṛdāmanasā cidindram
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ gāvaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ ichāmi id hṛdā amanasā cit indram

original: RV_06.028.06.1{25} yūyaṃ gāvo medayathā kṛśaṃ cidaśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam
analyzed: yūyam gāvaḥ medayatha kṛśam cit aśrīram cit kṛṇutha su pratīkam

original: RV_06.028.06.2{25} bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu
analyzed: bhadram gṛham kṛṇutha bhadra vācaḥ bṛhat vaḥ vayaḥ ucyate sabhāsu

original: RV_06.028.07.1{25} prajāvatīḥ sūyavasaṃ riśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇepibantīḥ
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ sūyavasam riśantīḥ śuddhāḥ apaḥ su prapāṇe pibantīḥ

original: RV_06.028.07.2{25} mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ
analyzed: mā vaḥ stenaḥ īśata mā agha śaṃsaḥ pari vaḥ hetiḥ rudrasya vṛjyāḥ

original: RV_06.028.08.1{25} upedamupaparcanamāsu goṣūpa pṛcyatām
analyzed: upa idam upaparcanam āsu goṣu upa pṛcyatām

original: RV_06.028.08.2{25} upa ṛṣabhasya retasyupendra tava vīrye
analyzed: upa ṛṣabhasya retasi upa indra tava vīrye

original: RV_06.029.01.1{01} indraṃ vo naraḥ sakhyāya sepurmaho yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ
analyzed: indram vaḥ naraḥ sakhyāya sepuḥ mahaḥ yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ

original: RV_06.029.01.2{01} maho hi dātā vajrahasto asti mahāmu raṇvamavase yajadhvam
analyzed: mahaḥ hi dātā vajra hastaḥ asti raṇvam avase yajadhvam

original: RV_06.029.02.1{01} ā yasmin haste naryā mimikṣurā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: ā yasmin haste naryāḥ mimikṣurāḥ rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_06.029.02.2{01} ā raśmayo gabhastyo sthūrayorādhvannaśvāso vṛṣaṇo yujānāḥ
analyzed: ā raśmayaḥ gabhastyoḥ sthūrayoḥ ādhvannaśvāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yujānāḥ

original: RV_06.029.03.1{01} śriye te pādā duva ā mimikṣurdhṛṣṇurvajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān
analyzed: śriye te pādā duvaḥ ā mimikṣuḥ dhṛṣṇuḥ vajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān

original: RV_06.029.03.2{01} vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svarṇa nṛtaviṣiro babhūtha
analyzed: vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe kam svarṇa nṛtaviṣiraḥ babhūtha

original: RV_06.029.04.1{01} sa soma āmiślatamaḥ suto bhūd yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santidhānāḥ
analyzed: sa somaḥ āmiślatamaḥ sutaḥ bhūt yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santidhānāḥ

original: RV_06.029.04.2{01} indraṃ nara stuvanto brahmakārā ukthā śaṃsanto devavātatamāḥ
analyzed: indram naraḥ stuvantaḥ brahma kārāḥ ukthā śaṃsantaḥ deva vātatamāḥ

original: RV_06.029.05.1{01} na te antaḥ śavaso dhāyyasya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā
analyzed: na te antaḥ śavasaḥ dhāyyasya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā

original: RV_06.029.05.2{01} ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujāno yūthevāpsu samījamāna ūtī
analyzed: ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ yūthā iva apsu samījamānaḥ ūtī

original: RV_06.029.06.1{01} evedindraḥ suhava ṛṣvo astūtī anūtī hiriśipraḥ satvā
analyzed: eva id indraḥ su havaḥ ṛṣvaḥ astūtī anūtī hiri śipraḥ satvā

original: RV_06.029.06.2{01} evā hi jāto asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn
analyzed: eva hi jātaḥ asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn

original: RV_06.030.01.1{02} bhūya id vāvṛdhe vīryāyaneko ajuryo dayate vasūni
analyzed: bhūyas id vāvṛdhe vīryāyanā ikaḥ ajuryaḥ dayate vasūni

original: RV_06.030.01.2{02} pra ririce diva indraḥ pṛthivyā ardhamidasya prati rodasī ubhe
analyzed: pra ririce divaḥ indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ ardhamidasya prati rodasī ubhe

original: RV_06.030.02.1{02} adhā manye bṛhadasuryamasya yāni dādhāra nakirā mināti
analyzed: adhā manye bṛhat asuḥ yamasya yāni dādhāra nakirā mināti

original: RV_06.030.02.2{02} dive-dive sūryo darśato bhūd vi sadmānyurviyā sukraturdhāt
analyzed: dive dive sūryaḥ darśataḥ bhūt vi sadmāni urviyā su kratuḥ dhāt

original: RV_06.030.03.1{02} adyā cin nū cit tadapo nadīnāṃ yadābhyo arado gātumindra
analyzed: adyā cit nu cit tat apaḥ nadīnām yat ābhyaḥ aradaḥ gātum indra

original: RV_06.030.03.2{02} ni parvatā admasado na sedustvayā dṛḷhāni sukrato rajāṃsi
analyzed: ni parvatāḥ adma sadaḥ na seduḥ tvayā dṛḍhāni su krato rajāṃsi

original: RV_06.030.04.1{02} satyamit tan na tvāvānanyo astīndra devo na martyo jyāyān
analyzed: satyam id tat na tvāvān anyaḥ asti indra devaḥ na martyaḥ jyāyān

original: RV_06.030.04.2{02} ahannahiṃ pariśayānamarṇo 'vāsṛjo apo achā samudram
analyzed: ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ vā asṛjaḥ apaḥ achā samudram

original: RV_06.030.05.1{02} tvamapo vi duro viṣūcīrindra dṛḷhamarujaḥ parvatasya
analyzed: tvam apaḥ vi duraḥ viṣūcīḥ indra dṛḍham arujaḥ parvatasya

original: RV_06.030.05.2{02} rājābhavo jagataścarṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyāmuṣāsam
analyzed: rājā abhavaḥ jagataḥ carṣaṇīnām sākam sūryam janayan dyām uṣāsam

original: RV_06.031.01.1{03} abhūreko rayipate rayīṇāmā hastayoradhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ
analyzed: abhūḥ ekaḥ rayi pate rayīṇām ā hastayoḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_06.031.01.2{03} vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre 'vocanta carṣaṇayo vivācaḥ
analyzed: vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre vocanta carṣaṇayaḥ vivācaḥ

original: RV_06.031.02.1{03} tvad bhiyendra pārthivāni viśvācyutā ciccyāvayante rajāṃsi
analyzed: tvat bhiyā indra pārthivāni viśvā acyutā cit cyāvayante rajāṃsi

original: RV_06.031.02.2{03} dyāvākṣāmā parvatāso vanāni viśvaṃ dṛḷhaṃ bhayate ajmannā te
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā parvatāsaḥ vanāni viśvam dṛḍham bhayate ajman na ā te

original: RV_06.031.03.1{03} tvaṃ kutsenābhi śuṣṇamindrāśuṣaṃ yudhya kuyavaṃ gaviṣṭau
analyzed: tvam kutsena abhi śuṣṇam indra aśuṣam yudhya kuyavam gaviṣṭau

original: RV_06.031.03.2{03} daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaścakramaviverapāṃsi
analyzed: daśa prapitve adha sūryasya

original: RV_06.031.04.1{03} tvaṃ śatānyava śambarasya puro jaghanthāpratīni sasyoḥ
analyzed: tvam śatāni ava śambarasya puraḥ jaghantha apratīni sasyoḥ

original: RV_06.031.04.2{03} aśikṣo yatra śacyā śacīvo divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni
analyzed: aśikṣaḥ yatra śacyā śacīvas divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni

original: RV_06.031.05.1{03} sa satyasatvan mahate raṇāya rathamā tiṣṭha tuvinṛmṇa bhīmam
analyzed: sa satya satvan mahate raṇāya rathamā tiṣṭha tuvi nṛmṇa bhīmam

original: RV_06.031.05.2{03} yāhi prapathinnavasopa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ
analyzed: yāhi prapathin navasā upa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ

original: RV_06.032.01.1{04} apūrvyā purutamānyasmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya
analyzed: apūrvyā purutamā anyasmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya

original: RV_06.032.01.2{04} virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsyāsā sthavirāya takṣam
analyzed: virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsi āsā sthavirāya takṣam

original: RV_06.032.02.1{04} sa mātarā sūryeṇā kavīnāmavāsayad rujadadriṃ gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: sa mātarā sūryeṇa kavīnām avāsayat rujat adrim gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_06.032.02.2{04} svādhībhirṛkvabhirvāvaśāna udusriyāṇāmasṛjan nidānam
analyzed: su ādhībhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvaśānaḥ udusriyāṇām asṛjat nidānam

original: RV_06.032.03.1{04} sa vahnibhirṛkvabhirgoṣu śaśvan mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya
analyzed: sa vahnibhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ goṣu śaśvat mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya

original: RV_06.032.03.2{04} puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san
analyzed: puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san

original: RV_06.032.04.1{04} sa nīvyābhirjaritāramachā maho vājebhirmahadbhiśca śuṣmaiḥ
analyzed: sa nīvyābhiḥ jaritāram achā mahaḥ vājebhiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca śuṣmaiḥ

original: RV_06.032.04.2{04} puruvīrābhirvṛṣabha kṣitīnāmā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi
analyzed: puru vīrābhiḥ vṛṣabha kṣitīnāmā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi

original: RV_06.032.05.1{04} sa sargeṇa śavasā takto atyairapa indro dakṣiṇatasturāṣāṭ
analyzed: sa sargeṇa śavasā taktaḥ atyaiḥ apaḥ indraḥ dakṣiṇatas turāṣāh

original: RV_06.032.05.2{04} itthā sṛjānā anapāvṛdarthaṃ dive-dive viviṣurapramṛṣyam
analyzed: itthā sṛjānāḥ anapāvṛt artham dive dive viviṣuḥ apramṛṣyam

original: RV_06.033.01.1{05} ya ojiṣṭha indra taṃ su no dā mado vṛṣan svabhiṣṭirdāsvān
analyzed: yaḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ indra tam su naḥ dāḥ madaḥ vṛṣan su abhiṣṭiḥ dāsvān

original: RV_06.033.01.2{05} sauvaśvyaṃ yo vanavat svaśvo vṛtrā samatsu sāsahadamitrān
analyzed: sauvaśvyam yaḥ vanavat su aśvaḥ vṛtrā samatsu sāsahat amitrān

original: RV_06.033.02.1{05} tvāṃ hīndrāvase vivāco havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau
analyzed: tvām hi indra avase vivācaḥ havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau

original: RV_06.033.02.2{05} tvaṃ viprebhirvi paṇīnraśāyastvota it sanitā vājamarvā
analyzed: tvam viprebhiḥ vi paṇīn raśāyaḥ tvotaḥ id sanitā vājamarvā

original: RV_06.033.03.1{05} tvaṃ tānindrobhayānamitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇyāryā ca śūra
analyzed: tvam tān indra ubhayān amitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā ca śūra

original: RV_06.033.03.2{05} vadhīrvaneva sudhitebhiratkairā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇāṃ nṛtama
analyzed: vadhīḥ vanā iva sudhitebhiḥ atkaiḥ ā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇām nṛtama

original: RV_06.033.04.1{05} sa tvaṃ na indrākavābhirūtī sakhā viśvāyuravitā vṛdhe bhūḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra akava abhirūtī sakhā viśvāyuḥ avitā vṛdhe bhūḥ

original: RV_06.033.04.2{05} svarṣātā yad dhvayāmasi tvā yudhyanto nemadhitāpṛtsu śūra
analyzed: svarṣātā yat hvayāmasi tvā yudhyantaḥ nemadhitā pṛtsu śūra

original: RV_06.033.05.1{05} nūnaṃ na indrāparāya ca syā bhavā mṛḷīka uta no abhiṣṭau
analyzed: nūnam naḥ indra aparāya ca syāḥ bhava mṛḍīke uta naḥ abhiṣṭau

original: RV_06.033.05.2{05} itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śarman divi ṣyāma pārye goṣatamāḥ
analyzed: itthā gṛṇantaḥ mahinasya śarman divi syāma pārye goṣatamāḥ

original: RV_06.034.01.1{06} saṃ ca tve jagmurgira indra pūrvīrvi ca tvad yanti vibhvomanīṣāḥ
analyzed: sam ca tve jagmuḥ giraḥ indra pūrvīḥ vi ca tvat yanti vibhvaḥ manīṣāḥ

original: RV_06.034.01.2{06} pūrā nūnaṃ ca stutaya ṛṣīṇāṃ paspṛdhra indre adhyukthārkā
analyzed: pūrā nūnam ca stutayaḥ ṛṣīṇām paspṛdhre indre adhi ukthā arkā

original: RV_06.034.02.1{06} puruhūto yaḥ purugūrta ṛbhvānekaḥ purupraśasto asti yajñaiḥ
analyzed: puruhūtaḥ yaḥ puru gūrtaḥ ṛbhvān ekaḥ puru praśastaḥ asti yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.034.02.2{06} ratho na mahe śavase yujāno 'smābhirindro anumādyo bhūt
analyzed: rathaḥ na mahe śavase yujānaḥ smābhiḥ indraḥ anumādyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_06.034.03.1{06} na yaṃ hiṃsanti dhītayo na vāṇīrindraṃ nakṣantīdabhi vardhayantīḥ
analyzed: na yam hiṃsanti dhītayaḥ na vāṇīḥ indram nakṣanti id abhi vardhayantīḥ

original: RV_06.034.03.2{06} yadi stotāraḥ śataṃ yat sahasraṃ gṛṇanti girvaṇasaṃ śaṃ tadasmai
analyzed: yadi stotāraḥ śatam yat sahasram gṛṇanti girvaṇasam śam tat asmai

original: RV_06.034.04.1{06} asmā etad divyarceva māsā mimikṣa indre nyayāmi somaḥ
analyzed: asmai etat divyā ṛcā iva māsā mimikṣe indre nyayāmi somaḥ

original: RV_06.034.04.2{06} janaṃ na dhanvannabhi saṃ yadāpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhurhavanāni yajñaiḥ
analyzed: janam na dhanvan abhi sam yadā āpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhuḥ havanāni yajñaiḥ

original: RV_06.034.05.1{06} asmā etan mahyāṅgūṣamasmā indrāya stotraṃ matibhiravāci
analyzed: asmai etat mahya āṅgūṣam asmai indrāya stotram matibhiḥ avāci

original: RV_06.034.05.2{06} asad yathā mahati vṛtratūrya indro viśvāyuravitā vṛdhaśca
analyzed: asat yathā mahati vṛtratūrye indraḥ viśvāyuḥ avitā vṛdhaḥ ca

original: RV_06.035.01.1{07} kadā bhuvan rathakṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasrapoṣyandāḥ
analyzed: kadā bhuvan ratha kṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasra poṣyandāḥ

original: RV_06.035.01.2{07} kadā stomaṃ vāsayo 'sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vājaratnāḥ
analyzed: kadā stomam vāsayaḥ sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_06.035.02.1{07} karhi svit tadindra yan nṛbhirnṝn vīrairvīrān nīḷayāse jayājīn
analyzed: karhi svid tat indra yat nṛbhiḥ nṝn vīraiḥ vīrān nīḍayāse jaya ājīn

original: RV_06.035.02.2{07} tridhātu gā adhi jayāsi goṣvindra dyumnaṃsvarvad dhehyasme
analyzed: tri dhātu gāḥ adhi jayāsi goṣu indra dyumnam svarvat dhehi asme

original: RV_06.035.03.1{07} karhi svit tadindra yajjaritre viṣvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha
analyzed: karhi svid tat indra yat jaritre viṣu apsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha

original: RV_06.035.03.2{07} kadā dhiyo na niyuto yuvāse kadā gomaghā havanāni gachāḥ
analyzed: kadā dhiyaḥ na niyutaḥ yuvāse kadā go maghā havanāni gachāḥ

original: RV_06.035.04.1{07} sa gomaghā jaritre aśvaścandrā vājaśravaso adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ
analyzed: sa go maghāḥ jaritre aśva ścandrāḥ vāja śravasaḥ adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ

original: RV_06.035.04.2{07} pīpihīṣaḥ sudughāmindra dhenuṃ bharadvājeṣu suruco rurucyāḥ
analyzed: pīpihi iṣaḥ su dughām indra dhenum bharadvājeṣu su rucaḥ rurucyāḥ

original: RV_06.035.05.1{07} tamā nūnaṃ vṛjanamanyathā cicchūro yacchakra vi durogṛṇīṣe
analyzed: tamā nūnam vṛjanam anyathā cit śūraḥ yat śakra vi durogṛṇīṣe

original: RV_06.035.05.2{07} mā niraraṃ śukradughasya dhenorāṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva
analyzed: mā niraram śukra dughasya dhenoḥ āṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva

original: RV_06.036.01.1{08} satrā madāsastava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyo 'dha ye pārthivāsaḥ
analyzed: satrā madāsaḥ tava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyaḥ dha ye pārthivāsaḥ

original: RV_06.036.01.2{08} satrā vājānāmabhavo vibhaktā yad deveṣu dhārayathā asuryam
analyzed: satrā vājānām abhavaḥ vibhaktā yat deveṣu dhārayathāḥ asuryam

original: RV_06.036.02.1{08} anu pra yeje jana ojo asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya
analyzed: anu pra yeje janaḥ ojaḥ asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya

original: RV_06.036.02.2{08} syūmagṛbhe dudhaye 'rvate ca kratuṃ vṛñjantyapi vṛtrahatye
analyzed: syūmagṛbhe dudhaye rvate ca kratum vṛñjanti api vṛtra hatye

original: RV_06.036.03.1{08} taṃ sadhrīcīrūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścurindram
analyzed: tam sadhrīcīḥ ūtayaḥ vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścuḥ indram

original: RV_06.036.03.2{08} samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ giraā viśanti
analyzed: samudram na sindhavaḥ uktha śuṣmāḥ uru vyacasam giraā viśanti

original: RV_06.036.04.1{08} sa rāyas khāmupa sṛjā gṛṇānaḥ puruścandrasya tvamindravasvaḥ
analyzed: sa rāyaḥ khām upa sṛja gṛṇānaḥ puru ścandrasya tvam indra vasvaḥ

original: RV_06.036.04.2{08} patirbabhūthāsamo janānāmeko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā
analyzed: patiḥ babhūtha asamaḥ janānām ekaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_06.036.05.1{08} sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yo duvoyurdyaurna bhūmābhi rāyoaryaḥ
analyzed: sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yaḥ duvoyuḥ dyauḥ na bhūmā abhi rāyoaryaḥ

original: RV_06.036.05.2{08} aso yathā naḥ śavasā cakāno yuge-yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ
analyzed: asaḥ yathā naḥ śavasā cakānaḥ yuge yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ

original: RV_06.037.01.1{09} arvāg rathaṃ viśvavāraṃ ta ugrendra yuktāso harayo vahantu
analyzed: arvāk ratham viśva vāram te ugra indra yuktāsaḥ harayaḥ vahantu

original: RV_06.037.01.2{09} kīriścid dhi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādasteadya
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādaste adya

original: RV_06.037.02.1{09} pro droṇe harayaḥ karmāgman punānāsa ṛjyanto abhūvan
analyzed: pra u droṇe harayaḥ karma agman punānāsaḥ ṛjyantaḥ abhūvan

original: RV_06.037.02.2{09} indro no asya pūrvyaḥ papīyād dyukṣo madasya somyasya rājā
analyzed: indraḥ naḥ asya pūrvyaḥ papīyāt dyukṣaḥ madasya somyasya rājā

original: RV_06.037.03.1{09} āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānamachendraṃ sucakre rathyāso aśvāḥ
analyzed: āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānam acha indram su cakre rathyāsaḥ aśvāḥ

original: RV_06.037.03.2{09} abhi śrava ṛjyanto vaheyurnū cin nu vāyoramṛtaṃ vidasyet
analyzed: abhi śravaḥ ṛjyantaḥ vaheyuḥ nu cit nu vāyoḥ amṛtam vidasyet

original: RV_06.037.04.1{09} variṣṭho asya dakṣiṇāmiyartīndro maghonāṃ tuvikūrmitamaḥ
analyzed: variṣṭhaḥ asya dakṣiṇām iyarti indraḥ maghonām tuvikūrmitamaḥ

original: RV_06.037.04.2{09} yayā vajrivaḥ pariyāsyaṃho maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn
analyzed: yayā vajrivas pariyāsi aṃhaḥ maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn

original: RV_06.037.05.1{09} indro vājasya sthavirasya dātendro gīrbhirvardhatāṃ vṛddhamahāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ vājasya sthavirasya dātā indraḥ gīrbhiḥ vardhatām vṛddha mahāḥ

original: RV_06.037.05.2{09} indro vṛtraṃ haniṣṭho astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram haniṣṭhaḥ astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ

original: RV_06.038.01.1{10} apādita udu naścitratamo mahīṃ bharṣad dyumatīmindrahūtim
analyzed: a pāditaḥ udu naḥ citratamaḥ mahīm bharṣat dyumatīm indra hūtim

original: RV_06.038.01.2{10} panyasīṃ dhītiṃ daivyasya yāmañ janasya rātiṃ vanate sudānuḥ
analyzed: panyasīm dhītim daivyasya yāmam janasya rātim vanate sudānuḥ

original: RV_06.038.02.1{10} dūrāccidā vasato asya karṇā ghoṣādindrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ
analyzed: dūrāt cidā vasataḥ asya karṇā ghoṣāt indrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ

original: RV_06.038.02.2{10} eyamenaṃ devahūtirvavṛtyān madryagindramiyam ṛcyamānā
analyzed: ā iyam enam deva hūtiḥ vavṛtyāt madryak indram iyam ṛcyamānā

original: RV_06.038.03.1{10} taṃ vo dhiyā paramayā purājāmajaramindramabhyanūṣyarkaiḥ
analyzed: tam vaḥ dhiyā paramayā purā ajām ajaram indram abhyanūṣya arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.038.03.2{10} brahmā ca giro dadhire samasmin mahāṃśca stomo adhi vardhadindre
analyzed: brahmā ca giraḥ dadhire samasmin mahān ca stomaḥ adhi vardhat indre

original: RV_06.038.04.1{10} vardhād yaṃ yajña uta soma indraṃ vardhād brahma gira ukthā ca manma
analyzed: vardhāt yam yajñaḥ uta somaḥ indram vardhāt brahma giraḥ ukthā ca manma

original: RV_06.038.04.2{10} vardhāhainamuṣaso yāmannaktorvardhān māsāḥ śarado dyāva indram
analyzed: vardha aha enam uṣasaḥ yāman naktoḥ vardhāt māsāḥ śaradaḥ dyāvaḥ indram

original: RV_06.038.05.1{10} evā jajñānaṃ sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānaṃ rādhase ca śrutāya
analyzed: eva jajñānam sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānam rādhase ca śrutāya

original: RV_06.038.05.2{10} mahāmugramavase vipra nūnamā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu
analyzed: mahām ugram avase vipra nūnam ā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu

original: RV_06.039.01.1{11} mandrasya kaverdivyasya vahnervipramanmano vacanasya madhvaḥ
analyzed: mandrasya kaveḥ divyasya vahneḥ vipra manmanaḥ vacanasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_06.039.01.2{11} apā nastasya sacanasya deveṣo yuvasva gṛṇate goagrāḥ
analyzed: apāḥ nastasya sacanasya deva iṣaḥ yuvasva gṛṇate go agrāḥ

original: RV_06.039.02.1{11} ayamuśānaḥ paryadrimusra ṛtadhītibhirṛtayug yujānaḥ
analyzed: ayam uśānaḥ paryadrim usraḥ ṛta dhītibhiḥ ṛta yuj yujānaḥ

original: RV_06.039.02.2{11} rujadarugṇaṃ vi valasya sānuṃ paṇīnrvacobhirabhi yodhadindraḥ
analyzed: rujat arugṇam vi valasya sānum paṇīn rvacobhiḥ abhi yodhat indraḥ

original: RV_06.039.03.1{11} ayaṃ dyotayadadyuto vyaktūn doṣā vastoḥ śarada indurindra
analyzed: ayam dyotayat adyutaḥ vyaktūn doṣā vastoḥ śaradaḥ induḥ indra

original: RV_06.039.03.2{11} imaṃ ketumadadhurnū cidahnāṃ śucijanmana uṣasaścakāra
analyzed: imam ketum adadhuḥ nu cit ahnām śuci janmanaḥ uṣasaḥ cakāra

original: RV_06.039.04.1{11} ayaṃ rocayadaruco rucāno 'yaṃ vāsayad vy ṛtena pūrvīḥ
analyzed: ayam rocayat arucaḥ rucānaḥ yam vāsayat vi ṛtena pūrvīḥ

original: RV_06.039.04.2{11} ayamīyata ṛtayugbhiraśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇiprāḥ
analyzed: ayam īyate ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_06.039.05.1{11} nū gṛṇāno gṛṇate pratna rājanniṣaḥ pinva vasudeyāya pūrvīḥ
analyzed: nu gṛṇānaḥ gṛṇate pratna rājan iṣaḥ pinva vasu deyāya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_06.039.05.2{11} apa oṣadhīraviṣā vanāni gā arvato nṝn ṛcase rirīhi
analyzed: apaḥ oṣadhīḥ raviṣāḥ vanāni gāḥ arvataḥ nṝn ṛcase rirīhi

original: RV_06.040.01.1{12} indra piba tubhyaṃ suto madāyāva sya harī vi mucā sakhāyā
analyzed: indra piba tubhyam sutaḥ madāya ava sya harī vi muca sakhāyā

original: RV_06.040.01.2{12} uta pra gāya gaṇa ā niṣadyāthā yajñāya gṛṇate vayo dhāḥ
analyzed: uta pra gāya gaṇe ā niṣadya athā yajñāya gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_06.040.02.1{12} asya piba yasya jajñāna indra madāya kratve apibo virapśin
analyzed: asya piba yasya jajñānaḥ indra madāya kratve apibaḥ virapśin

original: RV_06.040.02.2{12} tamu te gāvo nara āpo adririnduṃ samahyan pītaye samasmai
analyzed: tam u te gāvaḥ naraḥ āpaḥ adriḥ indum samahyan pītaye samasmai

original: RV_06.040.03.1{12} samiddhe agnau suta indra soma ā tvā vahantu harayo vahiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: samiddhe agnau sute indra some ā tvā vahantu harayaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_06.040.03.2{12} tvāyatā manasā johavīmīndrā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ
analyzed: tvāyatā manasā johavīmi indra ā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ

original: RV_06.040.04.1{12} ā yāhi śaśvaduśatā yayāthendra mahā manasā somapeyam
analyzed: ā yāhi śaśvat uśatā yayātha indra mahā manasā soma peyam

original: RV_06.040.04.2{12} upa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā no 'thā te yajñastanve vayo dhāt
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi śṛṇave imā naḥ thā te yajña stanve vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_06.040.05.1{12} yadindra divi pārye yad ṛdhag yad vā sve sadane yatra vāsi
analyzed: yat indra divi pārye yat ṛdhak yat vā sve sadane yatra vā asi

original: RV_06.040.05.2{12} ato no yajñamavase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ
analyzed: atas naḥ yajñam avase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: RV_06.041.01.1{13} aheḷamāna upa yāhi yajñaṃ tubhyaṃ pavanta indavaḥ sutāsaḥ
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ upa yāhi yajñam tubhyam pavante indavaḥ sutāsaḥ

original: RV_06.041.01.2{13} gāvo na vajrin svamoko achendrā gahi prathamo yajñiyānām
analyzed: gāvaḥ na vajrin sva mokaḥ achā indra ā gahi prathamaḥ yajñiyānām

original: RV_06.041.02.1{13} yā te kākut sukṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhva ūrmim
analyzed: yā te kākud su kṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhvaḥ ūrmim

original: RV_06.041.02.2{13} tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryurasthāt saṃ te vajrovartatāmindra gavyuḥ
analyzed: tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryuḥ asthāt sam te vajraḥ vartatām indra gavyuḥ

original: RV_06.041.03.1{13} eṣa drapso vṛṣabho viśvarūpa indrāya vṛṣṇe samakāri somaḥ
analyzed: eṣa drapsaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ viśva rūpaḥ indrāya vṛṣṇe samakāri somaḥ

original: RV_06.041.03.2{13} etaṃ piba hariva sthātarugra yasyeśiṣe pradivi yasteannam
analyzed: etam piba harivas sthātar ugra yasya īśiṣe pradivi yaḥ te annam

original: RV_06.041.04.1{13} sutaḥ somo asutādindra vasyānayaṃ śreyāñcikituṣe raṇāya
analyzed: sutaḥ somaḥ a sutāt indra vasyā anayam śreyān cikituṣe raṇāya

original: RV_06.041.04.2{13} etaṃ titirva upa yāhi yajñaṃ tena viśvāstaviṣīrā pṛṇasva
analyzed: etam titirvaḥ upa yāhi yajñam tena viśva asta viṣīrā pṛṇasva

original: RV_06.041.05.1{13} hvayāmasi tvendra yāhyarvāṃ araṃ te somastanve bhavāti
analyzed: hvayāmasi tvā indra yāhi arvān aram te somaḥ tanve bhavāti

original: RV_06.041.05.2{13} śatakrato mādayasvā suteṣu prāsmānava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu
analyzed: śatakrato mādayasva suteṣu pra asmān ava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu

original: RV_06.042.01.1{14} pratyasmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara
analyzed: prati asmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara

original: RV_06.042.01.2{14} araṃgamāya jagmaye 'paścāddaghvane nare
analyzed: araṃgamāya jagmaye paścāddaghvane nare

original: RV_06.042.02.1{14} emenaṃ pratyetana somebhiḥ somapātamam
analyzed: ā īm enam pratyetana somebhiḥ soma pātamam

original: RV_06.042.02.2{14} amatrebhirṛjīṣiṇamindraṃ sutebhirindubhiḥ
analyzed: amatrebhiḥ ṛjīṣiṇam indram sutebhiḥ indubhiḥ

original: RV_06.042.03.1{14} yadī sutebhirindubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha
analyzed: yadī sutebhiḥ indubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha

original: RV_06.042.03.2{14} vedā viśvasya medhiro dhṛṣat taṃ-tamideṣate
analyzed: veda viśvasya medhiraḥ dhṛṣat

original: RV_06.042.04.1{14} asmā-asmā idandhaso 'dhvaryo pra bharā sutam
analyzed: asmai asmai id andhasaḥ dhvaryo pra bhara sutam

original: RV_06.042.04.2{14} kuvit samasya jenyasya śardhato 'bhiśasteravasparat
analyzed: kuvid samasya jenyasya śardhataḥ bhiśasteḥ avasparat

original: RV_06.043.01.1{15} yasya tyacchambaraṃ made divodāsāya randhayaḥ
analyzed: yasya tyad śambaram made divodāsāya randhayaḥ

original: RV_06.043.01.2{15} ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba
analyzed: ayam sa somaḥ indra te sutaḥ piba

original: RV_06.043.02.1{15} yasya tīvrasutaṃ madaṃ madhyamantaṃ ca rakṣase
analyzed: yasya tīvra sutam madam madhyamantam ca rakṣase
ayam sa

original: RV_06.043.03.1{15} yasya gā antaraśmano made dṛḷhā avāsṛjaḥ
analyzed: yasya gāḥ anta raśmanaḥ made dṛḍhāḥ avāsṛjaḥ
ayam sa

original: RV_06.043.04.1{15} yasya mandāno andhaso māghonaṃ dadhiṣe śavaḥ
analyzed: yasya mandānaḥ andhasaḥ māghonam dadhiṣe śavaḥ
ayam sa

original: RV_06.044.01.1{16} yo rayivo rayintamo yo dyumnairdyumnavattamaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ rayivas rayintamaḥ yaḥ dyumnaiḥ dyumnavattamaḥ

original: RV_06.044.01.2{16} somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ saḥ indra te sti svadhā pate madaḥ

original: RV_06.044.02.1{16} yaḥ śagmastuviśagma te rāyo dāmā matīnām
analyzed: yaḥ śagma stuvi śagma te rāyaḥ dāmā matīnām
somaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_06.044.03.1{16} yena vṛddho na śavasā turo na svābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: yena vṛddhaḥ na śavasā turaḥ na svābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ
somaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_06.044.04.1{16} tyamu vo aprahaṇaṃ gṛṇīṣe śavasas patim
analyzed: tyamu vaḥ a prahaṇam gṛṇīṣe śavasaḥ patim

original: RV_06.044.04.2{16} indraṃ viśvāsāhaṃ naraṃ maṃhiṣṭhaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim
analyzed: indram viśvāsāham naram maṃhiṣṭham viśvacarṣaṇim

original: RV_06.044.05.1{16} yaṃ vardhayantīd giraḥ patiṃ turasya rādhasaḥ
analyzed: yam vardhayanti id giraḥ patim turasya rādhasaḥ

original: RV_06.044.05.2{16} taminnvasya rodasī devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ
analyzed: tamin u asya rodasī devī śuṣmam saparyataḥ

original: RV_06.044.06.1{17} tad va ukthasya barhaṇendrāyopastṛṇīṣaṇi
analyzed: tat vaḥ ukthasya barhaṇā indrāya upastṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_06.044.06.2{17} vipo na yasyotayo vi yad rohanti sakṣitaḥ
analyzed: vipaḥ na yasya ūtayaḥ vi yat rohanti sakṣitaḥ

original: RV_06.044.07.1{17} avidad dakṣaṃ mitro navīyān papāno devebhyo vasyo acait
analyzed: avidat dakṣam mitraḥ navīyān papānaḥ devebhyaḥ vasyaḥ acait

original: RV_06.044.07.2{17} sasavān staulābhirdhautarībhiruruṣyā pāyurabhavat sakhibhyaḥ
analyzed: sasavān staulābhiḥ dhautarībhiḥ uruṣyā pāyuḥ abhavat sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_06.044.08.1{17} ṛtasya pathi vedhā apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāso akran
analyzed: ṛtasya pathi vedhāḥ apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāsaḥ akran

original: RV_06.044.08.2{17} dadhāno nāma maho vacobhirvapurdṛśaye venyo vyāvaḥ
analyzed: dadhānaḥ nāma mahaḥ vacobhiḥ vapuḥ dṛśaye venyaḥ vyāvaḥ

original: RV_06.044.09.1{17} dyumattamaṃ dakṣaṃ dhehyasme sedhā janānāṃ pūrvīrarātīḥ
analyzed: dyumattamam dakṣam dhehi asme sedha janānām pūrvīḥ arātīḥ

original: RV_06.044.09.2{17} varṣīyo vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhirdhanasya sātāvasmānaviḍḍhi
analyzed: varṣīyaḥ vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhiḥ dhanasya sātau asmān aviḍḍhi

original: RV_06.044.10.1{17} indra tubhyamin maghavannabhūma vayaṃ dātre harivo mā vivenaḥ
analyzed: indra tubhyam id maghavan abhūma vayam dātre harivas mā vivenaḥ

original: RV_06.044.10.2{17} nakirāpirdadṛśe martyatrā kimaṅga radhracodanantvāhuḥ
analyzed: nakir āpiḥ dadṛśe martyatrā kim aṅga radhra codanan tu āhuḥ

original: RV_06.044.11.1{18} mā jasvane vṛṣabha no rarīthā mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma
analyzed: mā jasvane vṛṣabha naḥ rarīthāḥ mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma

original: RV_06.044.11.2{18} pūrvīṣ ṭa indra niṣṣidho janeṣu jahyasuṣvīn pra vṛhāpṛṇataḥ
analyzed: pūrvīḥ te indra niṣṣidhaḥ janeṣu jahi asuṣvīn pra vṛha apṛṇataḥ

original: RV_06.044.12.1{18} udabhrāṇīva stanayanniyartīndro rādhāṃsyaśvyāni gavyā
analyzed: udabhrāṇi iva stanayan iyarti indraḥ rādhāṃsi aśvyāni gavyā

original: RV_06.044.12.2{18} tvamasi pradivaḥ kārudhāyā mā tvādāmāna ā dabhanmaghonaḥ
analyzed: tvam asi pradivaḥ kāru dhāyāḥ mā tvā a dāmānaḥ ā dabhan maghonaḥ

original: RV_06.044.13.1{18} adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānāmindrāya bhara sa hyasya rājā
analyzed: adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānām indrāya bhara sa hi asya rājā

original: RV_06.044.13.2{18} yaḥ pūrvyābhiruta nūtanābhirgīrbhirvāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyābhiḥ uta nūtanābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_06.044.14.1{18} asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvānindro vṛtrāṇyapratī jaghāna
analyzed: asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvān indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghāna

original: RV_06.044.14.2{18} tamu pra hoṣi madhumantamasmai somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai
analyzed: tam u pra hoṣi madhumantam asmai somam vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai

original: RV_06.044.15.1{18} pātā sutamindro astu somaṃ hantā vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ
analyzed: pātā sutam indraḥ astu somam hantā vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ

original: RV_06.044.15.2{18} gantā yajñaṃ parāvataścidachā vasurdhīnāmavitā kārudhāyāḥ
analyzed: gantā yajñam parāvataḥ cit achā vasuḥ dhīnām avitā kāru dhāyāḥ

original: RV_06.044.16.1{19} idaṃ tyat pātramindrapānamindrasya priyamamṛtamapāyi
analyzed: idam tyad pātram indra pānam indrasya priyam amṛtam apāyi

original: RV_06.044.16.2{19} matsad yathā saumanasāya devaṃ vyasmad dveṣo yuyavad vyaṃhaḥ
analyzed: matsat yathā saumanasāya devam vi asmat dveṣaḥ yuyavat vi aṃhaḥ

original: RV_06.044.17.1{19} enā mandāno jahi śūra śatrūñ jāmimajāmiṃ maghavannamitrān
analyzed: enā mandānaḥ jahi śūra śatrūm jāmim ajāmim maghavan amitrān

original: RV_06.044.17.2{19} abhiṣeṇānabhyādediśānān parāca indra pra mṛṇājahī ca
analyzed: abhiṣeṇān abhyādediśānān parācaḥ indra pra mṛṇa ajahi ca

original: RV_06.044.18.1{19} āsu ṣmā ṇo maghavannindra pṛtsvasmabhyaṃ mahi varivaḥ sugaṃ kaḥ
analyzed: āsu sma naḥ maghavan indra pṛtsu asmabhyam mahi varivaḥ su gam kaḥ

original: RV_06.044.18.2{19} apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣa indra sūrīn kṛṇuhismā no ardham
analyzed: apām tokasya tanayasya jeṣe indra sūrīn kṛṇuhisma naḥ ardham

original: RV_06.044.19.1{19} ā tvā harayo vṛṣaṇo yujānā vṛṣarathāso vṛṣaraśmayo 'tyāḥ
analyzed: ā tvā harayaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yujānāḥ vṛṣa rathāsaḥ vṛṣa raśmayaḥ tyāḥ

original: RV_06.044.19.2{19} asmatrāñco vṛṣaṇo vajravāho vṛṣṇe madāya suyujovahantu
analyzed: asmatrāñcaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vajra vāhaḥ vṛṣṇe madāya su yujaḥ vahantu

original: RV_06.044.20.1{19} ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇo droṇamasthurghṛtapruṣo normayo madantaḥ
analyzed: ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ droṇam asthuḥ ghṛta pruṣaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ

original: RV_06.044.20.2{19} indra pra tubhyaṃ vṛṣabhiḥ sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe bharantivṛṣabhāya somam
analyzed: indra pra tubhyam vṛṣabhiḥ sutānām vṛṣṇe bharanti vṛṣabhāya somam

original: RV_06.044.21.1{20} vṛṣāsi divo vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyā vṛṣā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabhastiyānām
analyzed: vṛṣā asi divaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vṛṣā sindhūnām vṛṣabhastiyānām

original: RV_06.044.21.2{20} vṛṣṇe ta indurvṛṣabha pīpāya svādū raso madhupeyo varāya
analyzed: vṛṣṇe te induḥ vṛṣabha pīpāya svāduḥ rasaḥ madhu peyaḥ varāya

original: RV_06.044.22.1{20} ayaṃ devaḥ sahasā jāyamāna indreṇa yujā paṇimastabhāyat
analyzed: ayam devaḥ sahasā jāyamānaḥ indreṇa yujā paṇim astabhāyat

original: RV_06.044.22.2{20} ayaṃ svasya piturāyudhānīnduramuṣṇādaśivasya māyāḥ
analyzed: ayam svasya pituḥ āyudhāni induḥ amuṣṇāt aśivasya māyāḥ

original: RV_06.044.23.1{20} ayamakṛṇoduṣasaḥ supatnīrayaṃ sūrye adadhājjyotirantaḥ
analyzed: ayam akṛṇot uṣasaḥ su patnīḥ ayam sūrye adadhāt jyotiḥ antar

original: RV_06.044.23.2{20} ayaṃ tridhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindadamṛtaṃ nigūḷham
analyzed: ayam tri dhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindat amṛtam nigūḍham

original: RV_06.044.24.1{20} ayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vi ṣkabhāyadayaṃ rathamayunak saptaraśmim
analyzed: ayam dyāvāpṛthivī vi skabhāyat ayam ratham ayunak sapta raśmim

original: RV_06.044.24.2{20} ayaṃ goṣu śacyā pakvamantaḥ somo dādhāra daśayantramutsam
analyzed: ayam goṣu śacyā pakvam antar somaḥ dādhāra daśa yantram utsam

original: RV_06.045.01.1{21} ya ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśaṃ yadum
analyzed: yaḥ ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśam yadum

original: RV_06.045.01.2{21} indraḥ sano yuvā sakhā
analyzed: indraḥ sanaḥ yuvā sakhā

original: RV_06.045.02.1{21} avipre cid vayo dadhadanāśunā cidarvatā
analyzed: a vipre cit vayaḥ dadhat anāśunā cit arvatā

original: RV_06.045.02.2{21} indro jetā hitaṃ dhanam
analyzed: indraḥ jetā hitam dhanam

original: RV_06.045.03.1{21} mahīrasya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīruta praśastayaḥ
analyzed: mahīḥ asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_06.045.03.2{21} nāsya kṣīyanta ūtayaḥ
analyzed: na asya kṣīyante ūtayaḥ

original: RV_06.045.04.1{21} sakhāyo brahmavāhase 'rcata pra ca gāyata
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ brahma vāhase rcata pra ca gāyata

original: RV_06.045.04.2{21} sa hi naḥ pramatirmahī
analyzed: sa hi naḥ pramatiḥ mahī

original: RV_06.045.05.1{21} tvamekasya vṛtrahannavitā dvayorasi
analyzed: tvam ekasya vṛtrahan avitā dvayoḥ asi

original: RV_06.045.05.2{21} utedṛśe yathā vayam
analyzed: uta īdṛśe yathā vayam

original: RV_06.045.06.1{22} nayasīd vati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣyukthaśaṃsinaḥ
analyzed: nayasi id vati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣi uktha śaṃsinaḥ

original: RV_06.045.06.2{22} nṛbhiḥ suvīra ucyase
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ su vīraḥ ucyase

original: RV_06.045.07.1{22} brahmāṇaṃ brahmavāhasaṃ gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam
analyzed: brahmāṇam brahma vāhasam gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_06.045.07.2{22} gāṃna dohase huve
analyzed: gāṃna dohase huve

original: RV_06.045.08.1{22} yasya viśvāni hastayorūcurvasūni ni dvitā
analyzed: yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ ūcuḥ vasūni ni dvitā

original: RV_06.045.08.2{22} vīrasya pṛtanāṣahaḥ
analyzed: vīrasya pṛtanāṣahaḥ

original: RV_06.045.09.1{22} vi dṛḷhāni cidadrivo janānāṃ śacīpate
analyzed: vi dṛḍhāni cit adrivas janānām śacīpate

original: RV_06.045.09.2{22} vṛha māyā anānata
analyzed: vṛha māyāḥ an ānata

original: RV_06.045.10.1{22} tamu tvā satya somapā indra vājānāṃ pate
analyzed: tam u tvā satya soma pāḥ indra vājānām pate

original: RV_06.045.10.2{22} ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_06.045.11.1{23} tamu tvā yaḥ purāsitha yo vā nūnaṃ hite dhane
analyzed: tam u tvā yaḥ purā āsitha yaḥ vā nūnam hite dhane

original: RV_06.045.11.2{23} havyaḥsa śrudhī havam
analyzed: havyaḥ sa śrudhi havam

original: RV_06.045.12.1{23} dhībhirarvadbhirarvato vājānindra śravāyyān
analyzed: dhībhiḥ arvadbhiḥ arvataḥ vājān indra śravāyyān

original: RV_06.045.12.2{23} tvayā jeṣma hitaṃ dhanam
analyzed: tvayā jeṣma hitam dhanam

original: RV_06.045.13.1{23} abhūru vīra girvaṇo mahānindra dhane hite
analyzed: abhūru vīra girvaṇaḥ mahān indra dhane hite

original: RV_06.045.13.2{23} bhare vitantasāyyaḥ
analyzed: bhare vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_06.045.14.1{23} yā ta ūtiramitrahan makṣūjavastamāsati
analyzed: yā te ūtiḥ amitra han makṣūjavastamā asati

original: RV_06.045.14.2{23} tayā no hinuhī ratham
analyzed: tayā naḥ hinuhi ratham

original: RV_06.045.15.1{23} sa rathena rathītamo 'smākenābhiyugvanā
analyzed: sa rathena rathītamaḥ smākena abhiyugvanā

original: RV_06.045.15.2{23} jeṣi jiṣṇo hitaṃ dhanam
analyzed: jeṣi jiṣṇo hitam dhanam

original: RV_06.045.16.1{24} ya eka it tamu ṣṭuhi kṛṣṭīnāṃ vicarṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id tamu stuhi kṛṣṭīnām vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_06.045.16.2{24} patirjajñe vṛṣakratuḥ
analyzed: patiḥ jajñe vṛṣa kratuḥ

original: RV_06.045.17.1{24} yo gṛṇatāmidāsithāpirūtī śivaḥ sakhā
analyzed: yaḥ gṛṇatām id asitha apirūtī śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_06.045.17.2{24} sa tvaṃna indra mṛḷaya
analyzed: sa tvaṃnaḥ indra mṛḍaya

original: RV_06.045.18.1{24} dhiṣva vajraṃ gabhastyo rakṣohatyāya vajrivaḥ
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram gabhastyoḥ rakṣaḥ hatyāya vajrivas

original: RV_06.045.18.2{24} sāsahīṣṭhā abhi spṛdhaḥ
analyzed: sāsahīṣṭhāḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_06.045.19.1{24} pratnaṃ rayīṇāṃ yujaṃ sakhāyaṃ kīricodanam
analyzed: pratnam rayīṇām yujam sakhāyam kīri codanam

original: RV_06.045.19.2{24} brahmavāhastamaṃ huve
analyzed: brahma vāhastamam huve

original: RV_06.045.20.1{24} sa hi viśvāni pārthivāneko vasūni patyate
analyzed: sa hi viśvāni pārthivān ekaḥ vasūni patyate

original: RV_06.045.20.2{24} girvaṇastamo adhriguḥ
analyzed: girvaṇastamaḥ adhriguḥ

original: RV_06.045.21.1{25} sa no niyudbhirā pṛṇa kāmaṃ vājebhiraśvibhiḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ niyudbhiḥ ā pṛṇa kāmam vājebhiḥ aśvibhiḥ

original: RV_06.045.21.2{25} gomadbhirgopate dhṛṣat
analyzed: gomadbhiḥ gopate dhṛṣat

original: RV_06.045.22.1{25} tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane
analyzed: tat vaḥ gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane

original: RV_06.045.22.2{25} śaṃ yad gave
analyzed: śam yat gave
na śākine

original: RV_06.045.23.1{25} na ghā vasurni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ
analyzed: na ghā vasuḥ ni yamate dānam vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_06.045.23.2{25} yat sīmupa śravad giraḥ
analyzed: yat sīmupa śravat giraḥ

original: RV_06.045.24.1{25} kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat
analyzed: kuvitsasya pra hi vrajam gomantam dasyu hā gamat

original: RV_06.045.24.2{25} śacībhirapa no varat
analyzed: śacībhiḥ apa naḥ varat

original: RV_06.045.25.1{25} imā u tvā śatakrato 'bhi pra ṇonuvurgiraḥ
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā śatakrato bhi pra nonuvuḥ giraḥ

original: RV_06.045.25.2{25} indra vatsaṃna mātaraḥ
analyzed: indra vatsaṃna mātaraḥ

original: RV_06.045.26.1{26} dūṇāśaṃ sakhyaṃ tava gaurasi vīra gavyate
analyzed: dūṇāśam sakhyam tava gauḥ asi vīra gavyate

original: RV_06.045.26.2{26} aśvo aśvāyate bhava
analyzed: aśvaḥ aśvāyate bhava

original: RV_06.045.27.1{26} sa mandasvā hyandhaso ...
analyzed: sa mandasva hi andhasaḥ

original: RV_06.045.28.1{26} imā u tvā sute-sute nakṣante girvaṇo giraḥ
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā sute sute nakṣante girvaṇaḥ giraḥ

original: RV_06.045.28.2{26} vatsaṃ gāvona dhenavaḥ
analyzed: vatsam gāvona dhenavaḥ

original: RV_06.045.29.1{26} purūtamaṃ purūṇāṃ stotṝṇāṃ vivāci
analyzed: purūtamam purūṇām stotṝṇām vivāci

original: RV_06.045.29.2{26} vājebhirvājayatām
analyzed: vājebhiḥ vājayatām

original: RV_06.045.30.1{26} asmākamindra bhūtu te stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ
analyzed: asmākam indra bhūtu te stomaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ antamaḥ

original: RV_06.045.30.2{26} asmān rāye mahe hinu
analyzed: asmān rāye mahe hinu

original: RV_06.045.31.1{26} adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnāṃ varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhannasthāt
analyzed: adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnām varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhan asthāt

original: RV_06.045.31.2{26} uruḥ kakṣo na gāṅgyaḥ
analyzed: uruḥ kakṣaḥ na gāṅgyaḥ

original: RV_06.045.32.1{26} yasya vāyoriva dravad bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī
analyzed: yasya vāyoḥ iva dravat bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī

original: RV_06.045.32.2{26} sadyo dānāya maṃhate
analyzed: sadyas dānāya maṃhate

original: RV_06.045.33.1{26} tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ
analyzed: tat su naḥ viśve aryaḥ ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_06.045.33.2{26} bṛbuṃ sahasradātamaṃ sūriṃ sahasrasātamam
analyzed: bṛbum sahasra dātamam sūrim sahasra sātamam

original: RV_06.046.01.1{27} tvāmid dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ
analyzed: tvām id hi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ

original: RV_06.046.01.2{27} tvāṃ vṛtreṣvindra satpatiṃ narastvāṃ kāṣṭhāsvarvataḥ
analyzed: tvām vṛtreṣu indra sat patim naraḥ tvām kāṣṭhāsu arvataḥ

original: RV_06.046.02.1{27} sa tvaṃ naścitra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ citra vajra hasta dhṛṣṇuyā mahaḥ stavānaḥ adrivas

original: RV_06.046.02.2{27} gāmaśvaṃ rathyamindra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe
analyzed: gām aśvam rathyam indra sam kira satrā vājam na jigyuṣe

original: RV_06.046.03.1{27} yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇirindraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam
analyzed: yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇiḥ indram tam hūmahe vayam

original: RV_06.046.03.2{27} sahasramuṣka tuvinṛmṇa satpate bhavā samatsu no vṛdhe
analyzed: sahasra muṣka tuvi nṛmṇa satpate bhava samatsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_06.046.04.1{27} bādhase janān vṛṣabheva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḷha ṛcīṣama
analyzed: bādhase janān vṛṣabhā iva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḍhe ṛcīṣama

original: RV_06.046.04.2{27} asmākaṃ bodhyavitā mahādhane tanūṣvapsu sūrye
analyzed: asmākam bodhyavitā mahādhane tanūṣu apsu sūrye

original: RV_06.046.05.1{27} indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharanojiṣṭhaṃ papuri śravaḥ
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭham naḥ ā bharan ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ

original: RV_06.046.05.2{27} yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ
analyzed: yena ime citra vajrahasta rodasī ā ubhe su śipra prāḥ

original: RV_06.046.06.1{28} tvāmugramavase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe
analyzed: tvām ugram avase carṣaṇī saham rājan deveṣu hūmahe

original: RV_06.046.06.2{28} viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi
analyzed: viśvā su naḥ vithurā pibdanā vaso mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi

original: RV_06.046.07.1{28} yadindra nāhuṣīṣvānojo nṛmṇaṃ ca kṛṣṭiṣu
analyzed: yat indra nāhuṣīṣu ānojaḥ nṛmṇam ca kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_06.046.07.2{28} yad vāpañca kṣitīnāṃ dyumnamā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā
analyzed: yat vā apañca kṣitīnām dyumnam ā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_06.046.08.1{28} yad vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāvā jane yat pūrau kacca vṛṣṇyam
analyzed: yat vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāvā jane yat pūrau kad ca vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_06.046.08.2{28} asmabhyaṃ tad rirīhi saṃ nṛṣāhye 'mitrān pṛtsuturvaṇe
analyzed: asmabhyam tat rirīhi sam nṛṣāhye mitrān pṛtsuturvaṇe

original: RV_06.046.09.1{28} indra tridhātu śaraṇaṃ trivarūthaṃ svastimat
analyzed: indra tri dhātu śaraṇam tri varūtham svastimat

original: RV_06.046.09.2{28} chardiryacha maghavadbhyaśca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyumebhyaḥ
analyzed: chardiḥ yaccha maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca yāvaya didyumebhyaḥ

original: RV_06.046.10.1{28} ye gavyatā manasā śatrumādabhurabhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhuḥ abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_06.046.10.2{28} adha smā no maghavannindra girvaṇastanūpā antamo bhava
analyzed: adha smā naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ tanū pāḥ antamaḥ bhava

original: RV_06.046.11.1{29} adha smā no vṛdhe bhavendra nāyamavā yudhi
analyzed: adha smā naḥ vṛdhe bhava indra na ayam avāḥ yudhi

original: RV_06.046.11.2{29} yadantarikṣepatayanti parṇino didyavastigmamūrdhānaḥ
analyzed: yat antarikṣe patayanti parṇinaḥ didyavaḥ tigma mūrdhānaḥ

original: RV_06.046.12.1{29} yatra śūrāsastanvo vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām
analyzed: yatra śūrāsaḥ tanvaḥ vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām

original: RV_06.046.12.2{29} adha smā yacha tanve tane ca chardiracittaṃ yāvaya dveṣaḥ
analyzed: adha smā yaccha tanve tane ca chardiḥ acittam yāvaya dveṣaḥ

original: RV_06.046.13.1{29} yadindra sarge arvataścodayāse mahādhane
analyzed: yat indra sarge arvataḥ codayāse mahādhane

original: RV_06.046.13.2{29} asamane adhvanivṛjine pathi śyenāniva śravasyatah
analyzed: asamane adhvani vṛjine pathi śyenān iva śravasyatah

original: RV_06.046.14.1{29} sindhūnriva pravaṇa āśuyā yato yadi klośamanu ṣvaṇi
analyzed: sindhūn riva pravaṇaḥ āśuyā yataḥ yadi klośam anu svaṇi

original: RV_06.046.14.2{29} ā ye vayo na varvṛtatyāmiṣi gṛbhītā bāhvorgavi
analyzed: ā ye vayaḥ na varvṛtati āmiṣi gṛbhītāḥ bāhvoḥ gavi

original: RV_06.047.01.1{30} svāduṣ kilāyaṃ madhumānutāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavānutāyam
analyzed: svāduḥ kila ayam tīvraḥ kila ayam

original: RV_06.047.01.2{30} uto nvasya papivāṃsamindraṃ na kaścanasahata āhaveṣu
analyzed: uta u nu asya papivāṃsam indram na kaścana sahate āhaveṣu

original: RV_06.047.02.1{30} ayaṃ svāduriha madiṣṭha āsa yasyendro vṛtrahatye mamāda
analyzed: ayam svāduḥ iha madiṣṭhaḥ āsa yasya indraḥ vṛtra hatye mamāda

original: RV_06.047.02.2{30} purūṇi yaścyautnā śambarasya vi navatiṃ nava ca dehyo han
analyzed: purūṇi yaḥ cyautnā śambarasya vi navatim nava ca dehyaḥ han

original: RV_06.047.03.1{30} ayaṃ me pīta udiyarti vacamayaṃ manīṣāmuśatīmajīgaḥ
analyzed: ayam me pītaḥ udiyarti vacam ayam manīṣām uśatīm ajīgaḥ

original: RV_06.047.03.2{30} ayaṃ ṣaḷ urvīramimīta dhīro na yābhyo bhuvanaṃ kaccanāre
analyzed: ayam ṣaṣ urvīḥ amimīta dhīraḥ na yābhyaḥ bhuvanam kad cana āre

original: RV_06.047.04.1{30} ayaṃ sa yo varimāṇaṃ pṛthivyā varṣmāṇaṃ divo akṛṇodayaṃ saḥ
analyzed: ayam sa yaḥ varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ varṣmāṇam divaḥ akṛṇot ayam saḥ

original: RV_06.047.04.2{30} ayaṃ pīyūṣaṃ tisṛṣu pravatsu somo dādhārorvantarikṣam
analyzed: ayam pīyūṣam tisṛṣu pravatsu somaḥ dādhāra uru antarikṣam

original: RV_06.047.05.1{30} ayaṃ vidaccitradṛśīkamarṇaḥ śukrasadmanāmuṣasāmanīke
analyzed: ayam vidat citra dṛśīkamarṇaḥ śukra sadmanām uṣasām anīke

original: RV_06.047.05.2{30} ayaṃ mahān mahatā skambhanenod dyāmastabhnād vṛṣabhomarutvān
analyzed: ayam mahān mahatā skambhanena ud dyām astabhnāt vṛṣabhaḥ u marutvān

original: RV_06.047.06.1{31} dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somamindra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām
analyzed: dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtra hā śūra samare vasūnām

original: RV_06.047.06.2{31} mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayisthāno rayimasmāsu dhehi
analyzed: mādhyandine savane ā vṛṣasva rayi sthānaḥ rayim asmāsu dhehi

original: RV_06.047.07.1{31} indra pra ṇaḥ puraeteva paśya pra no naya prataraṃ vasyo acha
analyzed: indra pra naḥ puraetā iva paśya pra naḥ naya prataram vasyaḥ acha

original: RV_06.047.07.2{31} bhavā supāro atipārayo no bhavā sunītiruta vāmanītiḥ
analyzed: bhava su pāraḥ atipārayaḥ naḥ bhava su nītiḥ uta vāma nītiḥ

original: RV_06.047.08.1{31} uruṃ no lokamanu neṣi vidvān svarvajjyotirabhayaṃ svasti
analyzed: urum naḥ lokam anu neṣi vidvān svarvat jyotiḥ abhayam svasti

original: RV_06.047.08.2{31} ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā
analyzed: ṛṣvā te indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā

original: RV_06.047.09.1{31} variṣṭhe na indra vandhure dhā vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvannaśvayorā
analyzed: variṣṭhe naḥ indra vandhure dhāḥ vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvan aśvayoḥ ā

original: RV_06.047.09.2{31} iṣamā vakṣīṣāṃ varṣiṣṭhāṃ mā nastārīn maghavan rāyo aryaḥ
analyzed: iṣam ā vakṣi iṣām varṣiṣṭhām mā naḥ tārīt maghavan rāyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_06.047.10.1{31} indra mṛḷa mahyaṃ jīvātumicha codaya dhiyamayaso na dhārām
analyzed: indra mṛḍa mahyam jīvātum icha codaya dhiyam ayasaḥ na dhārām

original: RV_06.047.10.2{31} yat kiṃ cāhaṃ tvāyuridaṃ vadāmi tajjuṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam
analyzed: yat kim ca aham tvāyuḥ idam vadāmi tat juṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam

original: RV_06.047.11.1{32} trātāramindramavitāramindraṃ have-have suhavaṃ śūramindram
analyzed: trātāram indram avitāram indram havehave su havam śūram indram

original: RV_06.047.11.2{32} hvayāmi śakraṃ puruhūtamindraṃ svasti no maghavādhātvindraḥ
analyzed: hvayāmi śakram puru hūtam indram svasti naḥ maghavā adhātu indraḥ

original: RV_06.047.12.1{32} indraḥ sutrāmā svavānavobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā su avān avobhiḥ su mṛḷīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_06.047.12.2{32} bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma
analyzed: bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_06.047.13.1{32} tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_06.047.13.2{32} sa sutrāmā svavānindro asme ārāccid dveṣaḥ sanutaryuyotu
analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asme ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu

original: RV_06.047.14.1{32} ava tve indra pravato normirgiro brahmāṇi niyuto dhavante
analyzed: ava tve indra pravataḥ nā ūrmiḥ giraḥ brahmāṇi niyutaḥ dhavante

original: RV_06.047.14.2{32} urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇyapo gā vajrin yuvase samindūn
analyzed: urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇi apaḥ gāḥ vajrin yuvase samindūn

original: RV_06.047.15.1{32} ka īṃ stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt ko yajāte yadugramin maghavā viśvahāvet
analyzed: kaḥ īm stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt kaḥ yajāte yat ugram id maghavā viśvahā avet

original: RV_06.047.15.2{32} pādāviva praharannanyam-anyaṃ kṛṇoti pūrvamaparaṃ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: pādau iva praharan anyam anyam kṛṇoti pūrvam aparam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_06.047.16.1{33} śṛṇve vīra ugram-ugraṃ damāyannanyam anyamatinenīyamānaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇve vīraḥ ugram ugram damāyan anyam anyam atinenīyamānaḥ

original: RV_06.047.16.2{33} edhamānadviḷ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān
analyzed: edhamāna dviṣ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśaḥ indraḥ manuṣyān

original: RV_06.047.17.1{33} parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhireti
analyzed: parā pūrveṣām sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇaḥ aparebhiḥ eti

original: RV_06.047.17.2{33} anānubhūtīravadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīrindraḥ śaradastartarīti
analyzed: anānubhūtīḥ avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīḥ indraḥ śaradaḥ tartarīti

original: RV_06.047.18.1{33} rūpaṃ-rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva tadasya rūpaṃ praticakṣaṇāya
analyzed: rūpam rūpam pratirūpaḥ babhūva tat asya rūpam praticakṣaṇāya

original: RV_06.047.18.2{33} indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hyasya harayaḥśatā daśa
analyzed: indraḥ māyābhiḥ puru rūpaḥ īyate yuktāḥ hi asya harayaḥ śatāḥ daśa

original: RV_06.047.19.1{33} yujāno haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭeha rājati
analyzed: yujānaḥ haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭā iha rājati

original: RV_06.047.19.2{33} ko viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣa āsata utāsīneṣu sūriṣu
analyzed: kaḥ viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣe āsate uta āsīneṣu sūriṣu

original: RV_06.047.20.1{33} agavyūti kṣetramāgamna devā urvī satī bhūmiraṃhūraṇābhūt
analyzed: devāḥ urvī satī bhūmiḥ aṃhūraṇā abhūt

original: RV_06.047.20.2{33} bṛhaspate pra cikitsā gaviṣṭāvitthā sate jaritraindra panthām
analyzed: bṛhaspate pra cikitsa gaviṣṭau itthā sate jaritrā aindra panthām

original: RV_06.047.21.1{34} dive-dive sadṛśīranyamardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhatapa sadmanojāḥ
analyzed: dive dive sadṛśīḥ anyam ardham kṛṣṇāḥ asedhatapa sadmanaḥ jāḥ

original: RV_06.047.21.2{34} ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca
analyzed: ahan dāsā vṛṣabhaḥ vasnayantā udavraje varcinam śambaram ca

original: RV_06.047.22.1{34} prastoka in nu rādhasasta indra daśa kośayīrdaśa vājino 'dāt
analyzed: prastokaḥ id nu rādhasaḥ te indra daśa kośayīḥ daśa vājinaḥ dāt

original: RV_06.047.22.2{34} divodāsādatithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaraṃ vasu pratyagrabhīṣma
analyzed: divodāsāt atithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaram vasu pratyagrabhīṣma

original: RV_06.047.23.1{34} daśāśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrādhibhojanā
analyzed: daśa aśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrā adhibhojanā

original: RV_06.047.23.2{34} daśo hiraṇyapiṇḍān divodāsādasāniṣam
analyzed: daśa u hiraṇya piṇḍān divodāsa adasāniṣam

original: RV_06.047.24.1{34} daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śataṃ gā atharvabhyaḥ
analyzed: daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śatam gāḥ atharvabhyaḥ

original: RV_06.047.24.2{34} aśvathaḥ pāyave 'dāt
analyzed: aśvathaḥ pāyave dāt

original: RV_06.047.25.1{34} mahi rādho viśvajanyaṃ dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayo abhyayaṣṭa
analyzed: mahi rādhaḥ viśvajanyam dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayaḥ abhyayaṣṭa

original: RV_06.047.26.1{35} vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_06.047.26.2{35} gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḷayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni
analyzed: gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni

original: RV_06.047.27.1{35} divas pṛthivyāḥ paryoja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ paryābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ paryābhṛtam sahaḥ

original: RV_06.047.27.2{35} apāmojmānaṃ pari gobhirāvṛtamindrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja
analyzed: apāma ūjmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja

original: RV_06.047.28.1{35} indrasya vajro marutāmanīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_06.047.28.2{35} semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya
analyzed: sa imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: RV_06.047.29.1{35} upa śvāsaya pṛthivīmuta dyāṃ purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
analyzed: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutām viṣṭhitam jagat

original: RV_06.047.29.2{35} sa dundubhe sajūrindreṇa devairdūrād davīyoapa sedha śatrūn
analyzed: sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn

original: RV_06.047.30.1{35} ā krandaya balamojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ
analyzed: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ ni stanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ

original: RV_06.047.30.2{35} apa protha dundubhe duchunā ita indrasya muṣṭirasi vīḷayasva
analyzed: apa protha dundubhe duchunāḥ itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva

original: RV_06.047.31.1{35} āmūraja pratyāvartayemāḥ ketumad dundubhirvāvadīti
analyzed: ā amūraja pratyāvartaya imāḥ ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadīti

original: RV_06.047.31.2{35} samaśvaparṇāścaranti no naro 'smākamindra rathino jayantu
analyzed: sam aśva parṇāḥ caranti naḥ naraḥ smākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu

original: RV_06.048.01.1{01} yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase
analyzed: yajñāyajñāḥ vaḥ agnaye girā girā ca dakṣase

original: RV_06.048.01.2{01} pra-pra vayamamṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam
analyzed: pra pra vayam amṛtam jātavedasam priyam mitram na śaṃsiṣam

original: RV_06.048.02.1{01} ūrjo napātaṃ sa hināyamasmayurdāśema havyadātaye
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam sa hina ayam asmayuḥ dāśema havya dātaye

original: RV_06.048.02.2{01} bhuvad vājeṣvavitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām
analyzed: bhuvat vājeṣu avitā bhuvat vṛdhaḥ uta trātā tanūnām

original: RV_06.048.03.1{01} vṛṣā hyagne ajaro mahān vibhāsyarciṣā
analyzed: vṛṣā hi agne ajaraḥ mahān vibhāsi arciṣā

original: RV_06.048.03.2{01} ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucacchuce sudītibhiḥ su dīdihi
analyzed: ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucat śuce su dītibhiḥ su dīdihi

original: RV_06.048.04.1{01} maho devān yajasi yakṣyānuṣak tava kratvota daṃsanā
analyzed: mahaḥ devān yajasi yakṣya anuṣak tava kratvā uta daṃsanā

original: RV_06.048.04.2{01} arvācaḥ sīṃ kṛṇuhyagne 'vase rāsva vājota vaṃsva
analyzed: arvācaḥ sīm kṛṇuhi agne vase rāsva vājā uta vaṃsva

original: RV_06.048.05.1{01} yamāpo adrayo vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati
analyzed: yama apaḥ adrayaḥ vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati

original: RV_06.048.05.2{01} sahasā yo mathito jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyā adhi sānavi
analyzed: sahasā yaḥ mathitaḥ jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānavi

original: RV_06.048.06.1{02} ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi
analyzed: ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi

original: RV_06.048.06.2{02} tirastamo dadṛśa ūrmyāsvā śyāvāsvaruṣo vṛṣā śyāvā aruṣo vṛṣā
analyzed: tirastamaḥ dadṛśe ūrmyāsu ā śyāvāsu aruṣaḥ vṛṣā śyāvāḥ aruṣaḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_06.048.07.1{02} bṛhadbhiragne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā
analyzed: bṛhadbhiḥ agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā

original: RV_06.048.07.2{02} bharadvāje samidhāno yaviṣṭhya revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi
analyzed: bharadvāje samidhānaḥ yaviṣṭhya revat naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi

original: RV_06.048.08.1{02} viśvāsāṃ gṛhapatirviśāmasi tvamagne mānuṣīṇām
analyzed: viśvāsām gṛhapatiḥ viśāmasi tvam agne mānuṣīṇām

original: RV_06.048.08.2{02} śataṃ pūrbhiryaviṣṭha pāhyaṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himā stotṛbhyo ye ca dadati
analyzed: śatam pūrbhiḥ yaviṣṭha pāhi aṃhasaḥ sameddhāram śatam himā stotṛbhyaḥ ye ca dadati

original: RV_06.048.09.1{02} tvaṃ naścitra ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya
analyzed: tvam naḥ citraḥ ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya

original: RV_06.048.09.2{02} asya rāyastvamagne rathīrasi vidā gādhaṃ tuce tu naḥ
analyzed: asya rāyaḥ tvam agne rathīḥ asi vida gādham tuce tu naḥ

original: RV_06.048.10.1{02} parṣi tokaṃ tanayaṃ partṛbhiṣ ṭvamadabdhairaprayutvabhiḥ
analyzed: parṣi tokam tanayam partṛbhiḥ tvam adabdhaiḥ aprayutvabhiḥ

original: RV_06.048.10.2{02} agne heḷāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi no 'devāni hvarāṃsi ca
analyzed: agne heḍāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi naḥ devāni hvarāṃsi ca

original: RV_06.048.11.1{03} ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ dhenumajadhvamupa navyasā vacaḥ
analyzed: ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughām dhenum ajadhvam upa navyasā vacaḥ

original: RV_06.048.11.2{03} sṛjadhvamanapasphurām
analyzed: sṛjadhvam anapasphurām

original: RV_06.048.12.1{03} yā śardhāya mārutāya svabhānave śravo 'mṛtyu dhukṣata
analyzed: yā śardhāya mārutāya sva bhānave śravaḥ mṛtyu dhukṣata

original: RV_06.048.12.2{03} yā mṛḷīke marutāṃ turāṇāṃ yā sumnairevayāvarī
analyzed: yā mṛḍīke marutām turāṇām yā sumnaiḥ eva yāvarī

original: RV_06.048.13.1{03} bharadvājāyāva dhukṣata dvitā
analyzed: bharadvājāya ava dhukṣata dvitā

original: RV_06.048.13.2{03} dhenuṃ ca viśvadohasamiṣaṃ ca viśvabhojasam
analyzed: dhenum ca viśva dohasam iṣam ca viśva bhojasam

original: RV_06.048.14.1{03} taṃ va indraṃ na sukratuṃ varuṇamiva māyinam
analyzed: tam vaḥ indram na su kratum varuṇam iva māyinam

original: RV_06.048.14.2{03} aryamaṇaṃ na mandraṃ sṛprabhojasaṃ viṣṇuṃ na stuṣa ādiśe
analyzed: aryamaṇam na mandram sṛpra bhojasam viṣṇum na stuṣe ādiśe

original: RV_06.048.15.1{03} tveṣaṃ śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇyanarvāṇaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ saṃ yathā śatā
analyzed: tveṣam śardhaḥ na mārutam tuviṣvaṇi anarvāṇam pūṣaṇam sam yathā śatā

original: RV_06.048.15.2{03} saṃ sahasrā kāriṣaccarṣaṇibhya ānāvirgūḷhā vasū karat suvedā no vasū karat
analyzed: sam sahasrā kāriṣat carṣaṇibhyaḥ ānā āvis gūḍhā vasū karat su vedā naḥ vasū karat

original: RV_06.048.16.1{03} ā mā pūṣannupa drava śaṃsiṣaṃ nu te apikarṇa āghṛṇe
analyzed: ā mā pūṣan upa drava śaṃsiṣam nu te apikarṇe āghṛṇe

original: RV_06.048.16.2{03} aghā aryo arātayaḥ
analyzed: aghāḥ aryaḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_06.048.17.1{04} mā kākambīramud vṛho vanaspatimaśastīrvi hi nīnaśaḥ
analyzed: mā kākambīram ud vṛhaḥ vanaspatim aśastīḥ vi hi nīnaśaḥ

original: RV_06.048.17.2{04} mota sūro aha evā cana grīvā ādadhate veḥ
analyzed: mā uta sūraḥ aha evā cana grīvāḥ ādadhate veḥ

original: RV_06.048.18.1{04} dṛteriva te 'vṛkamastu sakhyam
analyzed: dṛteḥ iva te vṛkam astu sakhyam

original: RV_06.048.18.2{04} achidrasya dadhanvataḥ supūrṇasya dadhanvataḥ
analyzed: achidrasya dadhanvataḥ su pūrṇasya dadhanvataḥ

original: RV_06.048.19.1{04} paro hi martyairasi samo devairuta śriyā
analyzed: paraḥ hi martyaiḥ asi samaḥ devaiḥ uta śriyā

original: RV_06.048.19.2{04} abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu nastvamavā nūnaṃ yathā purā
analyzed: abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu naḥ tvam avāḥ nūnam yathā purā

original: RV_06.048.20.1{04} vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītirastu sūnṛtā
analyzed: vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītiḥ astu sūnṛtā

original: RV_06.048.20.2{04} devasya vāmaruto martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ
analyzed: devasya vāmarutaḥ martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ

original: RV_06.048.21.1{04} sadyaścid yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyāṃ devo naiti sūryaḥ
analyzed: sadyas cit yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyām devaḥ nā eti sūryaḥ

original: RV_06.048.21.2{04} tveṣaṃ śavo dadhire nāma yajñiyaṃ maruto vṛtrahaṃ śavo jyeṣṭhaṃ vṛtrahaṃ śavaḥ
analyzed: tveṣam śavaḥ dadhire nāma yajñiyam marutaḥ vṛtra ham śavaḥ jyeṣṭham vṛtra ham śavaḥ

original: RV_06.048.22.1{04} sakṛd dha dyaurajāyata sakṛd bhūmirajāyata
analyzed: sakṛt ha dyauḥ ajāyata sakṛt bhūmiḥ ajāyata

original: RV_06.048.22.2{04} pṛśnyā dugdhaṃ sakṛt payastadanyo nānu jāyate
analyzed: pṛśnyāḥ dugdham sakṛt payaḥ tat anyaḥ na anu jāyate

original: RV_06.049.01.1{05} stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhirgīrbhirmitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā
analyzed: stuṣe janam suvratam navyasībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā

original: RV_06.049.01.2{05} ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantu sukṣatrāso varuṇomitro agniḥ
analyzed: te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu su kṣatrāsaḥ varuṇaḥ umitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_06.049.02.1{05} viśo-viśa īḍyamadhvareṣvadṛptakratumaratiṃ yuvatyoḥ
analyzed: viśaḥ viśaḥ īḍyam adhvareṣu adṛpta kratum aratim yuvatyoḥ

original: RV_06.049.02.2{05} divaḥ śiśuṃ sahasaḥ sūnumagniṃ yajñasya ketumaruṣaṃ yajadhyai
analyzed: divaḥ śiśum sahasaḥ sūnum agnim yajñasya ketum aruṣam yajadhyai

original: RV_06.049.03.1{05} aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhiranyā pipiśe sūro anyā
analyzed: aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhiḥ anyā pipiśe sūraḥ anyā

original: RV_06.049.03.2{05} mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutaṃ nakṣata ṛcyamāne
analyzed: mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutam nakṣataḥ ṛcyamāne

original: RV_06.049.04.1{05} pra vāyumachā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām
analyzed: pra vāyum achā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhat rayim viśva vāram ratha prām

original: RV_06.049.04.2{05} dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavimiyakṣasi prayajyo
analyzed: dyutat yāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo

original: RV_06.049.05.1{05} sa me vapuśchadayadaśvinoryo ratho virukmān manasā yujānaḥ
analyzed: sa me vapuḥ chadayat aśvinoḥ yaḥ rathaḥ virukmān manasā yujānaḥ

original: RV_06.049.05.2{05} yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartiryāthastanayāya tmane ca
analyzed: yena narā nāsatyā iṣayadhyai vartiḥ yāthaḥ tanayāya tmane ca

original: RV_06.049.06.1{06} parjanyavātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatamapyāni
analyzed: parjanya vātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatam apyāni

original: RV_06.049.06.2{06} satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yasya gīrbhirjagata sthātarjagadākṛṇudhvam
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yasya gīrbhiḥ jagataḥ sthātar jagat ākṛṇudhvam

original: RV_06.049.07.1{06} pāvīravī kanyā citrāyuḥ sarasvatī vīrapatnī dhiyaṃ dhāt
analyzed: pāvīravī kanyā citra āyuḥ sarasvatī vīra patnī dhiyam dhāt

original: RV_06.049.07.2{06} gnābhirachidraṃ śaraṇaṃ sajoṣā durādharṣaṃ gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat
analyzed: gnābhiḥ achidram śaraṇam sajoṣāḥ durādharṣam gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_06.049.08.1{06} pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhyānaḷ arkam
analyzed: pathaspathaḥ paripatim vacasyā kāmena kṛtaḥ abhyānaṭ arkam

original: RV_06.049.08.2{06} sa no rāsacchurudhaścandrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsat śurudhaḥ candra agrāḥ dhiyam dhiyam sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā

original: RV_06.049.09.1{06} prathamabhājaṃ yaśasaṃ vayodhāṃ supāṇiṃ devaṃ sugabhastim ṛbhvam
analyzed: prathama bhājam yaśasam vayaḥ dhām su pāṇim devam su gabhastim ṛbhvam

original: RV_06.049.09.2{06} hotā yakṣad yajataṃ pastyānāmagnistvaṣṭāraṃ suhavaṃ vibhāvā
analyzed: hotā yakṣat yajatam pastyānām agniḥ tvaṣṭāram su havam vibhāvā

original: RV_06.049.10.1{06} bhuvanasya pitaraṃ gīrbhirābhī rudraṃ divā vardhayā rudramaktau
analyzed: bhuvanasya pitaram gīrbhiḥ ābhiḥ rudram divā vardhaya rudram aktau

original: RV_06.049.10.2{06} bṛhantam ṛṣvamajaraṃ suṣumnam ṛdhag ghuvema kavineṣitāsaḥ
analyzed: bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram suṣumnam ṛdhak ghuvema kavinā iṣitāsaḥ

original: RV_06.049.11.1{07} ā yuvānaḥ kavayo yajñiyāso maruto ganta gṛṇato varasyām
analyzed: ā yuvānaḥ kavayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ marutaḥ ganta gṛṇataḥ varasyām

original: RV_06.049.11.2{07} acitraṃ cid dhi jinvathā vṛdhanta itthā nakṣanto naro aṅgirasvat
analyzed: acitram cit hi jinvatha vṛdhantaḥ itthā nakṣantaḥ naraḥ aṅgirasvat

original: RV_06.049.12.1{07} pra vīrāya pra tavase turāyājā yūtheva paśurakṣirastam
analyzed: pra vīrāya pra tavase turāya ajā yūthā iva paśurakṣi rastam

original: RV_06.049.12.2{07} sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhirna nākaṃ vacanasyavipaḥ
analyzed: sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhiḥ na nākam vacanasyavipaḥ

original: RV_06.049.13.1{07} yo rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni triścid viṣṇurmanave bādhitāya
analyzed: yaḥ rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni tris cit viṣṇuḥ manave bādhitāya

original: RV_06.049.13.2{07} tasya te śarmannupadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca
analyzed: tasya te śarman upadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca

original: RV_06.049.14.1{07} tan no 'hirbudhnyo abdhirarkaistat parvatastat savitā cano dhāt
analyzed: tat naḥ hirbudhnyaḥ abdhiḥ arkaiḥ tat parvataḥ tat savitā canaḥ dhāt

original: RV_06.049.14.2{07} tadoṣadhībhirabhi rātiṣāco bhagaḥ purandhirjinvatu pra rāye
analyzed: tat oṣadhībhiḥ abhi rātiṣācaḥ bhagaḥ purandhiḥ jinvatu pra rāye

original: RV_06.049.15.1{07} nu no rayiṃ rathyaṃ carṣaṇiprāṃ puruvīraṃ maha ṛtasya gopām
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim rathyam carṣaṇi prām puru vīram mahaḥ ṛtasya gopām

original: RV_06.049.15.2{07} kṣayaṃ dātājaraṃ yena janān spṛdho adevīrabhi cakramāma viśa ādevīrabhyaśnavāma
analyzed: kṣayam dāta ajaram yena janān spṛdhaḥ adevīḥ abhi cakramāma viśaḥ ādevīḥ abhyaśnavāma

original: RV_06.050.01.1{08} huve vo devīmaditiṃ namobhirmṛḷīkāya varuṇaṃ mitramagnim
analyzed: huve vaḥ devīm aditim namobhiḥ mṛḷīkāya varuṇam mitram agnim

original: RV_06.050.01.2{08} abhikṣadāmaryamaṇaṃ suśevaṃ trātṝn devān savitāraṃ bhagaṃ ca
analyzed: abhikṣa dām aryamaṇam su śevam trātṝn devān savitāram bhagam ca

original: RV_06.050.02.1{08} sujyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣapitṝnanāgāstve sumaho vīhi devān
analyzed: su jyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣa pitṝn anāgāstve su mahaḥ vīhi devān

original: RV_06.050.02.2{08} dvijanmāno ya ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvanto yajatā agnijihvāḥ
analyzed: dvi janmānaḥ ye ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvantaḥ yajatāḥ agni jihvāḥ

original: RV_06.050.03.1{08} uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatramuru bṛhad rodasī śaraṇaṃ suṣumne
analyzed: uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatram uru bṛhat rodasī śaraṇam suṣumne

original: RV_06.050.03.2{08} mahas karatho varivo yathā no 'sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ karathaḥ varivaḥ yathā naḥ sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ

original: RV_06.050.04.1{08} ā no rudrasya sūnavo namantāmadyā hūtāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ rudrasya sūnavaḥ namantām adyā hūtāsaḥ vasavaḥ dhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_06.050.04.2{08} yadīmarbhe mahati vā hitāso bādhe maruto ahvāma devān
analyzed: yadi īm arbhe mahati vā hitāsaḥ bādhe marutaḥ ahvāma devān

original: RV_06.050.05.1{08} mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardhayajvā
analyzed: mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardha yajvā

original: RV_06.050.05.2{08} śrutvā havaṃ maruto yad dha yātha bhūmā rejante adhvani pravikte
analyzed: śrutvā havam marutaḥ yat ha yātha bhūmāḥ rejante adhvani pravikte

original: RV_06.050.06.1{09} abhi tyaṃ vīraṃ girvaṇasamarcendraṃ brahmaṇā jaritarnavena
analyzed: abhi tyam vīram girvaṇasam arca indram brahmaṇā jaritar navena

original: RV_06.050.06.2{09} śravadid dhavamupa ca stavāno rāsad vājānupa maho gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: śravat id havam upa ca stavānaḥ rāsat vājān upa mahaḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_06.050.07.1{09} omānamāpo mānuṣīramṛktaṃ dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃyoḥ
analyzed: omānam āpaḥ mānuṣīḥ amṛktam dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃyoḥ

original: RV_06.050.07.2{09} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajo mātṛtamā viśvasya sthāturjagato janitrīḥ
analyzed: yūyam hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajaḥ mātṛtamāḥ viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ janitrīḥ

original: RV_06.050.08.1{09} ā no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇo hiraṇyapāṇiryajato jagamyāt
analyzed: ā naḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ hiraṇya pāṇiḥ yajataḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_06.050.08.2{09} yo datravānuṣaso na pratīkaṃ vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi
analyzed: yaḥ datravān uṣasaḥ na pratīkam vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_06.050.09.1{09} uta tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adyā devānasminnadhvare vavṛtyāḥ
analyzed: uta tvam sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adyā devān asmin adhvare vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_06.050.09.2{09} syāmahaṃ te sadamid rātau tava syāmagne 'vasā suvīraḥ
analyzed: syām aham te sadam id rātau tava syām agne vasā su vīraḥ

original: RV_06.050.10.1{09} uta tyā me havamā jagmyātaṃ nāsatyā dhībhiryuvamaṅga viprā
analyzed: uta tyā me havam ā jagmyātam nāsatyā dhībhiḥ yuvam aṅga viprā

original: RV_06.050.10.2{09} atriṃ na mahastamaso 'mumuktaṃ tūrvataṃ narā duritādabhīke
analyzed: atrim na mahaḥ tamasaḥ mumuktam tūrvatam narā duritāt abhīke

original: RV_06.050.11.1{10} te no rāyo dyumato vājavato dātāro bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ
analyzed: te naḥ rāyaḥ dyumataḥ vājavataḥ dātāraḥ bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ

original: RV_06.050.11.2{10} daśasyanto divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā apyā mṛlatā cadevāḥ
analyzed: daśasyantaḥ divyāḥ pārthivāsaḥ go jātāḥ apyāḥ mṛlatā cadevāḥ

original: RV_06.050.12.1{10} te no rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣā mīḷhuṣmanto viṣṇurmṛḷantu vāyuḥ
analyzed: te naḥ rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣāḥ mīḷhuṣmantaḥ viṣṇuḥ mṛḍantu vāyuḥ

original: RV_06.050.12.2{10} ṛbhukṣā vājo daivyo vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatāmiṣaṃ naḥ
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ daivyaḥ vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyata āmiṣam naḥ

original: RV_06.050.13.1{10} uta sya devaḥ savitā bhago no 'pāṃ napādavatu dānu papriḥ
analyzed: uta sya devaḥ savitā bhagaḥ naḥ pām napāt avatu dānu papriḥ

original: RV_06.050.13.2{10} tvaṣṭā devebhirjanibhiḥ sajoṣā dyaurdevebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ
analyzed: tvaṣṭā devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ dyauḥ devebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ

original: RV_06.050.14.1{10} uta no 'hirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇotvaja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ hirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇotu ajaḥ eka pād pṛthivī samudraḥ

original: RV_06.050.14.2{10} viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu
analyzed: viśve devāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ huvānāḥ stutāḥ mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ avantu

original: RV_06.050.15.1{10} evā napāto mama tasya dhībhirbharadvājā abhyarcantyarkaiḥ
analyzed: eva napātaḥ mama tasya dhībhiḥ bharadvājāḥ abhyarcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.050.15.2{10} gnā hutāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭā viśve stutāso bhūtā yajatrāḥ
analyzed: gnāḥ hutāsaḥ vasavaḥ dhṛṣṭāḥ viśve stutāsaḥ bhūtāḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_06.051.01.1{11} udu tyaccakṣurmahi mitrayorāneti priyaṃ varuṇayoradabdham
analyzed: udu tyad cakṣuḥ mahi mitrayoḥ āneti priyam varuṇayoḥ adabdham

original: RV_06.051.01.2{11} ṛtasya śuci darśatamanīkaṃ rukmo na diva uditāvyadyaut
analyzed: ṛtasya śuci darśatam anīkam rukmaḥ na divaḥ uditā avyadyaut

original: RV_06.051.02.1{11} veda yastrīṇi vidathānyeṣāṃ devānāṃ janma sanutarā ca vipraḥ
analyzed: veda yaḥ trīṇi vidathāni eṣām devānām janma sanutarā ca vipraḥ

original: RV_06.051.02.2{11} ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyannabhi caṣṭe sūro arya evān
analyzed: ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan abhi caṣṭe sūraḥ aryaḥ evān

original: RV_06.051.03.1{11} stuṣa u vo maha ṛtasya gopānaditiṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sujātān
analyzed: stuṣe u vaḥ mahaḥ ṛtasya gopān aditim mitram varuṇam sujātān

original: RV_06.051.03.2{11} aryamaṇaṃ bhagamadabdhadhītīnachā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān
analyzed: aryamaṇam bhagam adabdha dhītīn achā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān

original: RV_06.051.04.1{11} riśādasaḥ satpatīnradabdhān maho rājñaḥ suvasanasya dātṝn
analyzed: riśādasaḥ sat patīn ra dabdhān mahaḥ rājñaḥ su vasanasya dātṝn

original: RV_06.051.04.2{11} yūnaḥ sukṣatrān kṣayato divo nṝnādityān yāmyaditiṃ duvoyu
analyzed: yūnaḥ su kṣatrān kṣayataḥ divaḥ nṝn ādityān yāmi aditim duvoyu

original: RV_06.051.05.1{11} dyauṣ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātaradhrugagne bhrātarvasavo mṛḷatā naḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ pitar pṛthivi mātar adruh agne bhrātar vasavaḥ mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_06.051.05.2{11} viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yanta
analyzed: viśve ādityāḥ adite sajoṣāḥ asmabhyam śarma bahulam vi yanta

original: RV_06.051.06.1{12} mā no vṛkāya vṛkye samasmā aghāyate rīradhatā yajatrāḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ vṛkāya vṛkye samasmai aghāyate rīradhata yajatrāḥ

original: RV_06.051.06.2{12} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā rathyo nastanūnāṃ yūyaṃ dakṣasya vacaso babhūva
analyzed: yūyam hi stha rathyaḥ naḥ tanūnām yūyam dakṣasya vacasaḥ babhūva

original: RV_06.051.07.1{12} mā va eno anyakṛtaṃ bhujema mā tat karma vasavo yaccayadhve
analyzed: mā vaḥ enaḥ anya kṛtam bhujema mā tat karma vasavaḥ yat cayadhve

original: RV_06.051.07.2{12} viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśvadevāḥ svayaṃ ripustanvaṃ rīriṣīṣṭa
analyzed: viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśva devāḥ svayam ripuḥ tanvam rīriṣīṣṭa

original: RV_06.051.08.1{12} nama idugraṃ nama ā vivāse namo dādhāra pṛthivīmuta dyām
analyzed: namaḥ id ugram namaḥ ā vivāse namaḥ dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_06.051.08.2{12} namo devebhyo nama īśa eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ cideno namasāvivāse
analyzed: namaḥ devebhyaḥ namaḥ īśe eṣām kṛtam cit enaḥ namasā āvivāse

original: RV_06.051.09.1{12} ṛtasya vo rathyaḥ pūtadakṣān ṛtasya pastyasado adabdhān
analyzed: ṛtasya vaḥ rathyaḥ pūta dakṣān ṛtasya pastyasadaḥ adabdhān

original: RV_06.051.09.2{12} tānā namobhirurucakṣaso nṝn viśvān va ā name maho yajatrāḥ
analyzed: tāna ā namobhiḥ uru cakṣasaḥ nṝn viśvān vaḥ ā name mahaḥ yajatrāḥ
