original: RV_06.051.10.1{12} te hi śreṣṭhavarcasasta u nastiro viśvāni duritā nayanti
analyzed: te hi śreṣṭha varcasaḥ te u naḥ tiras viśvāni duritā nayanti

original: RV_06.051.10.2{12} sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agnir{ṛ}tadhītayo vakmarājasatyāḥ
analyzed: su kṣatrāsaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ ṛta dhītayaḥ vakma rāja satyāḥ

original: RV_06.051.11.1{13} te na indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhago aditiḥ pañca janāḥ
analyzed: te naḥ indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhagaḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ

original: RV_06.051.11.2{13} suśarmāṇaḥ svavasaḥ sunīthā bhavantu naḥsutrātrāsaḥ sugopāḥ
analyzed: su śarmāṇaḥ su avasaḥ su nīthāḥ bhavantu naḥ su trātrāsaḥ su gopāḥ

original: RV_06.051.12.1{13} nū sadmānaṃ divyaṃ naṃśi devā bhāradvājaḥ sumatiṃ yāti hotā
analyzed: nu sadmānam divyam naṃśi devāḥ bhāradvājaḥ sumatim yāti hotā

original: RV_06.051.12.2{13} āsānebhiryajamāno miyedhairdevānāṃ janma vasūyurvavanda
analyzed: āsānebhiḥ yajamānaḥ miyedhaiḥ devānām janma vasūyuḥ vavanda

original: RV_06.051.13.1{13} apa tyaṃ vṛjinaṃ ripuṃ stenamagne durādhyam
analyzed: apa tyam vṛjinam ripum stenam agne durādhyam

original: RV_06.051.13.2{13} daviṣṭhamasya satpate kṛdhī sugam
analyzed: daviṣṭham asya satpate kṛdhī sugam

original: RV_06.051.14.1{13} grāvāṇaḥ soma no hi kaṃ sakhitvanāya vāvaśuḥ
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ soma naḥ hi kam sakhitvanāya vāvaśuḥ

original: RV_06.051.14.2{13} jahī nyatriṇaṃ paṇiṃ vṛko hi ṣaḥ
analyzed: jahi nyatriṇam paṇim vṛkaḥ hi saḥ

original: RV_06.051.15.1{13} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_06.051.15.2{13} kartā no adhvannā sugaṃ gopā amā
analyzed: karta naḥ adhvan ā sugam gopāḥ amā

original: RV_06.051.16.1{13} api panthāmaganmahi svastigāmanehasam
analyzed: api panthām aganmahi svasti gām anehasam

original: RV_06.051.16.2{13} yena viśvāḥ paridviṣo vṛṇakti vindate vasu
analyzed: yena viśvāḥ paridviṣaḥ vṛṇakti vindate vasu

original: RV_06.052.01.1{14} na tad divā na pṛthivyānu manye na yajñena nota śamībhirābhiḥ
analyzed: na tat divā na pṛthivyā anu manye na yajñena na uta śamībhiḥ ābhiḥ

original: RV_06.052.01.2{14} ubjantu taṃ subhvaḥ parvatāso ni hīyatāmatiyājasya yaṣṭā
analyzed: ubjantu tam su bhvaḥ parvatāsaḥ ni hīyatām atiyājasya yaṣṭā

original: RV_06.052.02.1{14} ati vā yo maruto manyate no brahma vā yaḥ kriyamāṇaṃ ninitsāt
analyzed: ati vā yaḥ marutaḥ manyate naḥ brahma vā yaḥ kriyamāṇam ninitsāt

original: RV_06.052.02.2{14} tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahmadviṣamabhi taṃ śocatu dyauḥ
analyzed: tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahma dviṣam abhi tam śocatu dyauḥ

original: RV_06.052.03.1{14} kimaṅga tvā brahmaṇaḥ soma gopāṃ kimaṅga tvāhurabhiśastipāṃ naḥ
analyzed: kim aṅga tvā brahmaṇaḥ soma gopām kim aṅga tvā āhuḥ abhiśasti pām naḥ

original: RV_06.052.03.2{14} kimaṅga naḥ paśyasi nidyamānān brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetimasya
analyzed: kim aṅga naḥ paśyasi nidyamānān brahma dviṣe tapuṣim hetim asya

original: RV_06.052.04.1{14} avantu māmuṣaso jāyamānā avantu mā sindhavaḥ pinvamānāḥ
analyzed: avantu mām uṣasaḥ jāyamānāḥ avantu mā sindhavaḥ pinvamānāḥ

original: RV_06.052.04.2{14} avantu mā parvatāso dhruvāso 'vantu mā pitaro devahūtau
analyzed: avantu mā parvatāsaḥ dhruvāsaḥ vantu mā pitaraḥ deva hūtau

original: RV_06.052.05.1{14} viśvadānīṃ sumanasaḥ syāma paśyema nu sūryamuccarantam
analyzed: viśvadānīm su manasaḥ syāma paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_06.052.05.2{14} tathā karad vasupatirvasūnāṃ devānohāno 'vasāgamiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: tathā karat vasu patiḥ vasūnām deva anaḥ hānaḥ vasā āgamiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_06.052.06.1{15} indro nediṣṭhamavasāgamiṣṭhaḥ sarasvatī sindhubhiḥ pinvamānā
analyzed: indraḥ nediṣṭham avasā āgamiṣṭhaḥ sarasvatī sindhubhiḥ pinvamānā

original: RV_06.052.06.2{15} parjanyo na oṣadhībhirmayobhuragniḥ suśaṃsaḥ suhavaḥ piteva
analyzed: parjanyaḥ naḥ oṣadhībhiḥ mayobhuḥ agniḥ su śaṃsaḥ su havaḥ pitā iva

original: RV_06.052.07.1{15} viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ ā gata śṛṇutā me imam havam

original: RV_06.052.07.2{15} edaṃ barhirni ṣīdata
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ ni sīdata

original: RV_06.052.08.1{15} yo vo devā ghṛtasnunā havyena pratibhūṣati
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ devāḥ ghṛta snunā havyena pratibhūṣati

original: RV_06.052.08.2{15} taṃ viśva upa gachatha
analyzed: tam viśve upa gacchatha

original: RV_06.052.09.1{15} upa naḥ sūnavo giraḥ śṛṇvantvamṛtasya ye
analyzed: upa naḥ sūnavaḥ giraḥ śṛṇvantu amṛtasya ye

original: RV_06.052.09.2{15} sumṛḷīkā bhavantu naḥ
analyzed: su mṛḍīkāḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: RV_06.052.10.1{15} viśve devā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtubhirhavanaśrutaḥ
analyzed: viśve devāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtubhiḥ havana śrutaḥ

original: RV_06.052.10.2{15} juṣantāṃ yujyaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: juṣantām yujyam payaḥ

original: RV_06.052.11.1{16} stotramindro marudgaṇastvaṣṭṛmān mitro aryamā
analyzed: stotram indraḥ marut gaṇaḥ tvaṣṭṛmān mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_06.052.11.2{16} imā havyā juṣanta naḥ
analyzed: imā havyā juṣanta naḥ

original: RV_06.052.12.1{16} imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ hotarvayunaśo yaja
analyzed: imam naḥ agne adhvaram hotar vayunaśas yaja

original: RV_06.052.12.2{16} cikitvān daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: cikitvān daivyam janam

original: RV_06.052.13.1{16} viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha
analyzed: viśve devāḥ śṛṇuta imam havam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ upa dyavi ṣṭha

original: RV_06.052.13.2{16} ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam

original: RV_06.052.14.1{16} viśve devā mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyā ubhe rodasī apāṃ napācca manma
analyzed: viśve devāḥ mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyāḥ ubhe rodasī apām napāt ca manma

original: RV_06.052.14.2{16} mā vo vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocaṃ sumneṣvid vo antamā madema
analyzed: mā vaḥ vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocam sumneṣu id vaḥ antamāḥ madema

original: RV_06.052.15.1{16} ye ke ca jmā mahino ahimāyā divo jajñire apāṃ sadhasthe
analyzed: ye ke ca jmā mahinaḥ ahi māyāḥ divaḥ jajñire apām sadhasthe

original: RV_06.052.15.2{16} te asmabhyamiṣaye viśvamāyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantudevāḥ
analyzed: te asmabhyam iṣaye viśvam āyuḥ kṣapaḥ usrāḥ varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_06.052.16.1{16} agnīparjanyāvavataṃ dhiyaṃ me 'smin have suhavā suṣṭutiṃnaḥ
analyzed: agnīparjanyau avatam dhiyam me smin have su havā suṣṭutiṃnaḥ

original: RV_06.052.16.2{16} iḷāmanyo janayad garbhamanyaḥ prajāvatīriṣa ā dhattamasme
analyzed: iḷām anyaḥ janayat garbham anyaḥ prajāvatīḥ iṣaḥ ā dhattam asme

original: RV_06.052.17.1{16} stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau sūktena mahā namasā vivāse
analyzed: stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau su uktena mahā namasā vivāse

original: RV_06.052.17.2{16} asmin no adya vidathe yajatrā viśve devā haviṣi mādayadhvam
analyzed: asmin naḥ adya vidathe yajatrāḥ viśve devāḥ haviṣi mādayadhvam

original: RV_06.053.01.1{17} vayamu tvā pathas pate rathaṃ na vājasātaye
analyzed: vayam u tvā pathaḥ pate ratham na vājasātaye

original: RV_06.053.01.2{17} dhiye pūṣannayujmahi
analyzed: dhiye pūṣan ayujmahi

original: RV_06.053.02.1{17} abhi no naryaṃ vasu vīraṃ prayatadakṣiṇam
analyzed: abhi naḥ naryam vasu vīram prayata dakṣiṇam

original: RV_06.053.02.2{17} vāmaṃ gṛhapatiṃ naya
analyzed: vāmam gṛhapatim naya

original: RV_06.053.03.1{17} aditsantaṃ cidāghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya
analyzed: a ditsantam cit āghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya

original: RV_06.053.03.2{17} paṇeścid vimradā manaḥ
analyzed: paṇeḥ cit vimradā manaḥ

original: RV_06.053.04.1{17} vi patho vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdho jahi
analyzed: vi pathaḥ vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_06.053.04.2{17} sādhantāmugra no dhiyaḥ
analyzed: sādhantām ugra naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_06.053.05.1{17} pari tṛndhi paṇīnāmārayā hṛdayā kave
analyzed: pari tṛndhi paṇīnām ārayā hṛdayā kave

original: RV_06.053.05.2{17} athemasmabhyaṃ randhaya
analyzed: atha imasmabhyam randhaya

original: RV_06.053.06.1{18} vi pūṣannārayā tuda paṇericha hṛdi priyam
analyzed: vi pūṣan ārayā tuda paṇericha hṛdi priyam
atha īṃ

original: RV_06.053.07.1{18} ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnāṃ hṛdayā kave
analyzed: ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnām hṛdayā kave
atha īṃ

original: RV_06.053.08.1{18} yāṃ pūṣan brahmacodanīmārāṃ bibharṣyāghṛṇe
analyzed: yām pūṣan brahmacodanīm ārām bibharṣi āghṛṇe

original: RV_06.053.08.2{18} tayā samasya hṛdayamā rikha kikirā kṛṇu
analyzed: tayā samasya hṛdayam ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu

original: RV_06.053.09.1{18} yā te aṣṭrā goopaśāghṛṇe paśusādhanī
analyzed: yā te aṣṭrā goopaśā aghṛṇe paśu sādhanī

original: RV_06.053.09.2{18} tasyāste sumnamīmahe
analyzed: tasyāḥ te sumnam īmahe

original: RV_06.053.10.1{18} uta no goṣaṇiṃ dhiyamaśvasāṃ vājasāmuta
analyzed: uta naḥ goṣaṇim dhiyam aśva sām vāja sām uta

original: RV_06.053.10.2{18} nṛvat kṛṇuhi vītaye
analyzed: nṛvat kṛṇuhi vītaye

original: RV_06.054.01.1{19} saṃ pūṣan viduṣā naya yo añjasānuśāsati
analyzed: sam pūṣan viduṣā naya yaḥ añjasā anuśāsati

original: RV_06.054.01.2{19} ya evedamiti bravat
analyzed: yaḥ eva idam iti bravat

original: RV_06.054.02.1{19} samu pūṣṇā gamemahi yo gṛhānabhiśāsati
analyzed: samu pūṣṇā gamemahi yaḥ gṛhān abhiśāsati

original: RV_06.054.02.2{19} ima eveti cabravat
analyzed: ime eva iti cabravat

original: RV_06.054.03.1{19} pūṣṇaścakraṃ na riṣyati na kośo 'va padyate
analyzed: pūṣṇaḥ cakram na riṣyati na kośaḥ padyate

original: RV_06.054.03.2{19} no asya vyathate paviḥ
analyzed: na u asya vyathate paviḥ

original: RV_06.054.04.1{19} yo asmai haviṣāvidhan na taṃ pūṣāpi mṛṣyate
analyzed: yaḥ asmai haviṣā avidhat na tam pūṣā api mṛṣyate

original: RV_06.054.04.2{19} prathamo vidate vasu
analyzed: prathamaḥ vidate vasu

original: RV_06.054.05.1{19} pūṣā gā anvetu naḥ puṣā rakṣatvarvataḥ
analyzed: pūṣā gāḥ anvetu naḥ puṣā rakṣatu arvataḥ

original: RV_06.054.05.2{19} pūṣā vājaṃ sanotu naḥ
analyzed: pūṣā vājam sanotu naḥ

original: RV_06.054.06.1{20} pūṣannanu pra gā ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ
analyzed: pūṣan anu pra gāḥ ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ

original: RV_06.054.06.2{20} asmākaṃ stuvatāmuta
analyzed: asmākam stuvatām uta

original: RV_06.054.07.1{20} mākirneśan mākīṃ riṣan mākīṃ saṃ śāri kevaṭe
analyzed: mākir neśat mākīm riṣat mākīm sam śāri kevaṭe

original: RV_06.054.07.2{20} athāriṣṭābhirā gahi
analyzed: atha ariṣṭābhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_06.054.08.1{20} śṛṇvantaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ vayamiryamanaṣṭavedasam
analyzed: śṛṇvantam pūṣaṇam vayamiryam a naṣṭa vedasam

original: RV_06.054.08.2{20} īśānaṃrāya īmahe
analyzed: īśānaṃrāye īmahe

original: RV_06.054.09.1{20} pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana
analyzed: pūṣan tava vrate vayam na riṣyema kadā cana

original: RV_06.054.09.2{20} stotārasta iha smasi
analyzed: stotāraḥ te iha smasi

original: RV_06.054.10.1{20} pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam
analyzed: pari pūṣā parastāt hastam dadhātu dakṣiṇam

original: RV_06.054.10.2{20} punarno naṣṭamājatu
analyzed: punar naḥ naṣṭam ājatu

original: RV_06.055.01.1{21} ehi vāṃ vimuco napādāghṛṇe saṃ sacāvahai
analyzed: ehi vām vimucaḥ napādā aghṛṇe sam sacāvahai

original: RV_06.055.01.2{21} rathīr{ṛ}tasya no bhava
analyzed: rathīḥ ṛtasya naḥ bhava

original: RV_06.055.02.1{21} rathītamaṃ kapardinamīśānaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ
analyzed: rathītamam kapardinam īśānam rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_06.055.02.2{21} rāyaḥ sakhāyamīmahe
analyzed: rāyaḥ sakhāyam īmahe

original: RV_06.055.03.1{21} rāyo dhārāsyāghṛṇe vaso rāśirajāśva
analyzed: rāyaḥ dhārā asya aghṛṇe vasoḥ rāśiḥ aja aśva

original: RV_06.055.03.2{21} dhīvato-dhīvataḥ sakhā
analyzed: dhīvataḥ dhīvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_06.055.04.1{21} pūṣaṇaṃ nvajāśvamupa stoṣāma vājinam
analyzed: pūṣaṇam nu aja aśvam upa stoṣāma vājinam

original: RV_06.055.04.2{21} svasuryo jāra ucyate
analyzed: svasuḥ yaḥ jāraḥ ucyate

original: RV_06.055.05.1{21} māturdidhiṣumabravaṃ svasurjāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ
analyzed: mātuḥ didhiṣum abravam svasuḥ jāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_06.055.05.2{21} bhrātendrasya sakhā mama
analyzed: bhrātā indrasya sakhā mama

original: RV_06.055.06.1{21} ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ rathe niśṛmbhāste janaśriyam
analyzed: ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇam rathe niśṛmbhāḥ te jana śriyam

original: RV_06.055.06.2{21} devaṃ vahantu bibhrataḥ
analyzed: devam vahantu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_06.056.01.1{22} ya enamādideśati karambhāditi pūṣaṇam
analyzed: yaḥ enam ādideśati karambhāt iti pūṣaṇam

original: RV_06.056.01.2{22} na tena deva ādiśe
analyzed: na tena devaḥ ādiśe

original: RV_06.056.02.1{22} uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatiryujā
analyzed: uta gha sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatiḥ yujā

original: RV_06.056.02.2{22} indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_06.056.03.1{22} utādaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraścakraṃ hiraṇyayam
analyzed: uta adaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraḥ cakram hiraṇyayam

original: RV_06.056.03.2{22} nyairayadrathītamaḥ
analyzed: nyairayat rathītamaḥ

original: RV_06.056.04.1{22} yadadya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumaḥ
analyzed: yat adya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumas

original: RV_06.056.04.2{22} tat su no manma sādhaya
analyzed: tat su naḥ manma sādhaya

original: RV_06.056.05.1{22} imaṃ ca no gaveṣaṇaṃ sātaye sīṣadho gaṇam
analyzed: imam ca naḥ gaveṣaṇam sātaye sīṣadhaḥ gaṇam

original: RV_06.056.05.2{22} ārāt pūṣannasi śrutaḥ
analyzed: ārāt pūṣan asi śrutaḥ

original: RV_06.056.06.1{22} ā te svastimīmaha āreaghāmupāvasum
analyzed: ā te svastim īmahe āreaghām upāvasum

original: RV_06.056.06.2{22} adyā ca sarvatātaye śvaśca sarvatātaye
analyzed: adyā ca sarvatātaye śvas ca sarvatātaye

original: RV_06.057.01.1{23} indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayaṃ sakhyāya svastaye
analyzed: indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayam sakhyāya svastaye

original: RV_06.057.01.2{23} huvema vājasātaye
analyzed: huvema vājasātaye

original: RV_06.057.02.1{23} somamanya upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam
analyzed: somam anyaḥ upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam

original: RV_06.057.02.2{23} karambhamanya ichati
analyzed: karambham anyaḥ icchati

original: RV_06.057.03.1{23} ajā anyasya vahnayo harī anyasya sambhṛtā
analyzed: ajāḥ anyasya vahnayaḥ harī anyasya sambhṛtā

original: RV_06.057.03.2{23} tābhyāṃ vṛtrāṇi jighnate
analyzed: tābhyām vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_06.057.04.1{23} yadindro anayad rito mahīrapo vṛṣantamaḥ
analyzed: yat indraḥ anayat ritaḥ mahīrapaḥ vṛṣantamaḥ

original: RV_06.057.04.2{23} tatra pūṣābhavat sacā
analyzed: tatra pūṣā abhavat sacā

original: RV_06.057.05.1{23} tāṃ pūṣṇaḥ sumatiṃ vayaṃ vṛkṣasya pra vayāmiva
analyzed: tām pūṣṇaḥ sumatim vayam vṛkṣasya pra vayām iva

original: RV_06.057.05.2{23} indrasya cā rabhāmahe
analyzed: indrasya ca ā rabhāmahe

original: RV_06.057.06.1{23} ut pūṣaṇaṃ yuvāmahe 'bhīśūnriva sārathiḥ
analyzed: ud pūṣaṇam yuvāmahe bhīśūn iva sārathiḥ

original: RV_06.057.06.2{23} mahyā indraṃ svastaye
analyzed: mahyai indram svastaye

original: RV_06.058.01.1{24} śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaurivāsi
analyzed: śukram te anyat yajatam te anyat viṣurūpe ahanī dyauḥ iva asi

original: RV_06.058.01.2{24} viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣanniharātirastu
analyzed: viśvāḥ hi māyāḥ avasi svadhāvas bhadrā te pūṣan nihara atiḥ astu

original: RV_06.058.02.1{24} ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyaṃjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ
analyzed: aja aśvaḥ paśu pāḥ vāja pastyaḥ dhiyaṃjinvaḥ bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ

original: RV_06.058.02.2{24} aṣṭrāṃ pūṣā śithirāmudvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇobhuvanā deva īyate
analyzed: aṣṭrām pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇaḥ bhuvanā devaḥ īyate

original: RV_06.058.03.1{24} yāste pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīrantarikṣe caranti
analyzed: yāḥ te pūṣan nāvaḥ antar samudre hiraṇyayīḥ antarikṣe caranti

original: RV_06.058.03.2{24} tābhiryāsi dūtyāṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛta śrava ichamānaḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ yāsi dūtyām sūryasya kāmena kṛta śravaḥ ichamānaḥ

original: RV_06.058.04.1{24} pūṣā subandhurdiva ā pṛthivyā iḷas patirmaghavā dasmavarcāḥ
analyzed: pūṣā su bandhuḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ iḷaḥ patiḥ maghavā dasma varcāḥ

original: RV_06.058.04.2{24} yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtam tavasam svañcam

original: RV_06.059.01.1{25} pra nu vocā suteṣu vāṃ vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ
analyzed: pra nu vocā suteṣu vām vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ

original: RV_06.059.01.2{25} hatāso vāṃ pitaro devaśatrava indrāgnī jīvatho yuvam
analyzed: hatāsaḥ vām pitaraḥ deva śatravaḥ indra agnī jīvathaḥ yuvam

original: RV_06.059.02.1{25} baḷ itthā mahimā vāmindrāgnī paniṣṭha ā
analyzed: baṭ itthā mahimā vām indra agnī paniṣṭhaḥ ā

original: RV_06.059.02.2{25} samāno vāṃ janitā bhrātarā yuvaṃ yamāvihehamātarā
analyzed: samānaḥ vām janitā bhrātarā yuvam yamau iha iha mātarā

original: RV_06.059.03.1{25} okivāṃsā sute sacānaśvā saptī ivādane
analyzed: okivāṃsā sute sacānaśvā saptī iva adane

original: RV_06.059.03.2{25} indrā nvagnī avaseha vajriṇā vayaṃ devā havāmahe
analyzed: indrā nu agnī avasā iha vajriṇā vayam devā havāmahe

original: RV_06.059.04.1{25} ya indrāgnī suteṣu vāṃ stavat teṣv ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: yaḥ indra agnī suteṣu vām stavat teṣu ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_06.059.04.2{25} joṣavākaṃ vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaścana
analyzed: joṣavākam vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaḥ cana

original: RV_06.059.05.1{25} indrāgnī ko asya vāṃ devau martaściketati
analyzed: indra agnī kaḥ asya vām devau martaḥ ciketati

original: RV_06.059.05.2{25} viṣūco aśvān yuyujāna īyata ekaḥ samāna ā rathe
analyzed: viṣūcaḥ aśvān yuyujānaḥ īyate ekaḥ samānaḥ ā rathe

original: RV_06.059.06.1{26} indrāgnī apādiyaṃ pūrvāgāt padvatībhyaḥ
analyzed: indra agnī apa āt iyam pūrvā āgāt padvatībhyaḥ

original: RV_06.059.06.2{26} hitvī śiro jihvayā vāvadaccarat triṃśat padā nyakramīt
analyzed: hitvī śiraḥ jihvayā vāvadat carat triṃśat padā nyakramīt

original: RV_06.059.07.1{26} indrāgnī ā hi tanvate naro dhanvāni bāhvoḥ
analyzed: indra agnī ā hi tanvate naraḥ dhanvāni bāhvoḥ

original: RV_06.059.07.2{26} mā no asmin mahādhane parā varktaṃ gaviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: mā naḥ asmin mahādhane parā varktam gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_06.059.08.1{26} indrāgnī tapanti māghā aryo arātayaḥ
analyzed: indra agnī tapanti mā aghāḥ aryaḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_06.059.08.2{26} apa dveṣāṃsyā kṛtaṃ yuyutaṃ sūryādadhi
analyzed: apa dveṣāṃsyā kṛtam yuyutam sūryāt adhi

original: RV_06.059.09.1{26} indrāgnī yuvorapi vasu divyāni pārthivā
analyzed: indra agnī yuvoḥ api vasu divyāni pārthivā

original: RV_06.059.09.2{26} ā na iha prayachataṃ rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam
analyzed: ā naḥ iha prayacchatam rayim viśvāyu poṣasam

original: RV_06.059.10.1{26} indrāgnī ukthavāhasā stomebhirhavanaśrutā
analyzed: indra agnī uktha vāhasā stomebhiḥ havana śrutā

original: RV_06.059.10.2{26} viśvābhirgīrbhirā gatamasya somasya pītaye
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ ā gatam asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_06.060.01.1{27} śnathad vṛtramuta sanoti vājamindrā yo agnī sahurī saparyāt
analyzed: śnathat vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yaḥ agnī sahurī saparyāt

original: RV_06.060.01.2{27} irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā
analyzed: irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā

original: RV_06.060.02.1{27} tā yodhiṣṭamabhi gā indra nūnamapaḥ svaruṣaso agna ūḷhaḥ
analyzed: tā yodhiṣṭam abhi gāḥ indra nūnam apaḥ svar uṣasaḥ agne ūḍhaḥ

original: RV_06.060.02.2{27} diśaḥ svaruṣasa indra citrā apo gā agne yuvase niyutvān
analyzed: diśaḥ svaruṣasaḥ indra citrāḥ apaḥ gāḥ agne yuvase niyutvān

original: RV_06.060.03.1{27} ā vṛtrahaṇā vṛtrahabhiḥ śuṣmairindra yātaṃ namobhiragne arvāk
analyzed: ā vṛtra haṇā vṛtra habhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ indra yātam namobhiḥ agne arvāk

original: RV_06.060.03.2{27} yuvaṃ rādhobhirakavebhirindrāgne asme bhavatamuttamebhiḥ
analyzed: yuvam rādhobhiḥ akavebhiḥ indra agne asme bhavatam uttamebhiḥ

original: RV_06.060.04.1{27} tā huve yayoridaṃ papne viśvaṃ purā kṛtam
analyzed: tā huve yayoḥ idam papne viśvam purā kṛtam

original: RV_06.060.04.2{27} indrāgnī namardhataḥ
analyzed: indra agnī namardhataḥ

original: RV_06.060.05.1{27} ugrā vighaninā mṛdha indrāgnī havāmahe
analyzed: ugrā vighaninā mṛdhaḥ indra agnī havāmahe

original: RV_06.060.05.2{27} tā no mṛḷāta īdṛśe
analyzed: tā naḥ mṛḷātaḥ īdṛśe

original: RV_06.060.06.1{28} hato vṛtrāṇyāryā hato dāsāni satpatī
analyzed: hataḥ vṛtrāṇi āryā hataḥ dāsāni sat patī

original: RV_06.060.06.2{28} hato viśvā apa dviṣaḥ
analyzed: hataḥ viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_06.060.07.1{28} indrāgnī yuvāmime 'bhi stomā anūṣata
analyzed: indra agnī yuvām ime bhiḥ stomāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_06.060.07.2{28} pibataṃ śambhuvā sutam
analyzed: pibatam śambhuvā sutam

original: RV_06.060.08.1{28} yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā
analyzed: yāḥ vām santi puruspṛhaḥ niyutaḥ dāśuṣe narā

original: RV_06.060.08.2{28} indrāgnī tābhirā gatam
analyzed: indra agnī tābhiḥ ā gatam

original: RV_06.060.09.1{28} tābhirā gachataṃ naropedaṃ savanaṃ sutam
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā gacchatam narā upa idam savanam sutam

original: RV_06.060.09.2{28} indrāgnī somapītaye
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_06.060.10.1{28} tamīḷiṣva yo arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat
analyzed: tam īḍiṣva yaḥ arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat

original: RV_06.060.10.2{28} kṛṣṇākṛṇoti jihvayā
analyzed: kṛṣṇā ākṛṇoti jihvayā

original: RV_06.060.11.1{29} ya iddha āvivāsati sumnamindrasya martyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ iddhe āvivāsati sumnam indrasya martyaḥ

original: RV_06.060.11.2{29} dyumnāya sutarā apaḥ
analyzed: dyumnāya su tarāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_06.060.12.1{29} tā no vājavatīriṣa āśūn pipṛtamarvataḥ
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ vājavatīḥ iṣaḥ āśūn pipṛtamarvataḥ

original: RV_06.060.12.2{29} indramagniṃ ca voḷhave
analyzed: indram agnim ca voḷhave

original: RV_06.060.13.1{29} ubhā vāmindrāgnī āhuvadhyā ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai
analyzed: ubhā vām indra agnī āhuvadhyai ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai

original: RV_06.060.13.2{29} ubhā dātārāviṣāṃ rayīṇāmubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām
analyzed: ubhā dātārā iṣām rayīṇām ubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām

original: RV_06.060.14.1{29} ā no gavyebhiraśvyairvasavyairupa gachatam
analyzed: ā naḥ gavyebhiḥ aśvyaiḥ vasavyaiḥ upa gacchatam

original: RV_06.060.14.2{29} sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvendrāgnī tā havāmahe
analyzed: sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvā indra agnī tā havāmahe

original: RV_06.060.15.1{29} indrāgnī śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yajamānasya sunvataḥ
analyzed: indra agnī śṛṇutam havam yajamānasya sunvataḥ

original: RV_06.060.15.2{29} vītaṃ havyānyā gataṃ pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: vītam havyānyā gatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_06.061.01.1{30} iyamadadād rabhasam ṛṇacyutaṃ divodāsaṃ vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: iyam adadāt rabhasam ṛṇa cyutam divodāsam vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_06.061.01.2{30} yā śaśvantamācakhādāvasaṃ paṇiṃ tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati
analyzed: yā śaśvantam ācakhāda avasam paṇim tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati

original: RV_06.061.02.1{30} iyaṃ śuṣmebhirbisakhā ivārujat sānu girīṇāṃ taviṣebhirūrmibhiḥ
analyzed: iyam śuṣmebhiḥ bisakhā iva arujat sānu girīṇām taviṣebhiḥ ūrmibhiḥ

original: RV_06.061.02.2{30} pārāvataghnīmavase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīmā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: pārāvata ghnīm avase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīm ā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_06.061.03.1{30} sarasvati devanido ni barhaya prajāṃ viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ
analyzed: sarasvati deva nidaḥ ni barhaya prajām viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_06.061.03.2{30} uta kṣitibhyo 'vanīravindo viṣamebhyo asravo vājinīvati
analyzed: uta kṣitibhyaḥ vanīra vindaḥ viṣamebhyaḥ asravaḥ vājinīvati

original: RV_06.061.04.1{30} pra ṇo devī sarasvatī vājebhirvājinīvatī
analyzed: pra naḥ devī sarasvatī vājebhiḥ vājinīvatī

original: RV_06.061.04.2{30} dhīnāmavitryavatu
analyzed: dhīnām avitrī avatu

original: RV_06.061.05.1{30} yastvā devi sarasvatyupabrūte dhane hite
analyzed: yaḥ tvā devi sarasvati upabrūte dhane hite

original: RV_06.061.05.2{30} indraṃ na vṛtratūrye
analyzed: indram na vṛtratūrye

original: RV_06.061.06.1{31} tvaṃ devi sarasvatyavā vājeṣu vājini
analyzed: tvam devi sarasvati avāḥ vājeṣu vājini

original: RV_06.061.06.2{31} radā pūṣeva naḥsanim
analyzed: rada pūṣā iva naḥsanim

original: RV_06.061.07.1{31} uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇyavartaniḥ
analyzed: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇya vartaniḥ

original: RV_06.061.07.2{31} vṛtraghnī vaṣṭi suṣṭutim
analyzed: vṛtra ghnī vaṣṭi suṣṭutim

original: RV_06.061.08.1{31} yasyā ananto ahrutastveṣaścariṣṇurarṇavaḥ
analyzed: yasyāḥ anantaḥ ahrutaḥ tveṣaḥ cariṣṇuḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_06.061.08.2{31} amaścarati roruvat
analyzed: amaḥ carati roruvat

original: RV_06.061.09.1{31} sā no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ svasṝranyā ṛtāvarī
analyzed: sā naḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ svasṝḥ anyā ṛtāvarī

original: RV_06.061.09.2{31} atannaheva sūryaḥ
analyzed: a tanna hā iva sūryaḥ

original: RV_06.061.10.1{31} uta naḥ priyā priyāsu saptasvasā sujuṣṭā
analyzed: uta naḥ priyā priyāsu sapta svasā su juṣṭā

original: RV_06.061.10.2{31} sarasvatī stomyā bhūt
analyzed: sarasvatī stomyā bhūt

original: RV_06.061.11.1{32} āpapruṣī pārthivānyuru rajo antarikṣam
analyzed: āpapruṣī pārthivāni uru rajaḥ antarikṣam

original: RV_06.061.11.2{32} sarasvatī nidas pātu
analyzed: sarasvatī nidaḥ pātu

original: RV_06.061.12.1{32} triṣadhasthā saptadhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī
analyzed: triṣadhasthā sapta dhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī

original: RV_06.061.12.2{32} vāje-vāje havyā bhūt
analyzed: vājevāje havyā bhūt

original: RV_06.061.13.1{32} pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhiranyā apasāmapastamā
analyzed: pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhiḥ anyāḥ apasām apastamā

original: RV_06.061.13.2{32} ratha iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtopastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī
analyzed: rathaḥ iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtā upastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī

original: RV_06.061.14.1{32} sarasvatyabhi no neṣi vasyo māpa spharīḥ payasā mā na ādhak
analyzed: sarasvati abhi naḥ neṣi vasyaḥ mā apa spharīḥ payasā mā naḥ ādhak

original: RV_06.061.14.2{32} juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇyaraṇāni ganma
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇi araṇāni ganma

original: RV_06.062.01.1{01} stuṣe narā divo asya prasantāśvinā huve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ
analyzed: stuṣe narā divaḥ asya prasantā aśvinā huve jaramāṇaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.062.01.2{01} yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ paryurūvarāṃsi
analyzed: yā sadyas usrā vyuṣi jmaḥ antān yuyūṣataḥ paryurū varāṃsi

original: RV_06.062.02.1{01} tā yajñamā śucibhiścakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṃ rurucūrajobhiḥ
analyzed: tāḥ yajñamā śucibhiḥ cakramāṇāḥ rathasya bhānum rurucuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_06.062.02.2{01} purū varāṃsyamitā mimānāpo dhanvānyati yātho ajrān
analyzed: purū varāṃsi amitā mimānā apaḥ dhanvāni ati yāthaḥ ajrān

original: RV_06.062.03.1{01} tā ha tyad vartiryadaradhramugretthā dhiya ūhathuḥ śaśvadaśvaiḥ
analyzed: tā ha tyad vartiḥ yat aradhram ugrā itthā dhiyaḥ ūhathuḥ śaśvat aśvaiḥ

original: RV_06.062.03.2{01} manojavebhiriṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathirdāśuṣo martyasya
analyzed: manaḥ javebhiḥ iṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathiḥ dāśuṣaḥ martyasya

original: RV_06.062.04.1{01} tā navyaso jaramāṇasya manmopa bhūṣato yuyujānasaptī
analyzed: tā navyasaḥ jaramāṇasya manma upa bhūṣataḥ yuyujāna saptī

original: RV_06.062.04.2{01} śubhaṃ pṛkṣamiṣamūrjaṃ vahantā hotā yakṣat pratno adhrug yuvānā
analyzed: śubham pṛkṣam iṣam ūrjam vahantā hotā yakṣat pratnaḥ adruh yuvānā

original: RV_06.062.05.1{01} tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse
analyzed: tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse

original: RV_06.062.05.2{01} yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvaturgṛṇate citrarātī
analyzed: yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvatuḥ gṛṇate citra rātī

original: RV_06.062.06.1{02} tā bhujyuṃ vibhiradbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnumūhathūrajobhiḥ
analyzed: tā bhujyum vibhiradbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnum ūhathuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_06.062.06.2{02} areṇubhiryojanebhirbhujantā patatribhirarṇasonirupasthāt
analyzed: areṇubhiḥ yojanebhiḥ bhujantā patatribhiḥ arṇasā niḥ upasthāt

original: RV_06.062.07.1{02} vi jayuṣā rathyā yātamadriṃ śrutaṃ havaṃ vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ
analyzed: vi jayuṣā rathyā yātam adrim śrutam havam vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ

original: RV_06.062.07.2{02} daśasyantā śayave pipyathurgāmiti cyavānā sumatiṃ bhuraṇyū
analyzed: daśasyantā śayave pipyathuḥ gām iti cyavānā sumatim bhuraṇyū

original: RV_06.062.08.1{02} yad rodasī pradivo asti bhūmā heḷo devānāmuta martyatrā
analyzed: yat rodasī pradivaḥ asti bhūmā heḍaḥ devānām uta martyatrā

original: RV_06.062.08.2{02} tadādityā vasavo rudriyāso rakṣoyuje tapuraghaṃ dadhāta
analyzed: tat ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudriyāsaḥ rakṣaḥ yuje tapuḥ agham dadhāta

original: RV_06.062.09.1{02} ya īṃ rājānāv ṛtuthā vidadhad rajaso mitro varuṇaściketat
analyzed: yaḥ īm rājānau ṛtuthā vidadhat rajasaḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ ciketat

original: RV_06.062.09.2{02} gambhīrāya rakṣase hetimasya droghāya cid vacasa ānavāya
analyzed: gambhīrāya rakṣase hetimasya droghāya cit vacase ānavāya

original: RV_06.062.10.1{02} antaraiścakraistanayāya vartirdyumatā yātaṃ nṛvatā rathena
analyzed: antaraiḥ cakraiḥ tanayāya vartiḥ dyumatā yātam nṛvatā rathena

original: RV_06.062.10.2{02} sanutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatāmapi śīrṣāvavṛktam
analyzed: sa nutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatām api śīrṣa avavṛktam

original: RV_06.062.11.1{02} ā paramābhiruta madhyamābhirniyudbhiryātamavamābhirarvāk
analyzed: ā paramābhiḥ uta madhyamābhiḥ niyudbhiḥ yātam avamābhiḥ arvāk

original: RV_06.062.11.2{02} dṛḷhasya cid gomato vi vrajasya duro vartaṃ gṛṇate citrarātī
analyzed: dṛḷhasya cit gomataḥ vi vrajasya duraḥ vartam gṛṇate citra rātī

original: RV_06.063.01.1{03} kva tyā valgū puruhūtādya dūto na stomo 'vidan namasvān
analyzed: kva tyā valgū puru hūtā adya dūtaḥ na stomaḥ vidat namasvān

original: RV_06.063.01.2{03} ā yo arvāṃ nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hyasatho asya manman
analyzed: ā yaḥ arvān nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hi asathaḥ asya manman

original: RV_06.063.02.1{03} araṃ me gantaṃ havanāyāsmai gṛṇānā yathā pibātho andhaḥ
analyzed: aram me gantam havanāya asmai gṛṇānā yathā pibāthaḥ andhaḥ

original: RV_06.063.02.2{03} pari ha tyad vartiryātho riṣo na yat paro nāntarastuturyāt
analyzed: pari ha tyad vartiḥ yāthaḥ riṣaḥ na yat paras na antara stuturyāt

original: RV_06.063.03.1{03} akāri vāmandhaso varīmannastāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam
analyzed: akāri vām andhasaḥ varīman astāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam

original: RV_06.063.03.2{03} uttānahasto yuvayurvavandā vāṃ nakṣanto adraya āñjan
analyzed: uttāna hastaḥ yuvayuḥ vavanda vām nakṣantaḥ adrayaḥ āñjan

original: RV_06.063.04.1{03} ūrdhvo vāmagniradhvareṣvasthāt pra rātireti jūrṇinīghṛtācī
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ vām agniḥ adhvareṣu asthāt pra rātiḥ eti jūrṇinī ghṛtācī

original: RV_06.063.04.2{03} pra hotā gūrtamanā urāṇo 'yukta yo nāsatyā havīman
analyzed: pra hotā gūrta manāḥ urāṇaḥ yukta yaḥ nāsatyā havīman

original: RV_06.063.05.1{03} adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya rathaṃ tasthau purubhujā śatotim
analyzed: adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya ratham tasthau puru bhujā śata ūtim

original: RV_06.063.05.2{03} pra māyābhirmāyinā bhūtamatra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām
analyzed: pra māyābhiḥ māyinā bhūtam atra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām

original: RV_06.063.06.1{04} yuvaṃ śrībhirdarśatābhirābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭimūhathuḥsūryāyāḥ
analyzed: yuvam śrībhiḥ darśatābhiḥ ābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭim ūhathuḥ sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_06.063.06.2{04} pra vāṃ vayo vapuṣe 'nu paptan nakṣad vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām
analyzed: pra vām vayaḥ vapuṣe nu paptan nakṣat vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām

original: RV_06.063.07.1{04} ā vāṃ vayo 'śvāso vahiṣṭhā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahantu
analyzed: ā vām vayaḥ śvāsaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ abhi prayaḥ nāsatyā vahantu

original: RV_06.063.07.2{04} pra vāṃ ratho manojavā asarjīṣaḥ pṛkṣa iṣidho anu pūrvīḥ
analyzed: pra vām rathaḥ manaḥ javāḥ asarji iṣaḥ pṛkṣaḥ iṣidhaḥ anu pūrvīḥ

original: RV_06.063.08.1{04} puru hi vāṃ purubhujā deṣṇaṃ dhenuṃ na iṣaṃ pinvatamasakrām
analyzed: puru hi vām puru bhujā deṣṇam dhenum naḥ iṣam pinvatam asakrām

original: RV_06.063.08.2{04} stutaśca vāṃ mādhvī suṣṭutiśca rasāśca ye vāmanu rātimagman
analyzed: stutaḥ ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiḥ ca rasāḥ ca ye vām anu rātim agman

original: RV_06.063.09.1{04} uta ma ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śataṃ peruke ca pakvā
analyzed: uta me ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śatam peruke ca pakvā

original: RV_06.063.09.2{04} śāṇḍo dād dhiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāso abhiṣāca ṛṣvān
analyzed: śāṇḍaḥ dāt hiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāsaḥ abhiṣācaḥ ṛṣvān

original: RV_06.063.10.1{04} saṃ vāṃ śatā nāsatyā sahasrāśvānāṃ purupanthā gire dāt
analyzed: sam vām śatā nāsatyā sahasrā aśvānām purupanthāḥ gire dāt

original: RV_06.063.10.2{04} bharadvājāya vīra nū gire dād dhatā rakṣāṃsi purudaṃsasā syuḥ
analyzed: bharadvājāya vīra nu gire dāt hatā rakṣāṃsi puru daṃsasā syuḥ

original: RV_06.063.11.1{04} ā vāṃ sumne variman sūribhiḥ ṣyām
analyzed: ā vām sumne variman sūribhiḥ syām

original: RV_06.064.01.1{05} udu śriya uṣaso rocamānā asthurapāṃ normayo ruśantaḥ
analyzed: udu śriyaḥ uṣasaḥ rocamānāḥ asthuḥ apām na ūrmayaḥ ruśantaḥ

original: RV_06.064.01.2{05} kṛṇoti viśvā supathā sugānyabhūdu vasvī dakṣiṇāmaghonī
analyzed: kṛṇoti viśvā su pathā sugāni abhūt u vasvī dakṣiṇā maghonī

original: RV_06.064.02.1{05} bhadrā dadṛkṣa urviyā vi bhāsyut te śocirbhānavo dyāmapaptan
analyzed: bhadrā dadṛkṣe urviyā vi bhāsi ud te śociḥ bhānavaḥ dyām apaptan

original: RV_06.064.02.2{05} āvirvakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānoṣo devi rocamānāmahobhiḥ
analyzed: āvis vakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānā uṣaḥ devi rocamānā mahobhiḥ

original: RV_06.064.03.1{05} vahanti sīmaruṇāso ruśanto gāvaḥ subhagāmurviyā prathānām
analyzed: vahanti sīm aruṇāsaḥ ruśantaḥ gāvaḥ subhagām urviyā prathānām

original: RV_06.064.03.2{05} apejate śūro asteva śatrūn bādhate tamo ajiro navoḷhā
analyzed: apejate śūraḥ astā iva śatrūn bādhate tamaḥ ajiraḥ na voḷhā

original: RV_06.064.04.1{05} sugota te supathā parvateṣvavāte apastarasi svabhāno
analyzed: sugā uta te supathā parvateṣu avāte apastarasi sva bhāno

original: RV_06.064.04.2{05} sā na ā vaha pṛthuyāmannṛṣve rayiṃ divo duhitariṣayadhyai
analyzed: sā naḥ ā vaha pṛthu yāman ṛṣve rayim divaḥ duhitar iṣayadhyai

original: RV_06.064.05.1{05} sā vaha yokṣabhiravātoṣo varaṃ vahasi joṣamanu
analyzed: sā vaha yā ukṣabhiḥ avātā uṣaḥ varam vahasi joṣam anu

original: RV_06.064.05.2{05} tvaṃ divo duhitaryā ha devī pūrvahūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ
analyzed: tvam divaḥ duhitaryā ha devī pūrva hūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ
ud te vayaḥ

original: RV_06.065.01.1{06} eṣā syā no duhitā divojāḥ kṣitīruchantī mānuṣīrajīgaḥ
analyzed: eṣā syā naḥ duhitā divaḥ jāḥ kṣitīḥ uchantī mānuṣīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_06.065.01.2{06} yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsvajñāyi tirastamasaścidaktūn
analyzed: yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsu ajñāyi tiras tamasaḥ cit aktūn

original: RV_06.065.02.1{06} vi tad yayuraruṇayugbhiraśvaiścitraṃ bhāntyuṣasaścandrarathāḥ
analyzed: vi tat yayuḥ aruṇayugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ citram bhānti uṣasaḥ candra rathāḥ

original: RV_06.065.02.2{06} agraṃ yajñasya bṛhato nayantīrvi tā bādhantetama ūrmyāyāḥ
analyzed: agram yajñasya bṛhataḥ nayantīḥ vi tāḥ bādhanta itamaḥ ūrmyāyāḥ

original: RV_06.065.03.1{06} śravo vājamiṣamūrjaṃ vahantīrni dāśuṣa uṣaso martyāya
analyzed: śravaḥ vājam iṣam ūrjam vahantīḥ ni dāśuṣe uṣasaḥ martyāya

original: RV_06.065.03.2{06} maghonīrvīravat patyamānā avo dhāta vidhate ratnamadya
analyzed: maghonīḥ vīravat patyamānāḥ avaḥ dhāta vidhate ratnam adya

original: RV_06.065.04.1{06} idā hi vo vidhate ratnamastīdā vīrāya dāśuṣa uṣāsaḥ
analyzed: idā hi vaḥ vidhate ratnam asti idā vīrāya dāśuṣe uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_06.065.04.2{06} idā viprāya jarate yadukthā ni ṣma māvate vahatha pura cit
analyzed: idā viprāya jarate yat ukthā ni sma māvate vahatha pura cit

original: RV_06.065.05.1{06} idā hi ta uṣo adrisāno gotrā gavāmangiraso gṛṇanti
analyzed: idā hi te uṣaḥ adri sāno gotrā gavām angirasaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_06.065.05.2{06} vyarkeṇa bibhidurbrahmaṇā ca satyā nṛṇāmabhavad devahūtiḥ
analyzed: vyarkeṇa bibhiduḥ brahmaṇā ca satyāḥ nṛṇām abhavat deva hūtiḥ

original: RV_06.065.06.1{06} uchā divo duhitaḥ pratnavan no bharadvājavad vidhate maghoni
analyzed: ucha divaḥ duhitaḥ pratna vat naḥ bharadvājavat vidhate maghoni

original: RV_06.065.06.2{06} suvīraṃ rayiṃ gṛṇate rirīhyurugāyamadhi dhehi śravo naḥ
analyzed: su vīram rayim gṛṇate rirīhi uru gāyam adhi dhehi śravaḥ naḥ

original: RV_06.066.01.1{07} vapurnu taccikituṣe cidastu samānaṃ nāma dhenu patyamānam
analyzed: vapuḥ nu tat cikituṣe cit astu samānam nāma dhenu patyamānam

original: RV_06.066.01.2{07} marteṣvanyad dohase pīpāya sakṛcchukraṃ duduhe pṛśnirūdhaḥ
analyzed: marteṣu anyat dohase pīpāya sakṛt śukram duduhe pṛśni rūdhaḥ

original: RV_06.066.02.1{07} ye agnayo na śośucannidhānā dviryat trirmaruto vāvṛdhanta
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ na śośucan nidhānāḥ dvis yat tris marutaḥ vāvṛdhanta

original: RV_06.066.02.2{07} areñavo hiraṇyayāsa eṣāṃ sākaṃ nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiśca bhūvan
analyzed: areñavaḥ hiraṇyayāsaḥ eṣām sākam nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiḥ ca bhūvan

original: RV_06.066.03.1{07} rudrasya ye mīḷhuṣaḥ santi putrā yāṃśco nu dādhṛvirbharadhyai
analyzed: rudrasya ye mīḍhuṣaḥ santi putrāḥ yān ca u nu dādhṛviḥ bharadhyai

original: RV_06.066.03.2{07} vide hi mātā maho mahī ṣā set pṛśniḥ subhve garbhamādhāt
analyzed: vide hi mātā mahaḥ mahī sā sā id pṛśniḥ su bhve garbham ādhāt

original: RV_06.066.04.1{07} na ya iṣante januṣo 'yā nvantaḥ santo 'vadyāni punānāḥ
analyzed: na ye iṣante januṣaḥ yāḥ nu antaḥ santaḥ vadyāni punānāḥ

original: RV_06.066.04.2{07} niryad duhre śucayo 'nu joṣamanu śriyā tanvamukṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: niḥ yat duhre śucayaḥ nu joṣam anu śriyā tanvam ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_06.066.05.1{07} makṣū na yeṣu dohase cidayā ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutandadhānāḥ
analyzed: makṣū na yeṣu dohase cidayāḥ ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutandadhānāḥ

original: RV_06.066.05.2{07} na ye staunā ayāso mahnā nū cit sudānurava vāsadugrān
analyzed: na ye staunāḥ ayāsaḥ mahnā nu cit sudānuḥ ava vāsadugrān

original: RV_06.066.06.1{08} ta idugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇā ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke
analyzed: te id ugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇāḥ ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke

original: RV_06.066.06.2{08} adha smaiṣu rodasī svaśocirāmavatsu tasthau na rokaḥ
analyzed: adha sma eṣu rodasī sva śocirā amavatsu tasthau na rokaḥ

original: RV_06.066.07.1{08} aneno vo maruto yāmo astvanaśvaścid yamajatyarathīḥ
analyzed: an enaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ yāmaḥ astu an aśvaḥ cit yama jati a rathīḥ

original: RV_06.066.07.2{08} anavaso anabhīśū rajastūrvi rodasī pathyā yāti sādhan
analyzed: an avasaḥ an abhīśuḥ rajastu urvi rodasī pathyāḥ yāti sādhan

original: RV_06.066.08.1{08} nāsya vartā na tarutā nvasti maruto yamavatha vajasātau
analyzed: na asya vartā na tarutā nu asti marutaḥ yamavatha vajasātau

original: RV_06.066.08.2{08} toke vā goṣu tanaye yamapsu sa vrajaṃ dartā pārye adha dyoḥ
analyzed: toke vā goṣu tanaye yam apsu sa vrajam dartā pārye adha dyoḥ

original: RV_06.066.09.1{08} pra citramarkaṃ gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam
analyzed: pra citram arkam gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam

original: RV_06.066.09.2{08} ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ
analyzed: ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ

original: RV_06.066.10.1{08} tviṣīmanto adhvarasyeva didyut tṛṣucyavaso juhvo nāgneḥ
analyzed: tviṣīmantaḥ adhvarasya iva didyut tṛṣucyavasaḥ juhvaḥ nā agneḥ

original: RV_06.066.10.1{08} arcatrayo dhunayo na vīrā bhrājajjanmāno maruto adhṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: arcatrayaḥ dhunayaḥ na vīrāḥ bhrājat janmānaḥ marutaḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_06.066.11.1{08} taṃ vṛdhantaṃ mārutaṃ bhrājadṛṣṭiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā vivāse
analyzed: tam vṛdhantam mārutam bhrājat ṛṣṭim rudrasya sūnum havasā vivāse

original: RV_06.066.11.2{08} divaḥ śardhāya śucayo manīṣā girayo nāpa ugrā aspṛdhran
analyzed: divaḥ śardhāya śucayaḥ manīṣāḥ girayaḥ na apaḥ ugrāḥ aspṛdhran

original: RV_06.067.01.1{09} viśveṣāṃ vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamā gīrbhirmitrāvaruṇāvāvṛdhadhyai
analyzed: viśveṣām vaḥ satām jyeṣṭhatamāḥ gīrbhiḥ mitrāvaruṇau āvṛdhadhyai

original: RV_06.067.01.2{09} saṃ yā raśmeva yamaturyamiṣṭhā dvā janānasamā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ
analyzed: sam yā raśmā iva yama turyamiṣṭhā dvā janāna samā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ

original: RV_06.067.02.1{09} iyaṃ mad vāṃ pra stṛṇīte manīṣopa priyā namasā barhiracha
analyzed: iyam mat vām pra stṛṇīte manīṣā upa priyā namasā

original: RV_06.067.02.2{09} yantaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāvadhṛṣṭaṃ chardiryad vāṃ varūthyaṃ sudānū
analyzed: yantam naḥ mitrāvaruṇau adhṛṣṭam chardiḥ yat vām varūthyam sudānū

original: RV_06.067.03.1{09} ā yātaṃ mitrāvaruṇā suśastyupa priyā namasā hūyamānā
analyzed: ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā su śasti upa priyā namasā hūyamānā

original: RV_06.067.03.2{09} saṃ yāvapnaḥ stho apaseva janāñchrudhīyataścid yatatho mahitvā
analyzed: sam yā avapnaḥ sthaḥ apasā iva janān śrudhīyataḥ cit yatathaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_06.067.04.1{09} aśvā na yā vājinā pūtabandhū ṛtā yad garbhamaditirbharadhyai
analyzed: aśvā na yā vājinā pūta bandhū ṛtā yat garbham aditiḥ bharadhyai

original: RV_06.067.04.2{09} pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāyaripave ni dīdhaḥ
analyzed: pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāya ripave ni dīdhaḥ

original: RV_06.067.05.1{09} viśve yad vāṃ maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatraṃ devāso adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: viśve yat vām maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatram devāsaḥ adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_06.067.05.2{09} pari yad bhūtho rodasī cidurvī santi spaśo adabdhāso amūrāḥ
analyzed: pari yat bhūthaḥ rodasī cit urvī santi spaśaḥ adabdhāsaḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_06.067.06.1{10} tā hi kṣatraṃ dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānumupamādiva dyoḥ
analyzed: tā hi kṣatram dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānum upamāt iva dyoḥ

original: RV_06.067.06.2{10} dṛḷho nakṣatra uta viśvadevo bhūmimātān dyāṃ dhāsināyoḥ
analyzed: dṛḷhaḥ nakṣatraḥ uta viśva devaḥ bhūmi mātā dyām dhāsinā ayoḥ

original: RV_06.067.07.1{10} tā vigraṃ dhaithe jaṭharaṃ pṛṇadhyā ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti
analyzed: tā vigram dhaithe jaṭharam pṛṇadhyai ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_06.067.07.2{10} na mṛṣyante yuvatayo 'vātā vi yat payo viśvajinvā bharante
analyzed: na mṛṣyante yuvatayaḥ vātāḥ vi yat payaḥ viśvajinvāḥ bharante

original: RV_06.067.08.1{10} tā jihvayā sadamedaṃ sumedhā ā yad vāṃ satyo aratir{ṛ}te bhūt
analyzed: tā jihvayā sadamā idam sumedhāḥ ā yat vām satyaḥ aratiḥ ṛte bhūt

original: RV_06.067.08.2{10} tad vāṃ mahitvaṃ ghṛtānnāvastu yuvaṃ dāśuṣevi cayiṣṭamaṃhaḥ
analyzed: tat vām mahitvam ghṛtān nā avastu yuvam dāśuṣe ivi

original: RV_06.067.09.1{10} pra yad vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti
analyzed: pra yat vām mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti

original: RV_06.067.09.2{10} na ye devāsa ohasā na martā ayajñasāco apyo naputrāḥ
analyzed: na ye devāsaḥ ohasā na martāḥ ayajñasācaḥ apyaḥ na putrāḥ

original: RV_06.067.10.1{10} vi yad vācaṃ kīstāso bharante śaṃsanti ke cin nivido manānāḥ
analyzed: vi yat vācam kīstāsaḥ bharante śaṃsanti ke cit nividaḥ manānāḥ

original: RV_06.067.10.2{10} ād vāṃ bravāma satyānyukthā nakirdevebhiryatatho mahitvā
analyzed: āt vām bravāma satyāni ukthā nakir devebhiḥ yatathaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_06.067.11.1{10} avoritthā vāṃ chardiṣo abhiṣṭau yuvormitrāvaruṇāvaskṛdhoyu
analyzed: avoḥ itthā vām chardiṣaḥ abhiṣṭau yuvoḥ mitrāvaruṇa avaskṛdhoyu

original: RV_06.067.11.2{10} anu yad gāva sphurān ṛjipyaṃ dhṛṣṇuṃ yad raṇevṛṣaṇaṃ yunajan
analyzed: anu yat gāvaḥ sphurān ṛjipyam dhṛṣṇum yat raṇevṛṣaṇam yunajan

original: RV_06.068.01.1{11} śruṣṭī vāṃ yajña udyataḥ sajoṣā manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣo yajadhyai
analyzed: śruṣṭī vām yajñaḥ udyataḥ sajoṣāḥ manuṣvat vṛkta barhiṣaḥ yajadhyai

original: RV_06.068.01.2{11} ā ya indrāvaruṇāviṣe adya mahe sumnāya maha āvavartat
analyzed: ā yaḥ indrāvaruṇā aviṣe adya mahe sumnāya mahaḥ āvavartat

original: RV_06.068.02.1{11} tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇāṃ śaviṣṭhātā hi bhūtam
analyzed: tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇām śaviṣṭhā atā hi bhūtam

original: RV_06.068.02.2{11} maghonāṃ maṃhiṣṭhā tuviśuṣma ṛtena vṛtraturā sarvasenā
analyzed: maghonām maṃhiṣṭhā tuvi śuṣmaḥ ṛtena vṛtra turā sarva senā

original: RV_06.068.03.1{11} tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhirindrāvaruṇā cakānā
analyzed: tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhiḥ indrāvaruṇā cakānā

original: RV_06.068.03.2{11} vajreṇānyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtraṃ siṣaktyanyo vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ
analyzed: vajreṇa anyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram siṣakti anyaḥ vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ

original: RV_06.068.04.1{11} gnāśca yan naraśca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāso narāṃ svagūrtāḥ
analyzed: gnāḥ ca yat naraḥ ca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāsaḥ narām sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_06.068.04.2{11} praibhya indrāvaruṇā mahitvā dyauśca pṛthivi bhūtamurvī
analyzed: pra ebhyaḥ indrāvaruṇāḥ mahitvā dyauḥ ca pṛthivi bhūtam urvī

original: RV_06.068.05.1{11} sa it sudānuḥ svavān ṛtāvendrā yo vāṃ varuṇa dāśatitman
analyzed: saḥ id sudānuḥ svavān ṛtāvā indrā yaḥ vām varuṇa dāśatitman

original: RV_06.068.05.2{11} iṣā sa dviṣastared dāsvān vaṃsad rayiṃ rayivataśca janān
analyzed: iṣā sa dviṣaḥ taret dāsvān vaṃsat rayim rayivataḥ ca janān

original: RV_06.068.06.1{12} yaṃ yuvaṃ dāśvadhvarāya devā rayiṃ dhattho vasumantaṃ purukṣum
analyzed: yam yuvam dāśu adhvarāya devā rayim dhatthaḥ vasumantam purukṣum

original: RV_06.068.06.2{12} asme sa indrāvaruṇāvapi ṣyāt pra yo bhanakti vanuṣāmaśastīḥ
analyzed: asme saḥ indrāvaruṇau api syāt pra yaḥ bhanakti vanuṣām aśastīḥ

original: RV_06.068.07.1{12} uta naḥ sutrātro devagopāḥ sūribhya indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ ṣyāt
analyzed: uta naḥ su trātraḥ deva gopāḥ sūribhyaḥ indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ syāt

original: RV_06.068.07.2{12} yeṣāṃ śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyo dyumnātirate taturiḥ
analyzed: yeṣām śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyas dyumnā atirate taturiḥ

original: RV_06.068.08.1{12} nū na indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktaṃ rayiṃ sauśravasāya devā
analyzed: nu naḥ indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktam rayim sauśravasāya devā

original: RV_06.068.08.2{12} itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śardho 'po na nāvā duritātarema
analyzed: itthā gṛṇantaḥ mahinasya śardho paḥ na nāvā duritā atarema

original: RV_06.068.09.1{12} pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyamarca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ
analyzed: pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyam arca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_06.068.09.2{12} ayaṃ ya urvī mahinā mahivrataḥ kratvā vibhātyajaro na śociṣā
analyzed: ayam yaḥ urvī mahinā mahi vrataḥ kratvā vibhāti ajaraḥ na śociṣā

original: RV_06.068.10.1{12} indrāvaruṇā sutapāvimaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ pibataṃ madyaṃ dhṛtavratā
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā suta pau imam sutam somam pibatam madyam dhṛtavratā

original: RV_06.068.10.2{12} yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaramupa yāti pītaye
analyzed: yuvoḥ rathaḥ adhvaram deva vītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye

original: RV_06.068.11.1{12} indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām
analyzed: indrāvaruṇāḥ madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām

original: RV_06.068.11.2{12} idaṃ vāmandhaḥ pariṣiktamasme āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām
analyzed: idam vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam asme āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayethām

original: RV_06.069.01.1{13} saṃ vāṃ karmaṇā samiṣā hinomīndrāviṣṇū apasas pareasya
analyzed: sam vām karmaṇā sam iṣā hinomi indrāviṣṇū apasaḥ pareasya

original: RV_06.069.01.2{13} juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattamariṣṭairnaḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā
analyzed: juṣethām yajñam draviṇam ca dhattam ariṣṭaiḥ naḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā

original: RV_06.069.02.1{13} yā viśvāsāṃ janitarā matīnāmindrāviṣṇū kalaśā somadhānā
analyzed: yā viśvāsām janitarā matīnām indrāviṣṇū kalaśā soma dhānā

original: RV_06.069.02.2{13} pra vāṃ giraḥ śasyamānā avantu pra stomāso gīyamānāso arkaiḥ
analyzed: pra vām giraḥ śasyamānāḥ avantu pra stomāsaḥ gīyamānāsaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.069.03.1{13} indrāviṣṇū madapatī madānāmā somaṃ yātaṃ draviṇo dadhānā
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū mada patī madā nāmā somam yātam draviṇaḥ dadhānā

original: RV_06.069.03.2{13} saṃ vāmañjantvaktubhirmatīnāṃ saṃ stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsa ukthaiḥ
analyzed: sam vām añjantu aktubhiḥ matīnām sam stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_06.069.04.1{13} ā vāmaśvāso abhimātiṣāha indrāviṣṇū sadhamādo vahantu
analyzed: ā vāmaśvāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ indrāviṣṇū sadhamādaḥ vahantu

original: RV_06.069.04.2{13} juṣethāṃ viśvā havanā matīnāmupa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ giro me
analyzed: juṣethām viśvā havanā matīnām upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutam giraḥ me

original: RV_06.069.05.1{13} indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyaṃ vāṃ somasya mada uru cakramāthe
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyam vām somasya made uru cakramāthe

original: RV_06.069.05.2{13} akṛṇutamantarikṣaṃ varīyo 'prathataṃ jīvase no rajāṃsi
analyzed: akṛṇutam antarikṣam varīyaḥ prathatam jīvase naḥ rajāṃsi

original: RV_06.069.06.1{13} indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānāgrādvānā namasā rātahavyā
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānā agrādvānā namasā rāta havyā

original: RV_06.069.06.2{13} ghṛtāsutī draviṇaṃ dhattamasme samudraḥ sthaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhānaḥ
analyzed: ghṛta āsutī draviṇam dhattam asme samudraḥ sthaḥ kalaśaḥ soma dhānaḥ

original: RV_06.069.07.1{13} indrāviṣṇū pibataṃ madhvo asya somasya dasrā jaṭharaṃ pṛṇethām
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū pibatam madhvaḥ asya somasya dasrā jaṭharam pṛṇethām

original: RV_06.069.07.2{13} ā vāmandhāṃsi madirāṇyagmannupa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ me
analyzed: ā vām andhāṃsi madirāṇi agman upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutam havam me

original: RV_06.069.08.1{13} ubhā jigyathurna parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraścanainoḥ
analyzed: ubhā jigyathuḥ na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraḥ cana enoḥ

original: RV_06.069.08.2{13} indraśca viṣṇo yadapaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tadairayethām
analyzed: indraḥ ca viṣṇo yat apaspṛdhethām tredhā sahasram vi tat airayethām

original: RV_06.070.01.1{14} ghṛtavatī bhuvanānāmabhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā
analyzed: ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyā urvī pṛthvī madhu dughe supeśasā

original: RV_06.070.01.2{14} dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajarebhūriretasā
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūri retasā

original: RV_06.070.02.1{14} asaścantī bhūridhāre payasvatī ghṛtaṃ duhāte sukṛte śucivrate
analyzed: a saścantī bhūri dhāre payasvatī ghṛtam duhāte sukṛte śuci vrate

original: RV_06.070.02.2{14} rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcataṃyan manurhitam
analyzed: rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcataṃyat manuḥ hitam

original: RV_06.070.03.1{14} yo vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī marto dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati
analyzed: yaḥ vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī martaḥ dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati

original: RV_06.070.03.2{14} pra prajābhirjāyate dharmaṇas pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā
analyzed: pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā

original: RV_06.070.04.1{14} ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛtaśriyā ghṛtapṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛta śriyā ghṛta pṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_06.070.04.2{14} urvī pṛthvī hotṛvūrye purohite te id viprā īḷate sumnamiṣṭaye
analyzed: urvī pṛthvī hotṛ vūrye purohite te id viprāḥ īḍate sumnam iṣṭaye

original: RV_06.070.05.1{14} madhu no dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatāṃ madhuścutā madhudughe madhuvrate
analyzed: madhu naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatām madhuścutā madhu dughe madhu vrate

original: RV_06.070.05.2{14} dadhāne yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca devatā mahi śravo vājamasme suvīryam
analyzed: dadhāne yajñam draviṇam ca devatā mahi śravaḥ vājam asme su vīryam

original: RV_06.070.06.1{14} ūrjaṃ no dyauśca pṛthivī ca pinvatāṃ pitā mātā viśvavidā sudaṃsasā
analyzed: ūrjam naḥ dyauḥ ca pṛthivī ca pinvatām pitā mātā viśva vidā su daṃsasā

original: RV_06.070.06.2{14} saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśvaśambhuvā saniṃ vājaṃ rayimasme saminvatām
analyzed: saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśva śambhuvā sanim vājam rayim asme saminvatām

original: RV_06.071.01.1{15} udu ṣya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāyasukratuḥ
analyzed: udu sya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_06.071.01.2{15} ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makho yuvā sudakṣo rajaso vidharmaṇi
analyzed: ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makhaḥ yuvā su dakṣaḥ rajasaḥ vidharmaṇi

original: RV_06.071.02.1{15} devasya vayaṃ savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasunaścadāvane
analyzed: devasya vayam savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasu naścadāvane

original: RV_06.071.02.2{15} yo viśvasya dvipado yaścatuṣpado niveśane prasave cāsi bhūmanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ niveśane prasave ca asi bhūmanaḥ

original: RV_06.071.03.1{15} adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvaṃ śivebhiradya pari pāhi no gayam
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ savitar pāyubhiḥ tvam śivebhiḥ adya pari pāhi naḥ gayam

original: RV_06.071.03.2{15} hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākirnoaghaśaṃsa īśata
analyzed: hiraṇya jihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣa mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_06.071.04.1{15} udu ṣya devaḥ savitā damūnā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratidoṣamasthāt
analyzed: udu sya devaḥ savitā damūnāḥ hiraṇya pāṇiḥ pratidoṣam asthāt

original: RV_06.071.04.2{15} ayohanuryajato mandrajihva ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūrivāmam
analyzed: ayaḥ hanuḥ yajataḥ mandra jihvaḥ ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūri vāmam

original: RV_06.071.05.1{15} udū ayānupavakteva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā supratīkā
analyzed: udu ayānupavaktā iva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā su pratīkā

original: RV_06.071.05.2{15} divo rohāṃsyaruhat pṛthivyā arīramat patayat kaccidabhvam
analyzed: divaḥ rohāṃsi aruhat pṛthivyāḥ arīramat patayat kaccit abhvam

original: RV_06.071.06.1{15} vāmamadya savitarvāmamu śvo dive-dive vāmamasmabhyaṃ sāvīḥ
analyzed: vāmam adya savitar vāmam u śvas dive dive vāmam asmabhyam sāvīḥ

original: RV_06.071.06.2{15} vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūrerayā dhiyā vāmabhājaḥ syāma
analyzed: vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūrerayā dhiyā vāma bhājaḥ syāma

original: RV_06.072.01.1{16} indrāsomā mahi tad vāṃ mahitvaṃ yuvaṃ mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ mahi tat vām mahi tvam yuvam mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ

original: RV_06.072.01.2{16} yuvaṃ sūryaṃ vividathuryuvaṃ svarviśvā tamāṃsyahataṃ nidaśca
analyzed: yuvam sūryam vividathuḥ yuvam svar viśvā tamāṃsi ahatam nidaḥ ca

original: RV_06.072.02.1{16} indrāsomā vāsayatha uṣāsamut sūryaṃ nayatho jyotiṣā saha
analyzed: indrāsomā vāsayathaḥ uṣāsamud sūryam nayathaḥ jyotiṣā saha

original: RV_06.072.02.2{16} upa dyāṃ skambhathuḥ skambhanenāprathataṃ pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ vi
analyzed: upa dyām skambhathuḥ skambhanena aprathatam pṛthivīm mātaram vi

original: RV_06.072.03.1{16} indrāsomāvahimapaḥ pariṣṭhāṃ hatho vṛtramanu vāṃ dyauramanyata
analyzed: indrāsomau ahim apaḥ pariṣṭhām hathaḥ vṛtram anu vām dyauḥ amanyata

original: RV_06.072.03.2{16} prārṇāṃsyairayataṃ nadīnāmā samudrāṇipaprathuḥ purūṇi
analyzed: pra arṇāṃsi airayatam nadī nāmā samudrāṇipaprathuḥ purūṇi

original: RV_06.072.04.1{16} indrāsomā pakvamāmāsvantarni gavāmid dadhathurvakṣaṇāsu
analyzed: indrāsomā pakvam āmāsu antarni gavām id dadhathuḥ vakṣaṇāsu

original: RV_06.072.04.2{16} jagṛbhathuranapinaddhamāsu ruśaccitrāsu jagatīṣvantaḥ
analyzed: jagṛbhathuḥ an apinaddham āsu ruśat citrāsu jagatīṣu antar

original: RV_06.072.05.1{16} indrāsomā yuvamaṅga tarutramapatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthe
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ yuvam aṅga tarutram apatyasācam śrutyam rarāthe

original: RV_06.072.05.2{16} yuvaṃ śuṣmaṃ naryaṃ carṣaṇibhyaḥ saṃ vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāhamugrā
analyzed: yuvam śuṣmam naryam carṣaṇibhyaḥ sam vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāham ugrā

original: RV_06.073.01.1{17} yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatirāṅgiraso haviṣmān
analyzed: yaḥ adri bhid prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ haviṣmān

original: RV_06.073.01.2{17} dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti
analyzed: dvibarhajmā prāgharmasad pitā naḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_06.073.02.1{17} janāya cid ya īvata u lokaṃ bṛhaspatirdevahūtau cakāra
analyzed: janāya cit yaḥ īvate u lokam bṛhaspatiḥ deva hūtau cakāra

original: RV_06.073.02.2{17} ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayañchatrūnramitrān pṛtsu sāhan
analyzed: ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puraḥ dardarīti jayan śatrūn ramitrān pṛtsu sāhan

original: RV_06.073.03.1{17} bṛhaspatiḥ samajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomato deva eṣaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ samajayat vasūni mahaḥ vrajān gomataḥ devaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_06.073.03.2{17} apaḥ siṣāsan svarapratīto bṛhaspatirhantyamitramarkaiḥ
analyzed: apaḥ siṣāsan svara pratītaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ hanti amitram arkaiḥ

original: RV_06.074.01.1{18} somārudrā dhārayethāmasuryaṃ pra vāmiṣṭayo 'ramaśnuvantu
analyzed: somārudrā dhārayethām asuryam pra vām iṣṭayaḥ ramaśnuvantu

original: RV_06.074.01.2{18} dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhānā śaṃ no bhūtaṃ dvipadeśaṃ catuṣpade
analyzed: damedame sapta ratnā dadhānā śam naḥ bhūtam dvipadā īśam catuṣpade

original: RV_06.074.02.1{18} somārudrā vi vṛhataṃ viṣūcīmamīvā yā no gayamāviveśa
analyzed: somārudrā vi vṛhatam viṣūcīm amīvā yā naḥ gayam āviveśa

original: RV_06.074.02.2{18} āre bādhethāṃ nir{ṛ}tiṃ parācairasme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu
analyzed: āre bādhethām nirṛtim parācais asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu

original: RV_06.074.03.1{18} somārudrā yuvametānyasme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam
analyzed: somārudrā yuvam etāni asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam

original: RV_06.074.03.2{18} ava syataṃ muñcataṃ yan no asti tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtameno asmat
analyzed: ava syatam muñcatam yat naḥ asti tanūṣu baddham kṛta menaḥ asmat

original: RV_06.074.04.1{18} tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāviha su mṛḷataṃ naḥ
analyzed: tigma āyudhau tigma hetī su śevau somārudrau iha su mṛḍatam naḥ

original: RV_06.074.04.2{18} pra no muñcataṃ varuṇasya pāśād gopāyataṃ naḥ sumanasyamānā
analyzed: pra naḥ muñcatam varuṇasya pāśāt gopāyatam naḥ sumanasyamānā

original: RV_06.075.01.1{19} jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadāmupasthe
analyzed: jīmūtasya iva bhavati pratīkam yat varmī yāti samadām upasthe

original: RV_06.075.01.2{19} anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu
analyzed: an āviddhayā tanvā jaya tvam sa tvā varmaṇaḥ mahimā pipartu

original: RV_06.075.02.1{19} dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema
analyzed: dhanvanā gāḥ dhanvanā ājim jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samadaḥ jayema

original: RV_06.075.02.2{19} dhanuḥ śatrorapakāmaṃ kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśo jayema
analyzed: dhanuḥ śatroḥ apakāmam kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ jayema

original: RV_06.075.03.1{19} vakṣyantīvedā ganīganti karṇaṃ priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ pariṣasvajānā
analyzed: vakṣyantī vedā ganīganti karṇam priyam sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā

original: RV_06.075.03.2{19} yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samane pārayantī
analyzed: yoṣā iva śiṅkte vitatā adhi dhanvam jyā iyam samane pārayantī

original: RV_06.075.04.1{19} te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putraṃ bibhṛtāmupasthe
analyzed: te ācarantī samanā iva yoṣā mātā iva putram bibhṛtām upasthe

original: RV_06.075.04.2{19} apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantīamitrān
analyzed: apa śatrūn vidhyatām saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantīamitrān

original: RV_06.075.05.1{19} bahvīnāṃ pitā bahurasya putraściścā kṛṇoti samanāvagatya
analyzed: bahvīnām pitā bahurasya putraḥ ciścā kṛṇoti samanā avagatya

original: RV_06.075.05.2{19} iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāśca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ
analyzed: iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāḥ ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddhaḥ jayati prasūtaḥ

original: RV_06.075.06.1{20} rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatra-yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ
analyzed: rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puras yatra yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ

original: RV_06.075.06.2{20} abhīśūnāṃ mahimānaṃ panāyata manaḥ paścādanu yachanti raśmayaḥ
analyzed: abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścāt anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ

original: RV_06.075.07.1{20} tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ sahavājayantaḥ
analyzed: tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣa pāṇayaḥ śvā rathebhiḥ sahavājayantaḥ

original: RV_06.075.07.2{20} avakrāmantaḥ prapadairamitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūnranapavyayantaḥ
analyzed: avakrāmantaḥ prapadaiḥ amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūn rana pavyayantaḥ

original: RV_06.075.08.1{20} rathavāhanaṃ havirasya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitamasya varma
analyzed: rathavāhanam haviḥ asya nāma yatra āyudham nihitam asya varma

original: RV_06.075.08.2{20} tatrā rathamupa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ
analyzed: tatra ratham upa śagmam sadema viśvāhā vayam sumanasyamānāḥ

original: RV_06.075.09.1{20} svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ
analyzed: svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaraḥ vayaḥ dhāḥ kṛchreśritaḥ śaktīvantaḥ gabhīrāḥ

original: RV_06.075.09.2{20} citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ
analyzed: citra senāḥ iṣu balāḥ amṛdhrāḥ satovīrāḥ uravaḥ vrāta sāhāḥ

original: RV_06.075.10.1{20} brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā

original: RV_06.075.10.2{20} pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākirno aghaśaṃsa īśata
analyzed: pūṣā naḥ pātu duritāt ṛtāvṛdhaḥ rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_06.075.11.1{21} suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā
analyzed: suparṇam vaste mṛgaḥ asyāḥ dantaḥ gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā

original: RV_06.075.11.2{21} yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyamiṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ sam ca vi ca dravanti tatra asmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan

original: RV_06.075.12.1{21} ṛjīte pari vṛṃdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nastanūḥ
analyzed: ṛjīte pari vṛṃdhi naḥ śmā bhavatu naḥ tanūḥ

original: RV_06.075.12.2{21} somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yachatu
analyzed: somaḥ adhi bravītu naḥ ditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_06.075.13.1{21} ā jaṅghanti sānveṣāṃ jaghanānupa jighnate
analyzed: ā jaṅghanti sa anveṣām jaghanān upa jighnate

original: RV_06.075.13.2{21} aśvājani pracetaso 'śvān samatsu codaya
analyzed: aśvājani pracetasaḥ śvān samatsu codaya

original: RV_06.075.14.1{21} ahiriva bhogaiḥ paryeti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetiṃ paribādhamānaḥ
analyzed: ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ paryeti bāhum jyāyāḥ hetim paribādhamānaḥ

original: RV_06.075.14.2{21} hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsaṃ pari pātu viśvataḥ
analyzed: hastaghnaḥ viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu viśvatas

original: RV_06.075.15.1{21} ālāktā yā ruruśīrṣṇyatho yasyā ayo mukham
analyzed: ālāktā yā ruru śīrṣṇī atho yasyāḥ ayaḥ mukham

original: RV_06.075.15.2{21} idaṃ parjanyaretasa iṣvai devyai bṛhan namaḥ
analyzed: idam parjanya retase iṣvai devyai bṛhat namaḥ

original: RV_06.075.16.1{22} avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite
analyzed: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite

original: RV_06.075.16.2{22} gachāmitrānpra padyasva mānūṣāṃ kaṃ canocchiṣaḥ
analyzed: gaccha amitrān pra padyasva mā anūṣām kam cana ucchiṣaḥ

original: RV_06.075.17.1{22} yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva
analyzed: yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārāḥ viśikhāḥ iva

original: RV_06.075.17.2{22} tatrā no brahmaṇas patiraditiḥ śarma yachatu viśvāhā śarma yachatu
analyzed: tatra naḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu

original: RV_06.075.18.1{22} marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somastvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām
analyzed: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somaḥ tvā rājā amṛtena anu vastām

original: RV_06.075.18.2{22} urorvarīyo varuṇaste kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devāmadantu
analyzed: uroḥ varīyaḥ varuṇaḥ te kṛṇotu jayantam tvā anu devāḥ adantu

original: RV_06.075.19.1{22} yo naḥ svo araṇo yaśca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ svaḥ araṇaḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_06.075.19.2{22} devāstaṃsarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram
analyzed: devāḥ tam sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mama antaram
